story:
Fotografías: Alum Gálvez ©

Our story / Nuestra historia

eng. 

La Insoportable brewery and distillery was born in 2015 with hopes of supporting the art and culture of alcoholic beverages in Mexico. Andres Valverde, our master distiller is in charge of the whole production and puts in it all of his experience and passion. He believes it’s important to extol the high quality of creative and native crafts such as his own. 

His first distill was Cuerpo y Alma, a craft beer with a Robust Porter style; which stands out for its brown tonalities, as well as the smoked and chocolate accent in its flavour. La Insoportable has also made several limited editions of different spirits such as absinthe, whiskey, liquors and other beers over time with hopes of exploring other distills and gaining as much experience in the field as possible. 

On 2017 Andrés created the recipe for #ArmónicoGin, a craft gin that celebrates its locality and acknowledges tradition. It is composed by 32 botanicals from which 20 are endemic and only found in the mexican region; the whole distillation process gives Armónico a complex character of citrus, floral and spicy notes.

And that’s our story amigos… what started as a hobby became a passion and that was how La Insoportable became a well established business and started to grow; because of the great success of our crafted gin: Armónico. (...who said we mexicans could only distill tequila?)

esp. 

La Insoportable Cervecería y Destilería nace en el 2015 por el deseo de desarrollar la cultura y el arte de las bebidas alcohólicas en México. La producción está a cargo por Andrés Valverde, joven destilador que ha buscado enaltecer las creaciones artesanales y de alta calidad. 

Su primer desarrollo fue Cuerpo y Alma, una cerveza estilo Robust Porter destacada por sus tonalidades marrones y acentos ahumados y achocolatados. Adicionalmente, se han hecho ediciones limitadas de absinthe, whisky, licores y otras cervezas. 

Con deseos de explorar con destilados, Andrés crea en el 2017 la receta de #ArmónicoGin, una ginebra artesanal que celebra la localidad y reconoce la tradición. Su carácter es complejo de notas cítricas, florales y especiadas. 

Y esa es nuestra historia amigos… lo que comenzó como un hobby se convirtió en una pasión y así fue como La Insoportable pasó a ser un negocio bien establecido y empezó a crecer; por el éxito que tuvo nuestra ginebra: Armónico. (...quién dijo que los mexicanos sólo podíamos destilar tequila?)

 

 

New destillery / Nueva destilería

eng. 

One year after launching, Armónico has managed to position in the Mexican gin industry as well as in different bars and restaurants across the country. We have to admit that such a great success and fast growth was a bit unexpected; demand has hitten quite high levels... (which obviously makes us very happy!)... but also a bit pressured in terms of production and distribution. This is why we need your help; to expand our facilities and get equipment that allows us to increase production and open the doors to new products. All of this in order to manage a constant and growing demand, but also to address a new challenge: exportation. 

esp. 

A un año del lanzamiento, Armónico ha logrado posicionarse en importantes bares y restaurantes de distintas ciudades del país. Pero tenemos que admitir que tanto éxito y crecimiento fue algo inesperado; la demanda ha aumentado bastante… (lo que obviamente nos hace muy felices!)... pero también un poco presionados en cuestión de producción y distribución. Es por esto que en La Insoportable necesitamos tu ayuda; para expandir nuestra planta e implementar el equipo que nos permita aumentar la producción y abrir las puertas a nuevos productos. Todo esto para satisfacer la demanda constante y en aumento, pero también para enfrentar un nuevo reto: la exportación. 

Fotografías: Alum Gálvez
 

Our goal / Nuestra meta

eng.

The funding of our project consists of MX$500,000; which will be invested as follows: 

esp.

El fondeo de nuestro proyecto consiste en MX$500,000; que serán distribuidos de la siguiente manera: 

 

Presence / Presencia 

eng.

Today, our gin can be found in over 40 restaurants across 8 different States in México; some of which are:

esp.

Actualmente tenemos presencia en más de 40 restaurantes en 8 diferentes Estados de México; algunos de ellos son: 

 

Why support us? / ¿Por qué apoyarnos?

eng.

We strongly believe in the talent every mexican has, and it is our duty to encourage and promote that talent in order to contribute to the growth of the country. This is how we plan to play our part; by becoming a distillery that extols the high quality of mexican crafts, without leaving our origins a side and embracing the traditions behind alcoholic drinks. 

esp.

Creemos fielmente en el talento que tenemos todos los mexicanos y es deber de cada uno de nosotros impulsarlo positivamente hacia el desarrollo del país. Esta es nuestra forma de impulsarlo, queremos ser una destilería que ponga en alto la artesanía y calidad nacional, sin dejar de lado nuestros orígenes y la tradición detrás de las bebidas alcohólicas. 

 

Recompensas

eng.

We can’t put our excitement into words when we think about this crowdfunding as a success; but more than that, our final goal is to bring Armónico from our distillery in Mexico to your table, wherever you are. We promise to make you feel proud as SOON as possible!, but in the meantime we have several rewards waiting for you. Get yours! 

**Please note that our vouchers are codes exchangeable through an e-commerce platform: Kichink, and once you use your code Kichink will charge you an amount for shipping costs depending on the destination. (For more information about Kichink please visit our FAQ section)

**We highly recommend you to take a look at our FAQ section in order to be aware of some important delivery and perk terms.

esp.

Estamos muy emocionados de tener éxito en ésta campaña crowdfunding; queremos compartir Armónico con el mundo y llevarlo desde nuestra destilería hasta tu mesa estés donde estés! Con tu ayuda podremos lograrlo y vas a ver que te haremos sentir orgulloso, pero mientras tanto... Tenemos varias recompensas especiales que hicimos para ti, desde una tarjeta de agradecimiento, hasta una visita guiada a nuestra destilería una vez que terminemos con la obra. ¡Encuentra la que más te gusta! 

**Favor de tomar en cuenta que los vouchers son códigos intercambiables a través de la plataforma de e-commerce: Kichink y por lo tanto, la plataforma hace un cargo extra por costos de envío dependiendo del destino. (Para más información acerca de Kichink ve a nuestra sección de FAQ)

**Recomendamos altamente checar la sección de FAQ para saber datos importantes acerca de costos, fechas de entrega y otros términos importantes de las recompensas.

 

1. Thank you card / Tarjeta de agradecimiento

eng.

Thank you card from all of our team delivered to your home!

esp. 

¡Una tarjeta de agradecimiento hasta tu casa de parte de todo el equipo!

-

2. Pin Alambique

 

eng. 

Our limited edition alambique pin; it represents the first alambique in which this all started… it’s our baby.

esp. 

Pin edición limitada de nuestro alambique; representa el primer alambique, en el que comenzó todo… es nuestro tesoro. 

-

3.  HÜLLET T-shirt / Playera HÜLLET

eng. 

HÜLLET (clothing brand) is supporting Armónico Gin with the launch of a new Armónico t-shirt line... Choose your favorite design! 

esp. 

HÜLLET se une para apoyar nuestro crowdfunding con la creación de una nueva línea de playeras Armónico... Elige tu diseño favorito!

-

4. Cap / Gorra

eng. 

Hat with our mantra in spanish… it means: 

From everyone harmony shows and grows, when happiness is shared.

There are other two designs available... one with Armónico's logo and the other with an alambique design. Choose the one you'd like!

esp. 

Gorra negra con nuestra frase Armónico. 

También tendremos disponibles otros dos modelos de gorra... uno con el logo de Armónico y el otro con un diseño del alambique... escoge tu favorito!

-

5. Single Voucher / Cupón de descuento

eng. 

100% discount coupon in our star product (Armónico)! You'll be able to exchange this coupon through Kichink once the campaign period is over. 

**Please note that our reward consist only on the 100% discount coupon; once you exchange your coupon Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. 

esp. 

¡Cupón del 100% de descuento en nuestro producto estrella (Armónico)! Podrás canjear éste cupón a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. 

**Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste solo en el código del 100% de descuento; una vez que sea canjeado en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.

-

6. Double discount coupon / Doble cupón de descuento

eng. 

TWO 100% discount coupons for our liquors/distills! Choose TWO out of an Armónico gin bottle, a limited edition liquor or a limited edition distill! You'll be able to exchange this coupons through Kichink once the campaign period is over. 

**Please note that our reward consist only on two 100% discount coupons; once you exchange your coupons Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. 

esp. 

DOS cupones de 100% de descuento en nuestros licores/destilados… elige entre Armónico Gin, licor edición limitada o destilado edición limitada! Podrás canjear éste cupón a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. 

**Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste solo en dos códigos del 100% de descuento; una vez que sea canjeado en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.

-

7. Discount coupon in our special edition box / Cupón caja edición especial

eng. 

100% discount coupon in our limited edition Armónico box, which includes: Armónico, our alambique pin, 4 botanicals for you to make your own drink and a wooden box designed with our brand. You'll be able to exchange this coupon through Kichink once the campaign period is over. 

**Please note that our reward consist only on the 100% discount; once you exchange your coupons Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. 

esp. 

Cupón de 100% de descuento en nuestra caja edición especial que incluye: Armónico, 4 botánicos para preparar cócteles, pin alambique, caja de madera con nuestra marca. Podrás canjear éste cupón a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. 

**Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste solo en el código del 100% de descuento; una vez que sea canjeado en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.

-

8. THREE discount coupons / TRES cupones de descuento

eng. 

THREE 100% discount coupon for our liquors/distills… choose THREE out of an Armónico gin bottle, a limited edition liquor or a limited edition distill! You'll be able to exchange this coupons through Kichink once the campaign period is over. 

**Please note that our reward consist only on three 100% discount coupons; once you exchange your coupons Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. 

esp. 

TRES cupones de descuento 100% para nuestros licores/destilados… elige entre Armónico Gin, licor edición limitada, destilado edición limitada! Podrás canjear éste cupón a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. 

**Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste en solo tres códigos del 100% de descuento; una vez que sean canjeados en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.

-

9. Add it ALL up / Súmalo TODO

eng. 

THREE 100% discount coupons for our liquors/distills, a t-shirt, a cap and a pin… You'll be able to exchange the coupons through Kichink once the campaign period is over. 

**Please note that our reward consist only on three 100% discount coupons; once you exchange your coupons Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. 

esp. 

TRES cupones de descuento de 100% en nuestros licores/destilados, una playera, una gorra y un pin… Podrás canjear los cupones a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. 

**Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste en solo tres códigos del 100% de descuento; una vez que sean canjeados en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.

-

10. Bundle / Paquete

eng. 

Visit our distillery in San Juan del Río, Querétaro! You'll get a photoshoot working in our facilities and you'll also get an Armónico gin bottle...

**Please note transportation costs are not included. 

esp. 

¡Visita nuestra destilería en San Juan del Río, Querétaro! Tendrás un photoshoot trabajando en nuestras instalaciones y una botella de nuestra ginebra...

**Favor de contemplar que los costos de transporte no están incluidos.

-

10. Bundle 100% Armónico / Paquete 100% Armónico

eng. 

Visit our distillery in San Juan del Río, Querétaro! Our master distiller will help you make your own distill; you'll get a photoshoot working in our facilities and you'll take home a distilling kit as well as THREE 100% discount coupons.

**Please note transportation costs are not included. 

esp. 

¡Visita nuestra destilería en San Juan del Río, Querétaro! Nuestro maestro destilador te ayudará a hacer tu propio destilado; tendrás un photoshoot trabajando en las instalaciones y te llevarás a casa un kit para destilar y TRES cupones del 100% de descuento. 

**Favor de contemplar que los costos de transporte no están incluidos.

-
story_txt:
Fotografías: Alum Gálvez ©Our story / Nuestra historiaeng. La Insoportable brewery and distillery was born in 2015 with hopes of supporting the art and culture of alcoholic beverages in Mexico. Andres Valverde, our master distiller is in charge of the whole production and puts in it all of his experience and passion. He believes it’s important to extol the high quality of creative and native crafts such as his own. His first distill was Cuerpo y Alma, a craft beer with a Robust Porter style; which stands out for its brown tonalities, as well as the smoked and chocolate accent in its flavour. La Insoportable has also made several limited editions of different spirits such as absinthe, whiskey, liquors and other beers over time with hopes of exploring other distills and gaining as much experience in the field as possible. On 2017 Andrés created the recipe for #ArmónicoGin, a craft gin that celebrates its locality and acknowledges tradition. It is composed by 32 botanicals from which 20 are endemic and only found in the mexican region; the whole distillation process gives Armónico a complex character of citrus, floral and spicy notes.And that’s our story amigos… what started as a hobby became a passion and that was how La Insoportable became a well established business and started to grow; because of the great success of our crafted gin: Armónico. (...who said we mexicans could only distill tequila?)esp. La Insoportable Cervecería y Destilería nace en el 2015 por el deseo de desarrollar la cultura y el arte de las bebidas alcohólicas en México. La producción está a cargo por Andrés Valverde, joven destilador que ha buscado enaltecer las creaciones artesanales y de alta calidad. Su primer desarrollo fue Cuerpo y Alma, una cerveza estilo Robust Porter destacada por sus tonalidades marrones y acentos ahumados y achocolatados. Adicionalmente, se han hecho ediciones limitadas de absinthe, whisky, licores y otras cervezas. Con deseos de explorar con destilados, Andrés crea en el 2017 la receta de #ArmónicoGin, una ginebra artesanal que celebra la localidad y reconoce la tradición. Su carácter es complejo de notas cítricas, florales y especiadas. Y esa es nuestra historia amigos… lo que comenzó como un hobby se convirtió en una pasión y así fue como La Insoportable pasó a ser un negocio bien establecido y empezó a crecer; por el éxito que tuvo nuestra ginebra: Armónico. (...quién dijo que los mexicanos sólo podíamos destilar tequila?)  New destillery / Nueva destileríaeng. One year after launching, Armónico has managed to position in the Mexican gin industry as well as in different bars and restaurants across the country. We have to admit that such a great success and fast growth was a bit unexpected; demand has hitten quite high levels... (which obviously makes us very happy!)... but also a bit pressured in terms of production and distribution. This is why we need your help; to expand our facilities and get equipment that allows us to increase production and open the doors to new products. All of this in order to manage a constant and growing demand, but also to address a new challenge: exportation. esp. A un año del lanzamiento, Armónico ha logrado posicionarse en importantes bares y restaurantes de distintas ciudades del país. Pero tenemos que admitir que tanto éxito y crecimiento fue algo inesperado; la demanda ha aumentado bastante… (lo que obviamente nos hace muy felices!)... pero también un poco presionados en cuestión de producción y distribución. Es por esto que en La Insoportable necesitamos tu ayuda; para expandir nuestra planta e implementar el equipo que nos permita aumentar la producción y abrir las puertas a nuevos productos. Todo esto para satisfacer la demanda constante y en aumento, pero también para enfrentar un nuevo reto: la exportación. Fotografías: Alum Gálvez
 
Our goal / Nuestra meta
eng.
The funding of our project consists of MX$500,000; which will be invested as follows: 

esp.
El fondeo de nuestro proyecto consiste en MX$500,000; que serán distribuidos de la siguiente manera: 

 
Presence / Presencia 
eng.
Today, our gin can be found in over 40 restaurants across 8 different States in México; some of which are:
esp.
Actualmente tenemos presencia en más de 40 restaurantes en 8 diferentes Estados de México; algunos de ellos son: 


 
Why support us? / ¿Por qué apoyarnos?
eng.
We strongly believe in the talent every mexican has, and it is our duty to encourage and promote that talent in order to contribute to the growth of the country. This is how we plan to play our part; by becoming a distillery that extols the high quality of mexican crafts, without leaving our origins a side and embracing the traditions behind alcoholic drinks. 
esp.Creemos fielmente en el talento que tenemos todos los mexicanos y es deber de cada uno de nosotros impulsarlo positivamente hacia el desarrollo del país. Esta es nuestra forma de impulsarlo, queremos ser una destilería que ponga en alto la artesanía y calidad nacional, sin dejar de lado nuestros orígenes y la tradición detrás de las bebidas alcohólicas.  Recompensaseng.We can’t put our excitement into words when we think about this crowdfunding as a success; but more than that, our final goal is to bring Armónico from our distillery in Mexico to your table, wherever you are. We promise to make you feel proud as SOON as possible!, but in the meantime we have several rewards waiting for you. Get yours! **Please note that our vouchers are codes exchangeable through an e-commerce platform: Kichink, and once you use your code Kichink will charge you an amount for shipping costs depending on the destination. (For more information about Kichink please visit our FAQ section)**We highly recommend you to take a look at our FAQ section in order to be aware of some important delivery and perk terms.esp.Estamos muy emocionados de tener éxito en ésta campaña crowdfunding; queremos compartir Armónico con el mundo y llevarlo desde nuestra destilería hasta tu mesa estés donde estés! Con tu ayuda podremos lograrlo y vas a ver que te haremos sentir orgulloso, pero mientras tanto... Tenemos varias recompensas especiales que hicimos para ti, desde una tarjeta de agradecimiento, hasta una visita guiada a nuestra destilería una vez que terminemos con la obra. ¡Encuentra la que más te gusta! **Favor de tomar en cuenta que los vouchers son códigos intercambiables a través de la plataforma de e-commerce: Kichink y por lo tanto, la plataforma hace un cargo extra por costos de envío dependiendo del destino. (Para más información acerca de Kichink ve a nuestra sección de FAQ)**Recomendamos altamente checar la sección de FAQ para saber datos importantes acerca de costos, fechas de entrega y otros términos importantes de las recompensas. 1. Thank you card / Tarjeta de agradecimientoeng.Thank you card from all of our team delivered to your home!esp. ¡Una tarjeta de agradecimiento hasta tu casa de parte de todo el equipo!-2. Pin Alambique eng. Our limited edition alambique pin; it represents the first alambique in which this all started… it’s our baby.esp. Pin edición limitada de nuestro alambique; representa el primer alambique, en el que comenzó todo… es nuestro tesoro. -3.  HÜLLET T-shirt / Playera HÜLLETeng. HÜLLET (clothing brand) is supporting Armónico Gin with the launch of a new Armónico t-shirt line... Choose your favorite design! esp. HÜLLET se une para apoyar nuestro crowdfunding con la creación de una nueva línea de playeras Armónico... Elige tu diseño favorito!-4. Cap / Gorraeng. Hat with our mantra in spanish… it means: From everyone harmony shows and grows, when happiness is shared.There are other two designs available... one with Armónico's logo and the other with an alambique design. Choose the one you'd like!esp. Gorra negra con nuestra frase Armónico. También tendremos disponibles otros dos modelos de gorra... uno con el logo de Armónico y el otro con un diseño del alambique... escoge tu favorito!-5. Single Voucher / Cupón de descuentoeng. 100% discount coupon in our star product (Armónico)! You'll be able to exchange this coupon through Kichink once the campaign period is over. **Please note that our reward consist only on the 100% discount coupon; once you exchange your coupon Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. esp. ¡Cupón del 100% de descuento en nuestro producto estrella (Armónico)! Podrás canjear éste cupón a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. **Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste solo en el código del 100% de descuento; una vez que sea canjeado en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.-6. Double discount coupon / Doble cupón de descuentoeng. TWO 100% discount coupons for our liquors/distills! Choose TWO out of an Armónico gin bottle, a limited edition liquor or a limited edition distill! You'll be able to exchange this coupons through Kichink once the campaign period is over. **Please note that our reward consist only on two 100% discount coupons; once you exchange your coupons Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. esp. DOS cupones de 100% de descuento en nuestros licores/destilados… elige entre Armónico Gin, licor edición limitada o destilado edición limitada! Podrás canjear éste cupón a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. **Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste solo en dos códigos del 100% de descuento; una vez que sea canjeado en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.-7. Discount coupon in our special edition box / Cupón caja edición especialeng. 100% discount coupon in our limited edition Armónico box, which includes: Armónico, our alambique pin, 4 botanicals for you to make your own drink and a wooden box designed with our brand. You'll be able to exchange this coupon through Kichink once the campaign period is over. **Please note that our reward consist only on the 100% discount; once you exchange your coupons Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. esp. Cupón de 100% de descuento en nuestra caja edición especial que incluye: Armónico, 4 botánicos para preparar cócteles, pin alambique, caja de madera con nuestra marca. Podrás canjear éste cupón a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. **Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste solo en el código del 100% de descuento; una vez que sea canjeado en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.-8. THREE discount coupons / TRES cupones de descuentoeng. THREE 100% discount coupon for our liquors/distills… choose THREE out of an Armónico gin bottle, a limited edition liquor or a limited edition distill! You'll be able to exchange this coupons through Kichink once the campaign period is over. **Please note that our reward consist only on three 100% discount coupons; once you exchange your coupons Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. esp. TRES cupones de descuento 100% para nuestros licores/destilados… elige entre Armónico Gin, licor edición limitada, destilado edición limitada! Podrás canjear éste cupón a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. **Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste en solo tres códigos del 100% de descuento; una vez que sean canjeados en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.-9. Add it ALL up / Súmalo TODOeng. THREE 100% discount coupons for our liquors/distills, a t-shirt, a cap and a pin… You'll be able to exchange the coupons through Kichink once the campaign period is over. **Please note that our reward consist only on three 100% discount coupons; once you exchange your coupons Kichink will charge an amount for shipping costs separately depending on the destination. esp. TRES cupones de descuento de 100% en nuestros licores/destilados, una playera, una gorra y un pin… Podrás canjear los cupones a través de Kichink una vez que haya terminado el periodo de campaña. **Favor de contemplar que la recompensa consiste en solo tres códigos del 100% de descuento; una vez que sean canjeados en Kichink, la plataforma cargará un costo extra por envío dependiendo del destino.-10. Bundle / Paqueteeng. Visit our distillery in San Juan del Río, Querétaro! You'll get a photoshoot working in our facilities and you'll also get an Armónico gin bottle...**Please note transportation costs are not included. esp. ¡Visita nuestra destilería en San Juan del Río, Querétaro! Tendrás un photoshoot trabajando en nuestras instalaciones y una botella de nuestra ginebra...**Favor de contemplar que los costos de transporte no están incluidos.-10. Bundle 100% Armónico / Paquete 100% Armónicoeng. Visit our distillery in San Juan del Río, Querétaro! Our master distiller will help you make your own distill; you'll get a photoshoot working in our facilities and you'll take home a distilling kit as well as THREE 100% discount coupons.**Please note transportation costs are not included. esp. ¡Visita nuestra destilería en San Juan del Río, Querétaro! Nuestro maestro destilador te ayudará a hacer tu propio destilado; tendrás un photoshoot trabajando en las instalaciones y te llevarás a casa un kit para destilar y TRES cupones del 100% de descuento. **Favor de contemplar que los costos de transporte no están incluidos.-

story:
Kaixin Cooking was founded in Shanghai in September 2018. Our mission is to help people cook and eat healthy Chinese food.

When eating healthy, how many of us have stood at the fridge at a loss for what to eat? That struggle is even more acute in China, where most “health food” only caters to a Western palate.

 

Healthy Chinese food is tasty, nutritious, and varied. We plan to use this food to help people inside and outside of China establish a healthier lifestyle. Kaixin Cooking will directly provide food and  educate people to cook their own healthy Chinese meals.

Today, our main business is weekly Chinese cooking classes. We believe cooking unlocks our independence to make healthy choices by understanding what’s in our food.

 

We’re ready to move beyond cooking classes – we want to test and launch a product that can help many more people eat healthy Chinese food.

We plan to test solutions to three healthy eating problems, and then design a single product that serves people's needs the best. Your support will help us to:

  • Develop a long-term venue as our concept kitchen and cooking school in Shanghai
  • Launch a test batch of a healthy Chinese cooking kit and grocery box
  • Create and deliver a test batch of healthy Chinese meal plans

We believe that if people get exposed to our approach to healthy food – if they taste our food for themselves – they’ll love it. And in the process, they’ll change their outlook on healthy food!

 

 

Most people, even in China, rarely see healthy versions of Chinese food. Here in China, people are busy, so cheap, greasy deliver food is a frequent temptation. Sound familiar? We believe reviving tasty and healthy home-cooked Chinese food is a major opportunity.

 

Growing up, most Chinese kids learn to enjoy veggies and whole foods. It’s not because they use apps to track their calories or because they studied lists of foods to avoid. It’s because home-cooked Chinese cuisine has a rich history of well seasoned, balanced, mostly plant-based whole food dishes that highlight the natural good flavor of vegetables.

 

Kaixin Cooking’s project is to take recipes that highlight vegetables, balanced nutrition, natural spices, and lean meat – and update them to use even less oil, sodium, and sugar.

 

 

Healthy eating should make us happy, because it’s nourishing our body, giving us energy, and making us feel good. But healthy eating trends can fall into three traps:

  • Food is BORING when it's bland and repetitive (dry chicken breast and spartan salads) – so instead of forming healthy habits, we end up in binge and cleanse cycles.
  • Listing what we CAN'T eat has become an obsession, to the point that eating itself is a minefield of anxiety rather than a celebration of what’s good for us
  • Many DIET plans market only a narrow selection of food, causing us to be dependent on set products rather than teaching us to identify nutrition and health for ourselves.

 

Our alternative is moderation, balance, and self-reliance. We believe Chinese food can retrain our palates to actually taste and enjoy the natural flavor of whole foods and vegetables.

We also believe in the power of cooking. Cooking empowers us to create our own healthy foods, and to understand what makes up foods we get served. That way, even if we don't cook every day, we can make more informed choices about restaurants and delivery.

 

 

We started Kaixin Cooking with in-person cooking classes and dining – the best way to learn what to eat is to actually make and eat it yourself! Our class customers are our early adopters. We continue to engage this community with recipes, activities, and chances to meet and learn. We're looking to move beyond in-person classes and create more recipes, learning videos, and live streaming. Education helps us build trust and exposure for our brand.

As we grow our community, we want to create products that make it easier to cook and eat. Cooking education will always be our core value, and it’s time to pair that with actual food products that provide the answer to what to eat. We've planned out three categories of products, which are outlined below.

After we produce and sell test batches of each product, we'll listen to customer responses and eventually focus what works best. In the end, it's likely our final product will combine elements of all three of the ideas below. For us the right approach is not to dictate what people might want, but to provide solutions and see the response.

 

 

 

Our classes are about collectively cooking and eating simple-to-execute dishes that are healthy and tasty. We’re not training master chefs; we’re empowering people to cook things they can eat every day. Our best strength may be the community we create around the learning to cook. We’ll test new class and dinner formats and video recipes to provide more learning and community building content for those who want to learn.

 

Cooking a new cuisine comes with many barriers – planning, recipe choice, shopping, leftovers ingredients. We believe there’s room for a Chinese grocery box and custom sauce and spice mix service – receive a week’s worth of groceries, natural sauces, and quality pre-mixed spices, all portioned out, and set to in-person or online cooking instruction provided by Kaixin Cooking. It provides everything needed to get to cooking and eating.

 

Many people are too busy to cook every day of the week, and we still want to provide them our food. We would create set meals based on nutritional needs, and deliver them for lunch and dinner. Operating in China enables cheap delivery as frequently as every day. Even with pre-cooked food, it's important to our values that every item served is cooked from a recipe that we also teach through our public channels. We want everyone to know how to make our food themselves if they can, and how it's made if they buy it.

 

The next period of time for us is invaluable to determine whether we have the right ideas about the kinds of problems our products are solving. We are serious about the need to actually launch and test all three product variations above in small batches. We have partners ready who can assist us on the operational side to get these tests out the door and get quick customer feedback. By the time we are ready to focus on a single product to take to market, we want to be reasonable confident that it's filling a real, demonstrated need.

 

Some day, we want to change the way people think about Chinese food, and we want to change people's relationship to healthy food. To get there, we need your support to launch our mass market product and bring our food to many more people or the first time. Here's how you can help.

 

 

Kaixin Cooking was founded by me, Shiyin Wang. I am a Shanghai-born American chef - that's me in the hoodie. In the summer of 2018, I followed my dream to move back to Shanghai after 27 years in the US. During that sweltering summer, I found healthy eating to be a challenge: local restaurant food was greasy and cheap, but “health food” only catered to a narrow western palate. I craved the kinds of dishes I learned to cook with my family, and wanted to update those with modern healthy principles I learned while cooking in California and New York.

 

We want to finish with a note about our home in Shanghai. If you're outside of China, you may not be able to attend our classes, but you can still eat our food. We want anyone anywhere to be able to learn from us, which is why we have a recipe site and are creating a cookbook.

We created this business in China because it's the best place to develop healthy Chinese food. China is a place where busy schedules and cheap delivery have crowded out healthy food. Amid the incredible change of this country, there is a healthy food revolution yet to come. People in cities like Shanghai are becoming increasingly aware of nutrition, fitness, and health, but today there's very few healthy options that suite the local palate. We want to do our part to serve that need here in China, because of the massive scale of impact it can have on so many people!

story:
Why a cookbook?

Writing a cookbook has been my dream for the past 15 years. This cookbook will ensure the food I grew up with as a child and the recipes I discovered travelling the world in the past 10 years will be one day passed on to my kids. Recipes will focus on fresh, great quality ingredients.


Enjoy food with your loved ones

Looking back, I consider myself really fortunate. I grew up in a family that always considered food and eating together around the table very important. 
From culinary school in a town near Venice to testing recipes all over the world (Australia, USA, France, Spain, Seychelles Islands, just to name a few), my dream has remained the same since: to use food to connect people around the table. With your support as well as my fiancè, family and friends' help, we can make this little (big?) dream become a reality.


A book to be used over and over again

This book is going to be absolutely gorgeous, well, at least that would be the plan. I don’t want it to sit on your shelf, though. I want you to bring it into the kitchen, splatter it with olive oil, flour, spices and tomato sauce, basically a pizza!
Use it to cook simple meals for your friends and family. Sit together, chat, enjoy and spend some time in good company, tasting some nice food and good wine. I hope it inspires you to gather the people you love around your table.

 

The challenge

My biggest challenge will be self publishing the book once production is complete. Finding a cost effective way to print a small run of these books and maintain quality is my goal. I have been shopping around different printers, and printing options, and I'm well on my way to choosing the best option for this project.

I recently started writing down my recipes and I'm collecting them on my newborn blog, http://en.kung-food.it/
Why  did I name it Kung-Food? Because cooking is an art. Just not a martial one.

Thank you in advance for your support and remember, even in case this project won't make it, to eat healthy and to spend time (around a table or not) with the people you love.
story_txt: Why a cookbook?Writing a cookbook has been my dream for the past 15 years. This cookbook will ensure the food I grew up with as a child and the recipes I discovered travelling the world in the past 10 years will be one day passed on to my kids. Recipes will focus on fresh, great quality ingredients. Enjoy food with your loved onesLooking back, I consider myself really fortunate. I grew up in a family that always considered food and eating together around the table very important. From culinary school in a town near Venice to testing recipes all over the world (Australia, USA, France, Spain, Seychelles Islands, just to name a few), my dream has remained the same since: to use food to connect people around the table. With your support as well as my fiancè, family and friends' help, we can make this little (big?) dream become a reality.A book to be used over and over againThis book is going to be absolutely gorgeous, well, at least that would be the plan. I don’t want it to sit on your shelf, though. I want you to bring it into the kitchen, splatter it with olive oil, flour, spices and tomato sauce, basically a pizza!Use it to cook simple meals for your friends and family. Sit together, chat, enjoy and spend some time in good company, tasting some nice food and good wine. I hope it inspires you to gather the people you love around your table. The challengeMy biggest challenge will be self publishing the book once production is complete. Finding a cost effective way to print a small run of these books and maintain quality is my goal. I have been shopping around different printers, and printing options, and I'm well on my way to choosing the best option for this project.I recently started writing down my recipes and I'm collecting them on my newborn blog, http://en.kung-food.it/Why  did I name it Kung-Food? Because cooking is an art. Just not a martial one.Thank you in advance for your support and remember, even in case this project won't make it, to eat healthy and to spend time (around a table or not) with the people you love.

story:
Growing Gardens Grows Gardeners

Since its founding in 1998 as a host to just one community garden site to its role today at the center of Boulder’s sustainable urban agriculture movement, the nonprofit Growing Gardens has enabled thousands of Boulder County citizens’ efforts to be capable, self-reliant urban gardeners. Its 11 community garden sites now host 495 garden plots;  -. programs like Cultiva Youth Project (ages 12 – 19), the Children’s Peace Garden (ages 3 – 10), and Horticultural Therapy (Seniors and people with disabilities) unite diverse members of the Boulder community in urban garden projects.


The Orchard Grows Fruit Growers

After careful planning, Growing Gardens is raising money to plant a five-acre, organic fruit tree orchard. The orchard will contain nearly 200 fruit trees, including apple, pear, plum, peach, cherry and apricot and well as raspberry bushes and strawberry plants...all in the heart of Boulder!

Not many remember today, but there were actually commercial orchards and berry patches on the property surrounding Growing Gardens as late as the 1940’s.

As with all Growing Gardens programs, education is built into the orchard, so Boulder citizens can successfully add fruits to their home gardens.  And, with primarily dwarf tree varieties, the orchard becomes an interactive garden so children and folks in wheelchairs can reach the fruit on trees.

For more info on the orchard educational programs please view our website: http://www.growinggardens.org/orchard-project

We‘re thrilled to see the land go full circle, as Growing Gardens brings fruit agriculture back to the Boulder community.

You can help us to leave this legacy for future generations by purchasing part of the orchard! 


What We Need & What You Get

The project is widely supported throughout Boulder, and we have already raised over $200,000 to fund the two main phases of our orchard project. But we still need to raise additional funds in order to purchase the fruit trees this fall. That’s where you come in!

When you invest in the Growing Gardens orchard, you’re supporting a valuable and innovative project to benefit the community, and you’ll also receive a gift in return, depending on the amount that you donate.

See our awesome perks to the right. If you live outside of Boulder and you give more than $350, we will ship you your fruit tree!

We’re confident we can reach our goal with your help! Just in case we don’t reach our goal of $6,700, we can still purchase trees with the funds raised. We need to raise an overall total of $25,000 (through individual investments and sponsorships) so if we raise more than $6,700, that gets us even closer to our goal! No matter what happens in our IndieGoGo campaign, your investment buys trees for the orchard!


Orchard Work So Far

We’ve completed all project planning, including design and engineering, construction documents, budget, and bids from contractors to complete the irrigation system installation. The fence around the five-acre site is installed and irrigation for the berry patch is complete.

The orchard Ground-breaking and Berry Patch Planting was held on May 13th. Backers of the orchard watched our progress in real time, as we took advantage of the spring weather to further develop our orchard site. Volunteers from the community came out to plant thousands of berry plants in the orchard. With their help, this Indiegogo campaign was launched that evening with bang!

Thank you for helping to complete our orchard project! The orchard is only possible with support from passionate and caring people in the community like you.


Other Ways You Can Help 

Sharing is caring! You can help the orchard even more if you share our link above on Facebook, Twitter and tell your friends about this cool project.

It’s easy to share our campaign page…just click on the social media icons below or at the top of this page.

Thank you for helping to create the Growing Gardens orchard!

story:
About Me

Hello! My name is Maria Bechtell and I am the founder and operator of Make It Pop, Co.  I created this business as a means to indulge in my passion of design, hosting and wowing party guests as well as to build a solid foundation for my annual charity event/s.

This winter, I threw an event to support the Marine Corps Toys for Tots Foundation where my guests and I successfully filled four massive donation drop boxes with toys to send back to the organization. This coming Spring I plan on holding another event in order to collect desperately needed items for The Women's Center & Shelter of Greater Pittsburgh. 

 

Let's Break it down-

Here's the deal. While I vow to hold at least one charitable event annually, I would love to build this company as a means for providing for my family as well. Trust me when I say I have been and will continue to put in the work. 

I will strive to treat each celebration as if it were for someone in my own family. It will be special. It will be unique. It will be crafted for YOU.

During these insane times I vow to be safe, abundantly clean, wear a mask during any in person interactions and be very flexible with rescheduling and cancellations. 

 

What I need to Succeed and How I Hope to Achieve it

While I now have the products needed to conduct the parties I have on the menu, I would like to attempt to raise funds to counter some of those purchases (especially for the financial investment I made in the Toy for Tots Drive.  However- I'm not asking for it, I'm doing what I can to earn it. 

I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your time in reading this, your consideration and your support. Please be safe and God Bless you all.

story:
Welcome to Chez Dine !  

Founded by Hamilton native Jen Stokes, Chez Dine has evolved from a one woman show to a growing team of 3 and a community of 1000 diners & 65 hosts. A passionate member of McMaster's Forge Incubator program, Chez Dine is one of the fastest growing start-ups in the city!  

Chez Dine allows Hosts to connect with guests seeking a unique experience - outside of that normally found in a restaurant.

Our quickly expanding group of hosts include chefs, foodies and health nuts, eager to serve up the most Instagram worthy dish possible! Our platform aims to connect people who love to cook good food with people who love to consume good food. Giving consumers a much needed new option in their dining portfolio! 

As a guest you can order two loafs of freshly baked banana bread from the Mrs. Miller down the street or you can book Chef Heather to come to your home on Friday night to cook dinner for you and your new boyfriend's parents!  Or you can become a host and offer your art and talent to the world and invite others into your home ! 

Chez Dine aims to connect people over food - giving them a 'Taste of Togetherness'

In the past twelve months Chez Dines efforts have been focused on fine-tuning the platform design, building a market base and testing the market response to our business model. We have focused our efforts on building a user base and connecting our hosts with guests and ensuring fantastic experiences for our Hosts & Guests. 

Business is booming! BUT, we need your help to sustain our growth and be able to bring our unique experiences to more Diners around Canada! 

YOU GET WHAT YOU GIVE funds will be allocated towards web development costs and launching our sales team cross country to take Chez Dine beyond Hamilton's boarders! 

What We Need & What You Get

To break it down for you;

We need funds to feed our team while we continue to bust our a** growing the platform. We think this is a great idea because EVERYONE that has dined with us has LOVED it. Don't believe us? Check out the perk "Cook for You' and have a Chez Dine Host come to your house and see for yourself! 

Our community has rallied behind us (THANK YOU HAMILTON!) and contributed some amazing perks, from hotel stays, Ti-cats tickets and yoga passes! They are all available for half the price of the original value (because we love our supporters). Pick what's right for you or declare yourself a Friend of the Founder and support Chez Dine's ultimate goal of connecting people over the power of a meal!  

The Impact

We are so thankful of our fortunate place in todays world, but realize not everyone is so lucky. We want to give back by launching a program temporarily dubbed "Eat to Drink". A portion of the profit from every plate served will be donated to providing clean water in third world countries. 

Risks & Challenges

Our number one risk is competition in the marketplace, we are not the first company to strive for uniques dining experiences and we will not be the last. What differentiates Chez Dine is it's community centred  approach and connection to the Diner. Our biggest challenge is our acceleration of growth. We have the ideas, platform and user-base. Now we need that extra boost to allow us to scale the company nationally! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Still unsure? Become a Chez Dine Host or Guest! Check-out ChezDine.com to learn more and see what's new! Be sure to follow us @chezdine for continued updates. We sure hope you join our community ! We welcome you always in 'A Taste of Togetherness'

story:
You know how it is. If you’re looking for energy bars, you’re either going to see products with a small-lettered large ingredient list that you can’t quite read or understand… or those natural bars that are everything free:

Gluten-free, lactose-free, GMO-free, preservatives-free, you know, the works - which are also flavor-free!

 

 


 

Well, since we’re honest, down-to-earth people who simply love healthy but flavorful good, we’ve created the Munkee Bar, a truly delicious raw energy bar that is made with natural ingredients that you know and can pronounce. And to make the story short, we’re simply presenting as junk-free (free from what you don’t need, and filled with what’s good for you).

 

 

Good food is food that’s good for you. It doesn’t need to be more complicated than that, which is why our Apple Cinnamon Munkee Bar is made with simply delightful natural ingredients, and blended to the aromatic perfection that you’re looking for.

 

Healthy food doesn’t have to be boring. That’s why our Raspberry Lemonade Munkee Bar is prepared with an exciting variety of ingredients that will smoothly seduce your palate while boosting your stamina.

 

We’re nuts about nuts. What’s not to like about them, right? Our Coconut Brownie Munkee Bar is made with premium nuts and raw cacao powder to make you feel energized and keep the nut-loving side of you happy.

 

Stay crispy and sharp with our Piña Colada Munkee Bar, made with a powerful mix of superfoods in a yummy recipe that will keep you fine-tuned to fully enjoy and make the most of your days.

 

In those busy days in which you feel you need a special kick of strength in a healthy way that keeps you balanced, and which feels really good, having a Munkee Bar on the go is the easiest and most rewarding way of eating a quick yet efficient nutritional blast of energizing superfood flavors that will make you feel like no day is too demanding.

 

 

Munkee Bars are sweetened with monk fruit, a natural sweetener and its extract is up to 300 times sweeter than sugar. It is referred to as monk fruit because it was said to have first been used by monks in China in the 13th century due to its medicinal properties. The ingredients used in our bars are sourced from the farmers, fresh and vegan friendly.
 

 

We believe that honesty is the best policy, which is why the Munkee Bar is fully transparent. As we say, it’s a raw energy bar with natural ingredients and nothing to hide. We have created it based on our personal experience, after getting sick (literally) of eating processed foods, and finding in our kitchen our love for making good, honest and healthy food that you can enjoy. The recipes that soon became the Munkee Bar have helped us to feel strong and healthy, and overcome every digestive problem that eating bad was bringing us.
 

 

And now we want to share the Munkee Bars with you, offering you an energy-boosting snack that treats you right.

 

 

 

 

We’re seeking to raise funds to purchase more equipment, the best ingredients and the most suitable packages to keep our Munkee Bars as fresh and crunchy as you’ll want them.


 

As a family-based business with a home-made touch, we source the highest quality ingredients, we manufacture the Munkee Bars ourselves, and we keep on working to bring an ever-growing offer of all-natural junk-free raw energy bars that make you feel energized and satisfied, bringing you the kind of energy you want to attract, enjoy and share with others.

 

We’re now inviting you to support the Munkee Bar project and secure your early and very specially-priced access to these very fine energy bars, by choosing one of the great rewards that we have on offer.

 

 

We also invite you to share this campaign on social media, as well as with your friends and family members who may also want to enjoy the sweetly stamina-replenishing powers of the Munkee Bars.

 

 

 

On behalf of the Munkee crew, thank you for your support, and we look forward to be soon shipping our first Munkee Bars to you.

story:
Update: We were just reviewed by the biggest and best jerky site on the planet! Check it out! 

"If these samples from Brothers Artisanal Jerky say anything, it's that the company is certainly going to be a big hit."

Hi. My name is Phil, and we're making the best-tasting, healthy, uniquely-flavored jerky on the planet.

I've spent the past decade of my existence starting and running tech companies. I'm a big foodie and I love to cook - a trait I share with my older brother, Pierre. Long story short, a while back we stumbled on to an old family recipe for beef jerky. Super old. Civil-War-parchment-paper old. So we made some. Then we made some more. After years of tinkering, we got pretty good at it. We consulted experts in meat, farming, herbalism, chemistry, gastronomy, nutrition, and everything else under the sun. What we ended up with is the best-tasting, healthy, uniquely-flavored jerky on the planet. Science! 

 

We scour the earth for the best ingredients, using time-honored cooking methods that focus on health and flavor. Then we ship it fresh to your door. Thanks for spending some time with us. We're glad you're here.
 


We infuse iconic international and regional dishes into organic, pure, farm-raised meat. Everything authentic, everything local, ingredients shipped to us overnight if necessary. We create, taste, test, repeat, and perfect. We're always working. All we care about is infusing flavors into our healthy, portable, mind-bendingly delicious jerky. You'll be able to taste the difference. This isn't jerky. It's fuel for your body and brain. This is Brothers.
 


Some notes about our product:

  • We work exclusively with Grass-Fed/Finished Beef, Organic Turkeys, and Heritage Pork. They come at a premium, but health/treatment of the animals is important to us, as it relates to what you're putting in your bodies.
     
  • We use only the purest ingredients available. We don't add extra preservatives or chemicals to enhance color, flavor, texture, or shelf-life. We don't need to. The other brands can own that mantle.
     
  • For thousands of years, human civilizations have cured, dried, and salted meat. Jerky was paleo before paleo was cool. Crossfit?Spinning? Triathlons? Yoga Class? We've got your clean energy needs covered. It's portable, high in nutrition, and can travel long distances without spoiling. It's the ultimate brain and body fuel.
     
  • Our jerky is better for you as a snack or mini-meal-replacement than almost any other food option on the market. It's also better-tasting. We feed our kids this stuff. We'll feed your kids this stuff. We don't take that responsibility lightly.

 


1) First, we source the meat or substrate (if/when we expand into vegan options) from local farms. We abide by the "all local, all the time" mantra. We travel and do a tremendous amount of diligence on said farms prior to engaging in a relationship with our provider. We apply Michelin Star Restaurant-level standards of sourcing.

2) We use Japanese Steel to butcher the meat. We like knives. We're open to using German Steel but at the moment our preference is Japanese. It's sharper, and doesn't micro-bruise the meat. You probably don't care about all of this, so we'll move on. 

3) We bathe the meats in a variety of proprietary baths that we've perfected over the years. All the ingredients that go into our marinades are hand-picked, much like our meat. Some spices and sauces/solutions are quite "difficult" to get, but we've spent a lot of time figuring it out. Think small cargo planes, jungles, conflicts, and weird bugs trying to eat us alive type of stuff. Pierre has had Malaria 6 times. 

4) We marinate the meat in controlled environments, maintaining optimal levels of temperature and air quality for 3-5 days, depending on the product. We rotate and massage the mixture as needed according to oxygenation and surface-area penetration requirements. 

5) We "cook" the meat for 6-10 hours at 145° - 165°, depending on the product. We use Excalibur Dehydrators exclusively at the moment, because we find them best in class. Some products will then go on to one last stage of finishing, or rest, before vacuum-seal packaging. It's all about the flavor. 

6) We send it to your doorstep or office, as quickly as is humanly possible according to the laws of physics.
 


We believe in transparency - as fellow humans, as a company, and as a brand. Our goal is to make Brothers your go-to destination for all things jerky. In doing so, we'll commit to charging you fair and honest prices for our product. We buy ultra-premium ingredients for your jerky. As we obtain discounts and specials from our farmers and spice/ingredient masters, we'll pass them on to you:


The "Hook, Line, & Sinker" - Buy the stuff, try the stuff, get hooked. Then ask us for some more later. Get two (2), 2oz pouches of our custom handmade Jerky. Choose from our Original No5™, Carolina Dip, Korean BBQ, Tom Kha Thai, or Ginger Dumpling.
 


The "But I'm Vegan" Hi! Phil, here. I'm sorry to hear that. But I respect it. I'll personally send you a nifty Brothers logo t-shirt. If you know me, you know I'm all about the swag and soft, luxurious cotton. Plus our logo is hot fire (the foxes). You'll definitely be the coolest kid on the block when you wear it. Fire when ready, cadet. I've got your herbavorious back 100%.
 


Jerky 8-Pack ($100): The "Commuter" - Your life is crazy. You work hard. You want a snack that won't weigh you down or put weird stuff in your body. Something that will tickle your brain and tastebuds. You get a month's supply of our jerky, in the flavors of your choosing. Eight (8) 2oz packs of deliciousness, to be enjoyed at your discretion. Mix and match from our Original No5™, Carolina Dip, Korean BBQ, Tom Kha Thai, or Ginger Dumpling.
 


Jerky 10-Pack ($125): The "Family First" - We've learned that kids between the ages of 2-18 end up stealing a lot of the jerky we ship. For swim/soccer practice, for after-school snacks, for a treat. This will take care of everyone for about a month. Sharing is caring. Mix and match ten (10) 2oz packs from our Original No5™, Carolina Dip, Korean BBQ, Tom Kha Thai, or Ginger Dumpling.
 


Jerky 12-Pack ($150): The "Late-Night Snacker" - The day's over. You don't have to answer any more emails or texts. Time for a bit of netflix/wine/wind down. Can the ice cream and popcorn. Switch it up. Be kind to your body while still consuming deliciousness. Mix and match twelve (12) 2oz packs from our Original No5™, Carolina Dip, Korean BBQ, Tom Kha Thai, or Ginger Dumpling.
 


Jerky 16-Pack ($200): The "Gym Rat" - Whether it's on a Peloton, at the gym, SoulCycle, Barre, Yoga, or all of the above - this stuff is good for you and hits the spot for a boost of energy pre/post-workout. Take it on a hike. Feed your brain. Mix and match sixteen (16) packs from our Original No5™, Carolina Dip, Korean BBQ, Tom Kha Thai, or Ginger Dumpling.

-----------
 


"The Office" ($400) - Jerky 40-Pack - Be kind to your team - fuel them with happy brain, happy body food. Snacks and meal replacement are expensive, and tough to agree upon - except when it comes to Brothers. Treat your crew and never look back. Best. Boss. Ever. Forty (40) 2oz packs means your team of 10 can have a couple a week. Mix and match from our Original No5™, Carolina Dip, Korean BBQ, Tom Kha Thai, or Ginger Dumpling.

-----------

SPECIAL EVENTS/REWARDS:
 


Party: "The Master Class" ($1000) - Invite 6-8 of your closest friends and colleagues and The Brothers will come to you to teach you what jerky making is all about. We'll leave you as experts in the art, and risk putting ourselves out of business. We'll bring the supplies, you bring the adult beverages. This will be the most fun you've had in ages. We guarantee it.


Party: The BBQ ($5000) - Want the full Brothers experience? Receive a full year subscription to Brothers and a BBQ bash with 10 of your closest friends at your house. We'll teach you a quick class on how to make mouth-watering jerky in your home. Our team will fly out to you (continental U.S.), bring the food, and give you and 10 friends one hell of a good time.
 


By redeeming one of our rewards you're not locked into an ongoing monthly subscription. After you receive your shipment, you can become a monthly Brothers member if you'd like.

Our intent is to make you happy, healthy, and sated. If we do so, and consistently surprise you with quality and taste, we'll be able to keep building a company of which we are all proud. 
 


2oz doesn't sound like much. But when it comes to power food - great things come in small packages. If it's the right stuff, 2oz is all you need. Believe it or not, most jerky snack bags are 1-2oz. A standard serving suggestion is 1oz. The bag of chips that you usually grab in the afternoon - that we both know doesn't fill you up - is around 3oz of pure garbage. And there's a reason why it doesn't fill you up. It doesn't have any protein - which is the reason why it contributes more to your waistline than to your mind or muscles. Jerky also doesn't raise your level of insulin, a hormone that signals your body to store fat. 

2oz of Brothers is the perfect snack or mini-meal replacement. Its mouthwatering flavors will get you in the door and its protein-rich, organic, farm-raised meat will seal the deal.

We find that one package of Brothers sates our appetite under most circumstances. If we're super hungry, we'll open a second pouch and eat about half of it. To boot, our jerky is compliant with most major diets in today's market. 
 


Jeremy Levine: Jeremy is the CEO of Draft, Inc. and an active angel investor hailing from New York City. Draft sold to PaddyPower in 2017. An avid sports fan, Jeremy also is a big proponent of the meats. He's been a jerky connoisseur for as long as he can remember, and actively advises Brothers in all things branding/operations. His favorite flavor is Carolina Dip Turkey.

Tarik Trotter: Better known as Black Thought, Tarik is an American rapper and the lead MC of the Philadelphia-based hip hop group The Roots, as well as an occasional actor. Black Thought, who co-founded The Roots with drummer Questlove (Ahmir Thompson), is widely lauded for his live performance skills, continuous polysyllabic rhyme schemes, complex lyricism, double entendres, and politically aware lyrics. Tarik advises Brothers on marketing and creative. His favorite flavor is the Original No5™ Turkey.

Pierre Beauregard, Chief Alchemist: Pierre is a pedant. He is also the chef de cuisine and main jerkologist at Brothers. He's a self-taught cook who lives in Bethesda, Maryland with his wife and two kids. Pierre is always tinkering, and encourages everyone to reach out to him at alchemy@brothersartisanal.com with questions, complaints, or flavor suggestions. His favorite flavor is the Tom Kha Thai Turkey, one of his earliest creations.

Greg Gomer: Greg is a Boston-based entrepreneur. He is currently a cofounder of real estate tech company, HqO, and a previous cofounder of BostInno & AmericanInno (acquired in 2012 by Advance Publications). Greg is a huge jerky proponent and general carnivore. He often can be found perusing the goods at your local butchery. Greg advises Brothers on product, pricing, and product fulfillment. His favorite flavor is The Original No5™ Beef. 

Ryan Light: Ryan is our native Texan, a man who knows far too much about beef and tacos alike. He is the CEO of Pistol Lake, a LA-based clothing company. Ryan advises brothers in all things creative and marketing. He is also the funniest among all of us. Ryan's favorite flavor is the Korean BBQ Beef.

Philip Beauregard, CEO/Herder of Cats: Phil is the original "brother." With a background in applied math and running venture-backed tech companies, one would think he has no idea what makes good jerky. One would be wrong. Armed only with a small industrial dehydrator and an eye-of-round, he built Brothers brick-by-brick to what it is today. He enjoys all things culinary, and can mix a mean Margarita. Phil's favorite flavor is the Ginger Dumpling, although he feels like that's almost like asking him to choose a favorite child.

Mike Salguero: Mike is the founder and CEO of ButcherBox, the fastest growing meat company in the biz. ButcherBox sources and ships the best local meat products to your door. Mike is a husband, a father, and a crossfit/healthy diet enthusiast who hails from South America and lives in Boston. He advises Brothers in sourcing and operations. Mike's favorite flavor is the Original No5™ Beef. 
 


CORPORATE CLIENTS

It turns out that we're building quite the set of corporate customers. Delicious jerky in the workplace is a thing apparently, which we find super cool. Who doesn't like clean energy delivered via a delicious snack food? We sure do. Here are some of our corporate/startup customers so far. Sign up for an "Office Package" or even one of our larger personal rewards if it suits your fancy. Best. Boss. Ever.
story_txt:
Update: We were just reviewed by the biggest and best jerky site on the planet! Check it out! "If these samples from Brothers Artisanal Jerky say anything, it's that the company is certainly going to be a big hit."Hi. My name is Phil, and we're making the best-tasting, healthy, uniquely-flavored jerky on the planet.I've spent the past decade of my existence starting and running tech companies. I'm a big foodie and I love to cook - a trait I share with my older brother, Pierre. Long story short, a while back we stumbled on to an old family recipe for beef jerky. Super old. Civil-War-parchment-paper old. So we made some. Then we made some more. After years of tinkering, we got pretty good at it. We consulted experts in meat, farming, herbalism, chemistry, gastronomy, nutrition, and everything else under the sun. What we ended up with is the best-tasting, healthy, uniquely-flavored jerky on the planet. Science!  We scour the earth for the best ingredients, using time-honored cooking methods that focus on health and flavor. Then we ship it fresh to your door. Thanks for spending some time with us. We're glad you're here. 
We infuse iconic international and regional dishes into organic, pure, farm-raised meat. Everything authentic, everything local, ingredients shipped to us overnight if necessary. We create, taste, test, repeat, and perfect. We're always working. All we care about is infusing flavors into our healthy, portable, mind-bendingly delicious jerky. You'll be able to taste the difference. This isn't jerky. It's fuel for your body and brain. This is Brothers. Carolina Dip Turkey, Tom Kha Thai Turkey, & Pistachio Lemon Schwarma Some notes about our product:
We work exclusively with Grass-Fed/Finished Beef, Organic Turkeys, and Heritage Pork. They come at a premium, but health/treatment of the animals is important to us, as it relates to what you're putting in your bodies. 

We use only the purest ingredients available. We don't add extra preservatives or chemicals to enhance color, flavor, texture, or shelf-life. We don't need to. The other brands can own that mantle. 
For thousands of years, human civilizations have cured, dried, and salted meat. Jerky was paleo before paleo was cool. Crossfit?Spinning? Triathlons? Yoga Class? We've got your clean energy needs covered. It's portable, high in nutrition, and can travel long distances without spoiling. It's the ultimate brain and body fuel. 

Our jerky is better for you as a snack or mini-meal-replacement than almost any other food option on the market. It's also better-tasting. We feed our kids this stuff. We'll feed your kids this stuff. We don't take that responsibility lightly.
 1) First, we source the meat or substrate (if/when we expand into vegan options) from local farms. We abide by the "all local, all the time" mantra. We travel and do a tremendous amount of diligence on said farms prior to engaging in a relationship with our provider. We apply Michelin Star Restaurant-level standards of sourcing.2) We use Japanese Steel to butcher the meat. We like knives. We're open to using German Steel but at the moment our preference is Japanese. It's sharper, and doesn't micro-bruise the meat. You probably don't care about all of this, so we'll move on. 3) We bathe the meats in a variety of proprietary baths that we've perfected over the years. All the ingredients that go into our marinades are hand-picked, much like our meat. Some spices and sauces/solutions are quite "difficult" to get, but we've spent a lot of time figuring it out. Think small cargo planes, jungles, conflicts, and weird bugs trying to eat us alive type of stuff. Pierre has had Malaria 6 times. 4) We marinate the meat in controlled environments, maintaining optimal levels of temperature and air quality for 3-5 days, depending on the product. We rotate and massage the mixture as needed according to oxygenation and surface-area penetration requirements. 5) We "cook" the meat for 6-10 hours at 145° - 165°, depending on the product. We use Excalibur Dehydrators exclusively at the moment, because we find them best in class. Some products will then go on to one last stage of finishing, or rest, before vacuum-seal packaging. It's all about the flavor. 6) We send it to your doorstep or office, as quickly as is humanly possible according to the laws of physics. Tom Kha Thai Turkey We believe in transparency - as fellow humans, as a company, and as a brand. Our goal is to make Brothers your go-to destination for all things jerky. In doing so, we'll commit to charging you fair and honest prices for our product. We buy ultra-premium ingredients for your jerky. story:
Summary

It's now common knowledge grocery shopping is a high risk activity in this PANDEMIC...especially for Seniors.

We are fixing that...especially for Seniors!

My Mobile Grocer brings the Grocery Shopping Experience in a safe, convenient method to the curbside of your home. 

We all remember when the ice cream truck went down our neighborhood street...

Imagine Now - a new grocery shopping experience at your driveway.  We are NOT replacing your grocery store, but rather bringing to your neighborhood items for today.  Look at the fresh cut meats, squeeze the produce and fresh breads, search fine wines and cheeses, and purchase great edible treats.  In a safe 'outdoor' environment, the My Mobile Grocer team is your Grocery Concierge' - a meal planner and food boutique on wheels! 

Look who benefits:

Those Most Vulnerable -  Seniors and those with underlying health conditions.  Enjoy a reduced health risk in these trying times of grocery shopping, which is a essential for all of us - TO BUY FOOD YOU NEED TO SURVIVE.

The Restaurant Food Partners - who took a dramatic hit in their business, we now have an additional channel to sell their goods;

Recently Unemployed Hospitality Pros - they will be our truck partners!

With funding - we can have ten (10) My Mobile Grocer trucks in ten (10) neighborhoods in 30-days.  And each My Mobile Grocer truck is projecting $500,000 in annual revenue.

A new normal is everywhere including the grocery store.

Groceries are very important topic for people - especially Seniors - and acquiring them safely is even a hotter topic, read these stories below:

https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/... 
https://www.forksoverknives.com/wellness/tips-s...

https://www.miamiherald.com/news/coronavirus/ar... 
https://amp.miamiherald.com/news/coronavirus/ar... 

The Beneficiary of this raise - Mobile Grocers of America, a Florida LLC.

Use of funds will be to:

1 - Acquire ten (10) vehicles - 22-Ft specially retro-fitted former UPS/FedEx trucks for the greater Tampa Bay region;

Note:  Our 3-year strategy is to have 1,000 My Mobile Grocer trucks in communities throughout the U.S. where there are high concentrations of Senior populations.


2 - Open first Regional Distribution Center - each morning the My Mobile Grocer fleet fills their trucks with the items for the day, all coordinated out of our centrally located Distribution Center;

3 - Initial stocking of the Truck fleet - with high quality goods including: fresh cut meats, produce, dry goods, specialty breads, wine, cheeses and other delicious edibles - "All fresh and never frozen, except ice cream!"

4 - Digital, Social and Print marketing - targeting the neighborhoods the My Mobile Grocer fleet reaches, starting with retirement and Senior Living Communities and those at high risk;

5 - Professional services and legal fees -  includes Utility Patent and trademarks;

HERE'S WHAT THEY ARE SAYING:

"I founded Mobile Grocers of America because of my own safety concerns in the grocery store during this PANDEMIC."  Maureen D, age 60, Leesburg

"My granddaughter told me about My Mobile Grocer, what a great solution for family - how soon can you come to my neighborhood?" Anonymous, age 92 Tampa

"As a care-giver for my 90-year old mother, I love this idea that she can get her favorite menu items at the safety of her driveway without the health risk of a crowded grocery store."  Bob S, age 69

"My mother is a cancer survivor and the quality foods are important, I am relieved she can now purchase them without having to go to a grocery store during these uncertain times. Grocery shopping in our driveway, and save time while avoiding health risks is an answer to prayer."  Melisa J, Age 49 Spring Hill

Please contribute now to enhance the safety of your loved ones' grocery shopping experience - ESPECIALLY SENIORS.
