story:
The Alkyhaul is a sensor that sits on top of a container and measures the ABV of the liquid under it, replacing the need for hydrometers and instead giving you a constant stream of information about how your brew is doing.

The Alkyhaul sits on top of a carboy and replaces the need for an airlock. It uses a filter to prevent contamination and secures directly into a stopper.

After installation onto a carboy, open the Alkyhaul app on your device of choice and it will walk you through connecting to your local WiFi network. Once configured, the Alkyhaul will start sending data to your dashboard. That’s it!

We’ve worked hard this past year to try and design a device that makes sense for homebrewers, and we think you’ll appreciate what we’ve put together for you. All units ship with a filter, a replacement filter, the Alkyhaul 1.0 which contains an alcohol sensor, a temperature sensor, and a humidity sensor.

Prototype Demonstration Part 1

Prototype Demonstration Part 2

 

Hi! Chris Oltyan, CEO of Alkyhaul, and I’m really excited about how close we are to making the Alkyhaul a reality!

When I started homebrewing, I did things in a pretty standard manner, but I quickly started experimenting and trying to up my game. When I decided to start a few batch of cider, I quickly learned that experimentation can be pretty painful. See, I started 5 small batches at a time, all with slightly different recipes, yeasts, and sugars, and it quickly became a nightmare. Doing hydrometer readings for all the bottles was not only time consuming, but I lost so much product! Topping it off with the fact that I only really got two useful readings, and I was left with more questions than answers. I know that people could blow into a tube and know how much alcohol could be in your system, so I figured why not do something like that for homebrew?

I met Wil, the CTO of Alkyhaul, at an event, and when I pitched him the idea and showed him the sensors I wanted to use. He was impressed with how feasible it seemed and how much people seemed to want something like this. So impressed that we started a company and built a prototype unit a few weeks later.

We spent the next year gathering data and being pleasantly surprised with how well the device was working. We know how important accuracy is, so we also started conversations with a local university’s brewery sciences department (What can I say, we live in Colorado) and they were likewise excited about the idea. They agreed to do additional testing for us and also put in a early order for units.

We’ve been working hard these past few months establishing the relationships we need to manufacture the device and we’re finally ready to start making units. We really appreciate your support and if you have any feature requests let us know!

How Does it Work?

  • We are using a set of sensors to collect three points of information, Alcohol, Humidity, and Temperature. With these three values we’re able to determine the ABV with a very high level of accuracy (same or better than a hydrometer in early tests). The alcohol sensor is the same type of sensor that is found in breathalyzer devices.

Is this device battery powered?

  • Not specifically, the device is powered via a USB connection and we provide a plug in unit that lets several Alkyhauls plug into a single power wart. You can use a battery, like that is used to charge a cell phone, to power the unit, but since it runs continually, it will eat up a battery in a few days.

Is the current app what we saw in the video?

  • Yes, and it is leveraging a site called ThingSpeak to do its visualizations. Depending on funding level, we will be providing additional layers of functionality, but at a minimum, we’ll have all the data visualizations online and stored for you.

Have you used this on your own brews?

  • Yes! I’ve hooked this up to mead, beer, and cider ferments that I’ve had going and been very pleased with the results.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have come to Indiegogo for your help and to raise funds to go towards the product launch costs. With such a project there are always risks and challenges that we're going to face on the daily.

On-time delivery is the biggest challenge for any Indiegogo campaign. The delivery estimates we've put together represent our best effort at accounting for part lead times and unanticipated issues. While both founders have been involved in product launches, and we've partnered with established manufacturers, delays are always a possibility.

This is a new patent pending device and no one has been using this technology to measure ABV prior to this campaign. To make sure the device functions to specification, we have partnered with local universities who will validate our studies and provide assurance that the device is working to our exacting standards.

Most importantly, like we have said, we will be completely open and transparent from start to finish. We will ensure everyone is kept well informed and up to date throughout the entire process.
story_txt:
The Alkyhaul is a sensor that sits on top of a container and measures the ABV of the liquid under it, replacing the need for hydrometers and instead giving you a constant stream of information about how your brew is doing.


The Alkyhaul sits on top of a carboy and replaces the need for an airlock. It uses a filter to prevent contamination and secures directly into a stopper.
After installation onto a carboy, open the Alkyhaul app on your device of choice and it will walk you through connecting to your local WiFi network. Once configured, the Alkyhaul will start sending data to your dashboard. That’s it!

We’ve worked hard this past year to try and design a device that makes sense for homebrewers, and we think you’ll appreciate what we’ve put together for you. All units ship with a filter, a replacement filter, the Alkyhaul 1.0 which contains an alcohol sensor, a temperature sensor, and a humidity sensor.
Prototype Demonstration Part 1


Prototype Demonstration Part 2


 




Hi! Chris Oltyan, CEO of Alkyhaul, and I’m really excited about how close we are to making the Alkyhaul a reality!
When I started homebrewing, I did things in a pretty standard manner, but I quickly started experimenting and trying to up my game. When I decided to start a few batch of cider, I quickly learned that experimentation can be pretty painful. See, I started 5 small batches at a time, all with slightly different recipes, yeasts, and sugars, and it quickly became a nightmare. Doing hydrometer readings for all the bottles was not only time consuming, but I lost so much product! Topping it off with the fact that I only really got two useful readings, and I was left with more questions than answers. I know that people could blow into a tube and know how much alcohol could be in your system, so I figured why not do something like that for homebrew?
I met Wil, the CTO of Alkyhaul, at an event, and when I pitched him the idea and showed him the sensors I wanted to use. He was impressed with how feasible it seemed and how much people seemed to want something like this. So impressed that we started a company and built a prototype unit a few weeks later.
We spent the next year gathering data and being pleasantly surprised with how well the device was working. We know how important accuracy is, so we also started conversations with a local university’s brewery sciences department (What can I say, we live in Colorado) and they were likewise excited about the idea. They agreed to do additional testing for us and also put in a early order for units.
We’ve been working hard these past few months establishing the relationships we need to manufacture the device and we’re finally ready to start making units. We really appreciate your support and if you have any feature requests let us know!



How Does it Work?
We are using a set of sensors to collect three points of information, Alcohol, Humidity, and Temperature. With these three values we’re able to determine the ABV with a very high level of accuracy (same or better than a hydrometer in early tests). The alcohol sensor is the same type of sensor that is found in breathalyzer devices.
Is this device battery powered?
Not specifically, the device is powered via a USB connection and we provide a plug in unit that lets several Alkyhauls plug into a single power wart. You can use a battery, like that is used to charge a cell phone, to power the unit, but since it runs continually, it will eat up a battery in a few days.
Is the current app what we saw in the video?
Yes, and it is leveraging a site called ThingSpeak to do its visualizations. Depending on funding level, we will be providing additional layers of functionality, but at a minimum, we’ll have all the data visualizations online and stored for you.
Have you used this on your own brews?
Yes! I’ve hooked this up to mead, beer, and cider ferments that I’ve had going and been very pleased with the results.
 
Risks & Challenges
We have come to Indiegogo for your help and to raise funds to go towards the product launch costs. With such a project there are always risks and challenges that we're going to face on the daily.
On-time delivery is the biggest challenge for any Indiegogo campaign. The delivery estimates we've put together represent our best effort at accounting for part lead times and unanticipated issues. While both founders have been involved in product launches, and we've partnered with established manufacturers, delays are always a possibility.
This is a new patent pending device and no one has been using this technology to measure ABV prior to this campaign. To make sure the device functions to specification, we have partnered with local universities who will validate our studies and provide assurance that the device is working to our exacting standards.
Most importantly, like we have said, we will be completely open and transparent from start to finish. We will ensure everyone is kept well informed and up to date throughout the entire process.

story:
Upgrade your growler!

Growlers are great for bringing people together and enjoying delicious drinks. We hope that Gravity Tap will continue to bring people together in an easier and fun way. You can help us bring this product to market and build a community around amazing drinks!

 

What's needed

When you back us, you will receive some great perks, but before we get into that, here is where the funding is going. We have taken this product as far as we can financially. We have paid tens of thousands of dollars in R&D, Patenting, Industrial Design work, and manufacturing prototyping. The funding will go towards the tooling required to do volume manufacturing and towards the first few runs of production.

 

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

We feel extremely confident in delivering a high quality product that you are going to enjoy! Transparently, this is our first product we are bringing to market, but we have been very intentional with hiring some of the best Industrial Designers and Project Managers to work with our supply chains. To ensure the success of production and delivering this product to you:

  • Gravity Tap has already designed and developed a production-ready prototype.
  • We want to provide the best product possible, and ensure we deliver in a timely manner. Please refer to our timeline above to see when you can expect to receive your Gravity Tap.

We have been working hard to reduce the chances of any production delays. This is always a possibility with bringing a new product to market, however, we are absolutely committed to deliver a high quality product that you will love! If you have additional questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us!

story:
Fellow Coffee Fanatics and Adventurers 

We are Webster and Erin Senn, owners of Compass Coffee Company. Earlier this year after much deliberation we decided that we wanted to embark upon the journey of a lifetime - owning and operating our own specialty coffee shop!

We then ventured to Texas Coffee School in Arlington, Texas to further prepare for the journey. We are excited to share our experience with you through our shop as we serve up knowledge in all things specialty coffee.

At Compass Coffee we provide you with a traveling experience.  We have implemented this by offering a unique cultural journey through our single origin coffees and other specialty selections. Our shop provides the essence of leaving your own city.

We are so grateful for each of you joining us on this adventure. We would not be at this point without you. We appreciate all of your support and cannot wait to travel with you!

Incentives

We are delighted to have the opportunity to give you these amazing perks which brought us great joy as we created each one. We know you will enjoy them as well! 

Here are some perks up for grabs:

  • Handwritten Thank You Card
  • Coffee Voucher
  • Pastry Voucher
  • Compass Coffee Co. Mug
  • A Bag of Coffee
  • A T-shirt
  • Invitation to our Pre-Opening Soiree
  • Exclusive Private Night at The Coffee Shop

 

Expenses

All funds raised with your support will go toward our shop buildout along with our start-up equipment totaling $125,000.

The buildout will total $75,000 and will consist of:

  • Adding a Kitchen
  • Remodeling a bathroom, adding an extra one
  • Putting in a full coffee bar
  • Replacing and adding doors
  • Repainting the building’s interior and exterior
  •  Adding up-to-date lighting

The equipment will total $50,000 and will consist of:

  • An Espresso Machine
  • Grinders
  • A Hot Water Tower
  •  A Water Filtration System
  • Refrigerators
  •  Freezers
  • An Ice Machine
  • An Oven
  •  And more!

All profits made through the fundraiser, regardless of goal being met, will go toward the start-up equipment expenses.

The Impact     

We are providing a truly unique specialty coffee shop for the city of El Dorado where you can

  • Unplug from everyday life
  • Feel like you're on vacation 
  • Rekindle relationships with friends and family in a distraction-free space
  • Experience the highest quality of specialty-grade coffee

When we venture to other cities we always notice the uniqueness of each shop visited. The flavors and environments are what typically stand out the most. We are combining these two elements to provide El Dorado with the highest quality shop.

Risks & Challenges

One will always stand in the face of adversity when starting up his own business. The adversity for us can range from unexpected waiting periods for permits to unforeseen buildout costs or delays to equipment backorders, and so forth.

Our job is to remain calm, embrace those adversities ahead of time and to be flexible. It will work out, just in God’s timing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute right now? Please consider helping by doing the following:

  • Pray! This is a large project that can be stressful at times. Pray for rest, strength, and wisdom throughout this process.
  • Share! Invite your friends to check out the campaign. The more it is shared the more people we reach!
  • Like us on Social Media! This is the best way that we can keep you up-to-date on our progress.

You can find us on Facebook and Instagram @TheCompassCoffeeCo

story:
Short Summary

Several years ago, a small town convenience store went out of business, leaving local residents, especially those without transportation without a place to buy staples like food.  As the building lay dormant and empty,  Matt and his wife dreamed of providing a local market and community hub in the heart of the area in which they live in Plant City Florida. The abandoned building is for sale and Matt and his wife are ready to purchase it and turn it into their dream to better the community.  The building however needs fully restored, Matt who is a local farmer and tradesman and would love to turn this vacant building into a Farmer's Market to not only provide food staples to the community but a place for people to come and enjoy with his locally grown food, a sandwich, a healthy smoothie made from his homegrown crops and berries or a nice cup of coffee. Also onsite in another building will be Matt The Welder's Equipment Repair.

Together,  we can make this happen!  Passionate about locally-sourced ingredients cooking, their mission is to create a neighborhood store that gives back to the community in so many ways. That nurtures connection with the community, the environment, local farmers and makers.

 

The Impact

We are working hard to open the market, but we need your help! To provide the delicious  prepared foods and fresh local produce our community desires, we need the building and equipment to prepare them. The money we raise will go directly to procuring the building,  ovens, mixers, juicers, refrigeration, and shelving, that will allow us to showcase the bounty of small town Plant City!

 We’ve got all levels of contributions and prizes and we appreciate any amount you’re able to help us open our doors!

Your contribution to our campaign will help provide:

a central hub for gathering and connecting with the community

employment for members of the community

a marketplace for local farmers and artisans to share their product without having to ship it far away

healthy delicious foods and household necessities for people that would otherwise need to transportation to find them

the opportunity for money to stay within Hillsborough County and improve our local economy

benefits to our environment by lessening the distance our food travels

 

Risks & Challenges

Our vision is to create a community market in the truest sense. This means that everyone in our community has an opportunity to make this dream a reality. This will help us fund the needed construction and infrastructure to build out the market. If you are interested in putting your money to work in a grass-roots local market, alongside building an asset for our community, we invite you to connect with us and explore the possibilities.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign on social media by clicking on the links above!

story:
Nanyang Soy Salt

I come from a family of artisan sauce makers and we make soy sauce the artisan way. Started in 1959 by my grandfather in Singapore, our methods of brewing soy sauce is a vanishing craft where we brew soy sauce by hand for 9 months under the Sun to produce a bottle of nutritious and tasty soy sauce.

The word "Nanyang" is an old name for Singapore and refers to the Chinese diaspora who came to Singapore in the early days as migrants in search of a better life.

After coming into the business to take over from my parents, I am looking to raise funds to buy new equipment that can help us with the bottling, capping and labeling of the soy sauce, which at the moment is done entirely by hand. This would enable us to increase our production and does not compromise of the taste nor quality of the sauce as it is post-production work after 9 months when the soy sauce is brewed.

What we have discovered is a hidden treasure at the bottom of our clay vats - Naturally crystallized aged soy salt which turns out to be extremely rare and valuable in the gourmet market. Our customer Jason from Hong Kong was the first to ask for it and since then we are planning to create limited edition bottles of it for sale in a premium grinder. It is perfect for steak and it has been rated as better than Himalayan Salt or Deep Sea Salt. Perhaps the most precious salt in the world, each grain of salt has been aged for more than 10 years and its extremely limited and once out, it will take time for nature to replenish it.

Risks and challenges

There are minimal risks involved that we can manage. The right packaging supplier with the right grinder, we have tested 10 different suppliers for packaging and the grinder. 

The challenge is how do we produce more of our stock once we sell out.

story:
Hi Folks, 

My name is Tom, along with my buddy in crime Matt we are trying to change the Energy drink market for the better and WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

 

The Mission!

The amount of waste we create on this planet is SO WRONG!!! We want to change this as soon as possible!

Bringing a new product into this world is very exciting but creating more waste is not! So our mission to use recycled ocean waste for our packaging so we are removing plastic from the ocean & using it to produce our product packaging.

 

What's the Product?

Off Grid is a Dissolvable energy tablet. Made up of sustainably sourced ingredients from the best corners of the world! We have selected the most natural herbal extracts & caffeine to give you a big boost without the side effects of traditional energy drinks.

 

Energy drinks are made up of 80% water, huh? The Raw ingredients of an energy drink are actually a very small amount of what's put in the Can. We thought it would be better to produce the drink in a tablet form, so you get all the good stuff & then just add water to it before use.

Allowing you to save on storage, money and reduce your waste as there 10 tabs in a tube.

Because fitting x10 cans in your bag would just be a waste!

 

How we get it done!

Our Ocean Waste Plastic is mainly collected in and around the Phillipine Sea, the Carribean Sea, and the Indian Ocean. After being collected the plastic is transported to our processing partners in Indonesia, USA and China.

 

Recycle Process:

The Process starts with the collection of ocean plastics. With help from our partners, we initiate clean-up expeditions to collect plastic from the oceans, rivers and beaches. It is then transported to the sorting facilities. The plastic is received in a compressed format, ready to be sorted, washed, rinsed, shredded and made into pellets.

 

What We Need from you!

Where will the funding go? Producing ocean waste recycled materials can really add up in costs as well as sourcing natural ingredients from their origin countries. We would really love your support to help us gather, breakdown and reuse the plastic from the ocean back to Europe mainland to start its life again as our product packaging.

 

What you Get!

- Once production is complete you will be the first to receive the finished product in all its glory as well as badass "GUNNA SAVE THE WORLD" T-shirt.    

 

Your contribution will:

  • Reducing the plastic in the ocean and be a part of helping get it back out!
  • Launching of the first Eco Energy drink brand!
  • Changing further of manufacturing!

 

Risks & Challenges

Please beware with us! Testing of the packaging + manufacturing can take up to 5-6 months so it could take a bit of time to receive the product.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would really appreciate any love via social media you are willing to give to help spread the word!

 

[ We would love you to be a part of this journey with us! ]

story:
An Amazing Story...

Hi this is Gabe, I'm 23 years old from the beautiful country of El Salvador in Central America. I've just decided to make the best decision ever in order to expand my vegan business and also enlarge the vegan community inside my country and to hopefully spread this idea all around Central America.Veganism changed my life drastically in every aspect and since then I knew I had to do something to let everybody know about the benefits of this growing trend. I knew that everybody loves tacos and also that I could convert this idea into a delicious vegan fast food concept and then the concept was born. This campaign is incredibly important for me not just because it will affect my life, but because I truly believe that this will have a huge impact within my community by helping to promote a more healthy way of living and by gradually making a shift inside the fast food industry in my country and beyond.

ME APPEARING LIVE IN A US CHANNEL.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khEM9KQsnCo

 

What We Need & Why

Thank you for your interest in this project! If the campaign´s goal is reached, the funds will be broken down into several sections in order to fulfill the needs of the entire business .These sections are organized from the beginning to the final goal which is marketing the business and growing  influence inside social networks.

The main aspects of the business are the motorcycles which will carry the entire equipment as well as the product. For this purpose I need to purchase small motorcycles to carry carts around the city and a bigger Tuk Tuk for social events and special gatherings.The costs are the following.

MASESA is the dealership I have chosen as their prices are good and their product and warranty are better than the majority of the other competitors. The Tuk Tuk will be placed permanently in a  crowded location inside the city and will also be used for special events. An estimate of $500 will be used to decorate and upgrade the vehicle to load a grill and products within it. It will be enclosed in a wooden and steel frame.

Smaller 100cc motorcycles will travel the city carrying the cart with all its products and ready to prepare tacos on the go. The designated driver will also be the one who prepares the food.The motorcycles will also be  decorated to express the concept of the business.The motorcycles usually cost around $1200 with a 2 year warranty and theft insurance which is a necessary expense. The advantages of a motorcycle compared to a bicycle are countless.They can travel longer distances in a shorter space of time thus creating a better and faster city coverage.The business will start with 2 new motorcycles and eventually as demand grows, more will be purchased.

Some of the expenses will happen immediately, like buying motorcycles and upgrading them to fit the needs of the business but others, like marketing and permits, will gradually be spent based on the necessity of the project.

 

The Impact

The impact will surely be beyond expectations once the project gains momentum and popularity.The purpose will always go towards promoting veganism so we will be constantly adding more vegan products to add variety to to the business, thus creating a greater amount of customers. Eventually people  will realize  that going vegan is synonymous with being cool!

As I previously explained this is not just to ask for money but essentially the opportunity for you to join a movement with a purpose and commitment aimed to persuade an entire country to join the vegan movement and make a change for a better healthier life style. To put a footprint in a country by pioneering a radical fast food vegan concept that will eventually attract every single customer who takes advantage of it.

Other ways you can help.

You can contribute enormously by simply sharing the campaign with others and spreading the word out there! Any help we can receive from you will greatly aid us on the realization of this project.  A simple click can make a huge difference and Indiegogo provides the tools in order to succeed. Profound appreciation  for your valuable contribution, time and have a wonderful day!
story_txt:
An Amazing Story...
Hi this is Gabe, I'm 23 years old from the beautiful country of El Salvador in Central America. I've just decided to make the best decision ever in order to expand my vegan business and also enlarge the vegan community inside my country and to hopefully spread this idea all around Central America.Veganism changed my life drastically in every aspect and since then I knew I had to do something to let everybody know about the benefits of this growing trend. I knew that everybody loves tacos and also that I could convert this idea into a delicious vegan fast food concept and then the concept was born. This campaign is incredibly important for me not just because it will affect my life, but because I truly believe that this will have a huge impact within my community by helping to promote a more healthy way of living and by gradually making a shift inside the fast food industry in my country and beyond.
ME APPEARING LIVE IN A US CHANNEL.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khEM9KQsnCo

story:
KOR VISION

                                      

             "The KOR of an Apple, the KOR of your Health, the KOR of a Cause"

Juicing changed my life! For 4 years, I was dealing with a chronic cough that seemed incurable. I met with liver, lung, and ENT specialists, consulted with allergists, sat through numerous CAT scans, X-rays, and pulmonary tests, all with no solution! I turned to a more natural cure for my ailment after quickly realizing the extreme benefits of juicing fruits and vegetables. Within 6 months of juicing, my cough was completely gone! At that point, I KNEW I wanted to spread the benefits of juicing in any way I could.

This is where KOR Juice Bar comes in to the picture. My team and I are avid cold-press juicers who want to bring an entirely new idea to the world of juicing. We are seeking to be the very first juice bar that allows you to "Build Your Own" juices at affordable prices. KOR's philosophy is to better the world by providing nutrition. We will donate 1 lb of produce to fight global malnutrition for every juice purchased!

KOR SOCIAL IMPACT

Nearly 870 Million (1 of 8 people) are suffering from chronic undernourishment. The number of hungry grew in Africa by 36% over the past few years. 1 out of every 3 children in developing countries are affected by Malnutrition. KOR wants collaborate with YOU to create a social impact!

What is KOR Juicing?
The high yield extraction of pure juice from fresh, raw, vegan fruits and vegetables using latest in advanced juicing technology. Our juicing method keeps vital enzymes, vitamins and nutrients in tact and ready to drink! Juicing is extremely delicious and healthy and is often used for dietary reasons or a form of alternative medicine.

We desperately need your help!
We have spent the last 6 months diligently: developing our new concept, researching juice recipes, studying the specific health benefits of juicing, performing market research, creating partnerships as well as gathering funding from juicers who are passionate about our idea!

If you like our concept, our cause, and want to truly spread health around the world, please read on and consider pledging!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE "KOR" CONCEPT

 3 ways we are different!

  

1. "BUILD IT YOURSELF"/ CUSTOMIZED JUICES - Build your own juice the way you like it with our “Unlimited Menu”


From apples to kale to dragon fruit, you pick the ingredients and we do the rest! Customize your juice to your heart’s content with our large selection of produce and ethnic fruits you just won’t find at other juice bars.

While the KOR recipe wall is used to give you inspiration, you are the ultimate decision maker when it comes to customizing your juice! We will label each recipe on our recipe wall with the expected color and health benefits.

              


                                                          

2. CUSTOMIZED CLEANSES - Everyone has a different motivation to cleanse!

We will offer 1/2/3 day cleanses based on the desired health benefit that suits you! Each day's cleanse consists of 6 different 16oz juices made from a total of 15 lbs of fruit and veggies! You tell us what you need, we'll do the research and create a specialized cleanse just for you!


                  

3. AFFORDABLE PRICING - KOR juices are 30% cheaper than average juice bars through savings from our "Build It Yourself" model!

In the mood for a hearty fresh juice? Only want a small serving to kick off your day? No problem! KOR juices are competitively priced based on the weight of produce you desire!


                                                                

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


THE "KOR" PROCESS

STEP 1: RECIPE STATION
Get juice recipe inspiration from the KOR Recipe Wall. Our recipe wall will display 30 different juice recipes showing the expected juice colors and health benefits!

STEP 2: PRODUCE STATION
Grab a basket and pick up fresh, raw, vegan produce based upon our recipes or get creative and customize your very own juice!

STEP 3: JUICING STATION 
Put your produce on the scale as we charge by the pound. And then watch as we juice your fresh, raw, vegan produce into a delicious healthy beverage for you to enjoy!

                    

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Without you, there is no KOR!

We need your help!

As much as we want to revolutionize the juicing industry, we are at a point in which we cannot do it without your support! We are passionate about juicing, our new concept, and the benefits we can bring to the community!

We have invested much time and effort into a model we feel will revolutionize the juicing industry, but at this point we are in need of $40G to finish our project to spread the KOR benefit! $20G we hope to raise from this campaign, the other $20G will be funded by juicers who believe in our idea and are willing to invest in KOR! We hope that through your generous pledges, we can spread the KOR benefits worldwide.

The KOR of our vision is to revolutionize the world of juicing and to fight malnutrition by finding creative ways to provide healthy living!

What is your KOR?

Support us also by answering this question on social media:
Facebook.com/KORjuice
Twitter.com/KORjuice
KORjuice.com

Pledges

What will Pledges be used for?

We will open our very first juice bar in Southern California (Orange County or Los Angeles) with plans to expand to target where our customers want us? Please send us feedback on desired locations!

What are Juicers saying about KOR?

“Great Concept! It really allows me to put exactly what I want in my Juice” - April

“I am always a bit skeptical on what exactly goes into my Juice at other Juice Bars, I like your idea of being able to physically pick the fruits and veggies and hand it over to get juiced” - Jason

“Being able to test unlimited recipes without having to go through all the trouble of buying it, washing it, juicing it is great!” - Emily

“I love that you use ethnic fruits/ veggies! Other Juice Bars don’t really have that option” - Kevin

“When I go to some Juice Bars, I always want to ‘mix and match’ a few recipes on their menu, but they won’t let me!” - Dionne

OUR PRODUCTS

story:
Overview

I create this campaign with all my hope that i would find angels that will help me to start my dream project:

Hi my name is Achraf i'm glad to introduce myself to you ...

Not like other childrens ! i have spend my childhood with difficulty because my family is poor but anyway this is one of my motivations, to save myself my family and my environment,i have always wish to help others will all my power, helping others gives you positive energy it's very beautiful to see someone happy because of you, anyway i try to help myself first to help others.

I have left the school for financial reasons i'm 19 y.o, i decided to start my project to save my life before it's late, and to go back to school i have real intention and energy to change my life and help me family i need little to start!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let me explain my business what it is:

500€ is my goal ! I'm not intend to gain real money from the good people, i asked help for capital and this five hundred is enough for me to start, there is others needs help more than me.

With all my humility, i'm good marketer i have worked on E-commerce for a while i'm really have magical touch on Marekting, it's sourced from my little experience on my work

200€ to buy two used motorcycle for delivery / 100€ to start the first promote campaigns / 100€ to fulfill the first orders.

The Impact

Your contribution will make great difference, i will never stop until i start this business and make it bigger, your investment will not be in vain:

With this project i'm plenty sure that i will turn my business into big company of this category service,and i intent to make great delivery and employees team based on youth energies i have intent to hire many youngs that needs help their families and themselves like me right now, just imagine that your contribute will make all of this.

I already worked with delivery services it's glad to make the daily needs near to someone busy!

With the good investment and planing, i'm plenty sure that i will make from this five hundred dollar a great business.

Note: i have already build website for my project https://sokhraa.com .

Risks & Challenges

The only problem that i have is financial support.

I already have some money inside to invest it, i'm help my father for my family needs that's why i have this problem but i'm very sure that i will never stop until start my project i don't know something called "Failure".

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that many of you have kind heart and will love my story but i also know that not all can help me, anyhow if you share my campaign it's will be good help for me you will be reason at latest for 10 persons that will see my story.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
What is Clayo?

Clayo was created as a love letter to the delicious flavors of Peruvian cuisine. Peru hosts one of the most diverse environments in the world, boasting a staggering 90 microclimates. This contributes to the vast number of fruits, herbs, and vegetables that are able to be grown within its borders. Most of which are incredibly flavorful, but little known or sparsely utilized in everyday cuisine. Clayo aims to bring those flavors right to your kitchen with our line of signature Peruvian inspired sauces and spice blends.

 

The Goods

We're launching 2 finishing sauces, 2 hot sauces, and 2 spice blends. The recipes we chose to launch feature some of Peru's most flavorful and versatile peppers, spices, herbs. Some of which include: AJi Limo, Aji Panca, Huacatay (black mint), Rocoto, and Peruvian pink salt among other delicious ingredients. 

(All of our products are vegan and gluten free)

What Makes Us Special? 

1) We don’t do processed – Our products are crafted using all-natural fresh ingredients that are hand inspected and selected by our culinary expert. No matter your diet, Clayo will give your favorite foods a flavorful boost. Our sauces are vegan, gluten free, and do not contain any synthetic ingredients for color. We take pride in the fact that everything that goes into our products can be picked, plucked, or pulled straight from nature.

 

2) We don’t do pretentious – At Clayo, we love to eat. That is why we made our sauces and spice blends good to go on everything. Whether its chicken, beef, pork, veggies, or popcorn, Clayo sauces can be used to enhance any dish or snack. The quality of our ingredients and the careful balancing of flavors is more important to us than the inclusion of some random rare item just for the added intrigue factor.

 

3) We don’t do “regular” – Things change. Raw ingredients have natural variations depending on their growing conditions, and we welcome the small variations in flavors. This gives each of our batches their own unique character. For example, sometimes a pepper harvest can yield hotter or milder peppers and rather than adapting them to fit us, we adapt to fit them. We regularly adjust our labels to reflect changes in flavor notes so that you always know what you’re getting.

 

 

Gallery:

 

 

Our Process

We start by exploring the selection of local venders and farmers to source the ingredients that go into our products. Since we only do small batches of sauce, it is important to only get the best ingredients because there is less margin for error when developing the flavor.

We don’t use fancy equipment in our kitchen to automate the process. At Clayo, we believe that the most flavorful products are made when you are actively involved from start to finish. The more care and attention you put in, the greater the product you get out. This means that we chop, slice, wash, and peel everything by hand... regardless of the endless watery eyes from chopping onions.

Our sauces don’t stick around forever. We’re constantly crafting new recipes, but as of right now, we only have the capacity to launch 4 per cycle. Every few months we’ll introduce a new batch of delicious sauces with some special limited releases sprinkled in along the way.

 

Project Breakdown

We launched this project to raise additional funds to increase our capacity. We want to hit the ground running and bring the flavors of artfully crafted Peruvian goods to everyone. Your support will go towards a new kitchen space that will allow for bigger batches to be made and for procuring more sophisticated equipment for growing our own peppers and herbs.

Timeline - Since we smashed through our goals, we will begin production earlier than anticipated. This means rewards will be shipped out much faster. We have also garnered a lot of attention from retailers and we hope to bring Clayo goods to a shop near you after the conclusion of the campaign!

story:
Our Story: 

After working long hours at jobs that were unfulfilling and draining we sold all of our things, packed up what was left in their car, and moved across the country. After leaving the old jobs that we hated so much, we made a promise to each other that we would never work regular office jobs again, and tasked ourselves with creating our own business. From there Nouveau Quiche was born. 

At Nouveau Quiche, we’ve spent a lot of time in the kitchen, reimagining & developing the perfect quiche. Inside ours, you’ll find only the best farm-fresh ingredients, prepared in unique & creative ways.

After 3 years of serving our quiche in Farmers Markets throughout Arizona, we're ready to grow our business and participate in larger events throughout the nation as well as make our quiche accessible to everyone through online sales - that's why we're asking for your help!

What We Need & What You Get

We have the opportunity grow our business in new and exciting ways, and we can't do it without your help!

First, we have the once in a lifetime chance to purchase a 1958 Citroen truck that's as unique as our quiche, with an expandable hood and plenty of storage space for larger events. This truck is 1 of 3 in the world (the other 2 are in museums in France), and will give us opportunities to:

  1. Participate in larger events throughout the nation
  2. Serve more people than ever before

​​We are also ready to expand into online sales, but we need help raising the capital to get started. We want to make sure that our loyal customers nationwide can get our quiche for all of their favorite holidays and traditions, or any time of the year!

We need $32,000 to purchase the 1958 Citroen food truck and start selling online. As a big thank you for your support, we've created a variety of donation levels, all designed to help you fall in love with quiche:

Donation Levels

$25 Donation: Utensil Kit with Carabiner

$30 Donation: Limited Edition Artist Designed Nouveau Quiche T-shirt

$50 Donation: Whole 12" Quiche

$100 Donation: Brunch in a Box 4 People (Includes Quiche & Vinaigrette for Salad for 4)

$150 Donation: Brunch in a Box for 8 People (Includes Quiche & Vinaigrette for Salad for 8)

$250 Bronze Donation: Exclusive Invitation to Launch Party, Whole 12" Quiche, & Limited Edition T-Shirt

$1000 Silver Donation: Invitation to our Launch Party and a Truck Brunch Party for up to 24 Guests (or Brunch in a Box for 24 Guests if You Live Out of Town)

$2500 Gold Donation: Truck Brunch Party for up to 32 Guests (or Brunch in a Box for 32 Guests if You Live Out of Town), a Utensil Kit with Carabiner, a Limited Edition T-shirt, an Invitation to Our Launch Party (if We Reach Our Goal), and Our Deepest Gratitude.

Some of our reviews: 


"Armand’s quiches are the undeniable proof that God exists and that He adores us. Complete and absolute gustative ecstasy! "


"This quiche is awesome. I'm not sure how they make it so addictive and melt-in-your-mouth incredible, but they do. Maybe it's the honey drizzle, maybe it's the crumb topping, maybe it's the buttery, flaky crust. All I know is this quiche is the bomb. My teenager that normally wouldn't touch quiche literally hides pieces in the fridge. Thank you for making me fall in love again with quiche. "


"I'm obsessed! Best quiche ever. BEWARE, it's addicting ?"


"The CRUST! Holy hell...the CRUST!!! I’ve baked for years, and my mother has produced video how-to’s about pie. But this CRUST is the best I’ve ever had. Never mind the perfect blend of ingredients inside, I’ve been LITERALLY licking my plate when I’m “done”."

Spread the love:

If you can't contribute, you can still help us reach our goal by sharing this campaign with your family & friends!

Thank you all for your generosity & support! We are so grateful to serve you.

~Armand & Sarah
story_txt:
Our Story: 
After working long hours at jobs that were unfulfilling and draining we sold all of our things, packed up what was left in their car, and moved across the country. After leaving the old jobs that we hated so much, we made a promise to each other that we would never work regular office jobs again, and tasked ourselves with creating our own business. From there Nouveau Quiche was born. 
At Nouveau Quiche, we’ve spent a lot of time in the kitchen, reimagining & developing the perfect quiche. Inside ours, you’ll find only the best farm-fresh ingredients, prepared in unique & creative ways.
After 3 years of serving our quiche in Farmers Markets throughout Arizona, we're ready to grow our business and participate in larger events throughout the nation as well as make our quiche accessible to everyone through online sales - that's why we're asking for your help! 

What We Need & What You Get

Participate in larger events throughout the nation

My teenager that normally wouldn't touch quiche literally hides pieces in the fridge. Thank you for making me fall in love again with quiche. "

story:
SMALL PLACES, GREAT FOOD ANYWAY.

There is one thing harder than finding time to cook. It’s making meals when you just don’t have room to cook. Long story short, Studio makes cooking both faster and easier, no matter how small your kitchen or how packed your schedule.

 

We know whose life is about to change…

Students
There is more to life than instant soup

Sure, some are not even that bad. But every evening for 5 years, that’s another story. We believe student life shouldn’t be about waiting forever for the pasta to cook on an electric cooktop or giving up on that morning fried egg you need to get going.

 

Tiny house owners
Live small, think big

What’s the point in getting that comfy tiny house if you have to eat out every night? Studio brings awesome cooking conditions to the most unusually small places. What we like best is stowing it away when we are done and enjoying all that free space.

 

Private chefs
Get on your A game

There’s two ways to deal with things when you are a personal chef. Crossing your fingers and hoping you won’t end up in the worst kitchen. Or kitting yourself out. The good news is Studio is not only compact, it is also super light and comes with its own transport cover.

 

STUDIO IS A 20 inch GENIUS

3 elements                                                           Induction heat                                                   Ultra compact

Booster Mode                                                   Left or Right unfold                                       1 second folding

 

SPECIFICATIONS

 

        

      Touch control                                     Pivoting control panel

                                       3 element sizes                                                  Lock function

                      Protection against overheating                        Child-safety automatic stop

10 power grades

         

                            Unfolds right or left                                        Easy to clean

                                       Pan detector                                                     12-24 hour timer

You’ll need a better excuse to pass on cooking.

There is only one thing we like better than eating. It’s cooking for a friendly crowd and enjoy the time spent together. At the end of the day, isn’t life about knowing you can bring 4 friends home on an impulse and gather around a hearty meal?
Guess what? You might be about to become that person friends come to for honest food!

story:
Honey & Roses Coffee is an online marketplace for the greatest craft coffee roasters, and creators of quality small batch treats. It's a place where people like you can buy freshly roasted coffee directly from specialty roasters, Freshly baked cakes & cookies directly from the small businesses who create them, and even search for your tastes or dietary requirements.

In other words, Honey & Roses is reinventing the way people find, buy and enjoy the coffee and treats that makes a coffee break so special.

Back this project, and you'll be helping build the coffee break marketplace that really supports small business.

 

Honey & Roses Coffee Co is:

  • One marketplace, lots of roasters. Easily discover, search and buy coffee directly from small businesses.
  • Coffee, curated for you. Find the coffee that works for you and connect with us to learn more and get recommendations
  • Support small business, personally. Get to know the roaster, baker or chocolatier and find out their story.
  • One marketplace, lots of treats. Easily find, search and buy fresh baked cakes, biscotti, cookies chocolate and more. Easily find Gluten Free and Vegan options

What Are People Saying?

'I tried the Little Wolf coffee... holy mother - it was Amazing. My husband and I already said that we will be ordering more. It is SO smooth and delicious.  

As for Honey and Roses Coffee Company: VERY professional and responsive. Great job!!' - Lauren

 

'I’m obsessed with Honey and Roses! The subscription is such a reasonable price to have high quality coffee delivered to my door. It takes the guess work out of coffee, and I get to support small businesses, too. Another bonus is that the coffee is ethically and sustainably sourced!  I use my French press all of the time and their cutlery was a cute addition to my coffee cart.  Lastly, the owners are so sweet and responsive!' - Shelbie

 

'My first purchase from Honey and Roses was perfect. I got a great price on a hard to find, unique, delicious coffee. The coffee was delivered quickly and the beans had been roasted just days before. They even sent me a personal email asking about my purchase. A great buying experience and excellent coffee.' - Patrick

 

'They focus on the personal interactions with customers and work to 'bring the coffee shop home'.' - Andrew, Pull & Pour

 

One Marketplace, 55 +Roasters

 

We're building the USA's most trusted marketplace for craft coffee & treats, making it easier and more convenient than ever before to discover new flavors and buy freshly made items that are delivered directly to you.

 

Just like your local farmers market hosts many individual vendors, Honey & Roses Coffee Co's marketplace features:

  • Many different coffee roasters, each offering their own specialty coffees for sale.
  • Home and small batched baked goods, chocolate and more directly from the people creating them

When you buy a coffee or treat on Honey & Roses, we notify the maker. Once receiving your order, the vendor will roast or bake your product and ship it out promptly to you. This means you are receiving the freshest goods possible - nothing filled full of preservatives or sitting on supermarket shelves for weeks.

Every vendor commits to a guarantee of freshness!

 

Coffee, curated for you

Honey & Roses is about discovery, convenience and community. We make it easy for you to search for and learn about different aspects of coffee - but we love talking to you directly and making recommendations ourselves!

 

Support small business, personally

 

What do you know about the people that roasters the coffee you're enjoying? Or the baker that baked your soft cookies to perfection?

We want to support small businesses by making a personal connection. Many of these people struggle to reach customers in a competitive marketing environment but have the absolute best coffee, cakes or cookies that you can find. We are focused on telling their stories through text image and video - and keep you up to date on what they are doing. When you're drinking that coffee and eating those cookies, we want you to feel like they were made by a friend.

By solely practicing ethical sourcing, with coffee roasters who pay their farmers fairly, with the actual bakers who work from their home kitchens, we support sustainable, long term relationships built on respect that let our vendors pursue their passions!

 

Honey & Roses [Single] Origin story

 

It started as a conversation about coffee. Specifically coffee shops around the world. After years of seeing the world and experiencing different cultures. We know there's nothing like the feeling of waking up in a new place, eager to wander out your door and try a local coffee shop. The immersion you experience while drinking coffee on a trip is something you take with you when you return home, even if you can't take the coffee itself. We wanted to design a way to recreate that feeling with the convenience of home delivery.

We started with a handful of roasters who had impressed us with their passion and quality and we loved hearing about how they were giving back to the farmers that supported them, and as COVID19 hit - we really tried to do our part in supporting the roasters themselves as they suffered from a lack of foot traffic. It soon became obvious that small businesses needed better visibility, and we had a way to source the finest coffee, but as we all started taking coffee breaks at home, we suddenly realized 'hey, I wish I had a slice of cake to go with this coffee'.

So we launched Sweets & Treats, now we have a way to let you buy from small businesses directly. Couple the perfect coffee with the perfect cookie or cake, and support the individuals who create them with passion and flare.

We invite you to become part of this community. Together we can enjoy the finest quality coffee break, and support the small businesses that make it possible.

 

Rewards

We're overjoyed that you want to join us in building a trusted marketplace for coffee & treats and that you want to support small businesses while doing so. As a thank you, we've lined up some awesome rewards for you to enjoy.

 

All of our backers pledging $15 or more

will get the most gorgeous start to summer! We've curated the most awesome sustainable reusable iced coffee cups, perfect for your morning commute or for using around the house - let's make it easier to enjoy your coffee in an eco-friendly way!

 

Over $50

gets you the perfect start to the summer. A Rose Gold French Press, A Reusable Iced Coffee Cup and a freshly roast bag of coffee to go with it.

 

Pledge over $100

and receive a Rose Gold French Press, a stainless steel / ceramic branded reusable coffee cup that keeps your drinks hot or cold, a bag of delicious craft coffee AND indulge your sweet tooth with some freshly baked cookies or biscotti from one of our fantastic partners.

 

Over $200

and you can forget about running out of coffee for the next year - you'll get an entire year of coffee, with a bag delivered monthly.

 

Pledge over $500

and bring the complete coffee break home! You will receive:

  • A Rose Gold French Press
  • A stainless steel / ceramic branded Reusable Coffee Cup or reusable iced coffee bottle
  • A years supply of premium, freshly roast craft coffee, delivered monthly
  • A selection of cookies or biscotti, freshly baked and sent directly to you
  • Both complete sets of beautiful brass coffee and dinner spoons AND a Brass Twig Cutlery Set

 

 

Preview

Find your coffee!

 

Find your treat!

 

Learn about our partners!

 

Chat with us

We want to hear from you! Don't hesitate to comment here, say hi on Instagram at @honeyandrosescoffee on Facebook or email Joe or Ella directly at joe@honeyandrosescoffee.com or Ella@honeyandrosescoffee.com.

 

Risks & Challenges

Right now, we're busy building a trusted marketplace for coffee and treats. We're hoping to launch expand Honey & Roses Coffee in the United States this summer, and our sights are set on Canada, the United Kingdom, Europe, and the rest of the world as we expand in the future. 

As with any startup, predicting exactly when things will fall into place is not easy, so there's always a chance it could be a bit later [or a bit earlier] than we expect. But however things develop, we'll keep you, our backers, well informed every step of the way.

story:
Short Summary

 

*No refined sugar *No milk *No gluten *No nuts *No soya *No emulsifiers  *No artificial flavourings *No artificial additives *No plastic *No aluminium

*Sin azucar refinado *Sin leche  *Sin gluten *Sin frutos secos  *Sin soja  *Sin emulgantes *Sin sabores artificiales  *Sin aditivos artificiales *Sin plastico * Sin aluminio 

*Be rafinuoto cukraus *Be pieno *Be glitimo *Be riešutų *Be sojos *Be emulsiklių *Be dirbtinių skonių *Be dirbtinių priedų *Be plastiko *Be aliuminio

ABOUT US 

SOBRE NOSOTROS 

APIE MUS

 

 Gguni Dates Cacao is a little family factory of Bean To Bar vegan naturaly sweetened with dates (or other fruits) and little processed chocolate. 

We are the family from Lithuania, living in Spain.

 Gguni Dates Cacao es el pequeño obrador familiar del chocolate Bean To Bar (desde el grano hasta la tabla) y vegano, menos procesado y endulzado naturalmente con dátiles (u otros frutos). 

Nosotros somos una familia de Lituania, viviendo en España.

 Gguni dates cacao, tai mažas šeimyninis bean to bar (nuo pupelės iki plytelės) veganiško, datulėmis (ar kitais vaisiais) saldinto mažiau apdirbto šokolado fabrikėlis.

 Mes esame Ispanijoje gyvenanti lietuvių šeima.

OUR CORE IDEA 

NUESTRA IDEA PRINCIPAL 

PAGRINDINĖ MŪSŲ IDĖJA

 Living in a nowadays world with a well developed food industry we were shocked to realize to how much refined sugar and artificial additives in food our children and we are exposed! So having a dream to get our children and us eating more natural foods full of nutrients without artificial additives nor refined sugars added we came to the idea, that we need to make naturally sweetened chocolate ourselves, as to find one in stores seemed impossible. That  was the first push. 

 Viviendo en un mundo actual con una industria alimentaria bien desarrollada, nos sorprendió en el sentido negativo cuando hemos dado cuenta de la cantidad del azúcar refinada y aditivos artificiales a que están expuestos nuestros hijos y nosotros. Entonces, teniendo el sueño de que nuestros hijos y nosotros comiéramos alimentos más naturales y llenos de nutrientes sin aditivos artificiales ni azúcares refinados añadidos, se nos ocurrió la idea de que necesitamos hacer chocolate endulzado naturalmente nosotros mismos, ya que encontrar uno en las tiendas parecía impossible.  Ese fue el primer empujón.

 Gyvendami gerai išvystytos maisto pramonės pasaulyje buvome sukrėsti supratę su kiek daug rafinuoto cukraus ir dirbtinių priedų maiste kasdien susiduria mūsų vaikai ir mes! Taigi, norėdami maitintis natūralesniu maistingu maistu be dirbtinių priedų bei rafinuoto pridėtinio cukraus, nusprendėme, jog patys turime gaminti natūraliai saldintą šokoladą, kadangi tokio surasti parduotuvių lentynose mums nepavyko. Tai buvo pirmas motyvas.

 The second motivation was to get more nutricional value from cacao, which most chocolates in stores do not have anymore, as are made from alcalized cacao mass and are too much processed. The studies show, that alcalized cacao loses 60% of antioxidants compeared to a non alcalized cacao. 

 La segunda motivación fue obtener más valor nutricional del cacao, cual la mayoría de los chocolates en las tiendas ya no tienen, ya que están hechos de la masa de cacao alcalinizado y están demasiado procesados.  Los estudios muestran que el cacao alcalinizado pierde el 60% de antioxidantes en comparación con un cacao no alcalinizado.

 Antroji motyvacija buvo noras iš kakavos pupelių išgauti daugiau maistinės vertės, kurios dauguma šokoladų parduotuvių lentynose nebeturi tiek daug. Nes dažniausiai yra gaminami iš alkalizuotos kakavos masės ir yra stipriai apdirbami. Tyrimai rodo, kad alkalizuota kakava praranda 60% antioksidantų lyginant ją su nealkalizuota kakava.

 

 The third push was our milk intolerant olderst daughter and some our milk and nuts alergic friends, who could not enjoy chocolate without a risk of suffering consequences as most of the chocolates in stores have possible traces of milk and nuts. We decided that we can make the chocolate suitable for them! 

 El tercer empujón fue nuestra hija mayor  con intolerancia a la leche y algunos de nuestros amigos alérgicos a la leche y a los frutos secos, que no podían disfrutar el chocolate sin correr el riesgo de sufrir consecuencias ya que la mayoría de los chocolates en las tiendas tienen posibles trazas de leche y frutos secos.  ¡Decidimos que podemos hacer que el chocolate sea adecuado para ellos!

  Trečia paspirtis buvo pienui netoleranciją turinti vyriausioji dukra bei pienui ir riešutams alergiški mūsų draugai, kurie dažniausiai negali mėgautis šokoladu nerizikuodami patirti nemalonių pasekmių, kadangi dauguma šokoladų turi galimų pieno ar riešutų likučių. Nusprendėme, kad galime pagaminti jiems tinkamą šokoladą!

 

 So our core idea and core value is to make a Bean To Bar Chocolate from the selected tasty beans, 

 Entonces nuestra idea principal  y nuestro valor principal es hacer el chocolate Bean To Bar desde granos seleccionados y sabrosos,

 Taigi, pagrindinė mūsų idėja ir pagrindinės vertybės yra: gaminti bean to bar (nuo pupelės iki plytelės) šokoladą iš atrinktų skanių kakavos pupelių,

 sweetening it purely with dates or other fruits full of nutrients them selves

 endulzarlo solo con dátiles u otros frutos, llenos de nutrientes

 saldinti jį datulėmis ar kitais maistingais vaisiai,

 and make it little processed to preserve all the best nutrients cacao beans have.

 y hacerlo menos procesado para preservar los propiedades nutricionales de los granos de cacao.

 mažai jį apdirbti, kad išsaugotume kakavos pupelių maistingumą.

 

 As the additional ingredientes we use only natural non alergic ones: vanila bean, fresh orange peel, sticks of Ceylon cinnamon, mint leaves, dried fruit purees which add their nutritional value to the chocolate aswell.

So all the ingredients of our chocolates are nutritionaly highly valuable. 

 Como ingredientes adicionales usamos solo cosas reales no alergicas: vaina de vainilla, piel de naranja fresca, canela de Ceylan, hojas de menta, purés secados de frutas que añaden su valor nutricional al chocolate tambien. 

Entonces, todos los ingredientes de nuestros chocolates llevan valor nutricional alta.

 Kaip papildomas sudedamąsias dalis naudojame tik realius, natūralius, nealergizuojančius produktus: vanilės ankštis, šviežių apelsinų žieveles, Ceilono cinamoną, mėtos lapelius, džiovintas vaisių juosteles, kurie šokoladui papildomai suteikia ir savo maistinę vertę.

Taigi, visos mūsų šokoladų sudedamosios dalys turi aukštą maistinę vertę.

 We chose plastic free paper packaging to preserve our planet as this matters to us a lot too.

 Usamos los envases de papel solo, sin plastico ni aluminio, para preservar nuestra planeta, porque eso importa a nosotros tambien.

 Mūsų pakuotės popierinės, be plastiko ir be aliuminio, kadangi mums labai rūpi ir mūsų planeta.

 

OUR LITTLE FACTORY

NUESTRO OBRADOR 

MŪSŲ FABRIKĖLIS

 

 Gguni Dates Cacao factory has been opened in Spain in a beautiful, authentic and cozy town Altea in Alicante province.

 El obrador de Gguni Dates Cacao está abierto en un pueblo autentico, hermoso y acogedor, Altea, en provincia de Alicante, España. 

 Gguni Dates Cacao fabrikėlis veikia autentiškame jaukiame Altea miestelyje Alikantės provincijoje, Ispanijoje.

 We produce 9 kinds of chocolates, cacao mass and toasted cacao nibs now. You can find out more in our webpage in the link below:

 Actualmente estamos produciendo 9 variedades de los chocolates, masa de cacao y nibs (trocitos) de cacao tostado. Podeis encontrar más informacion en nuestro web, el enlace abajo:

 Šiuo metu gaminame 9 rūšių šokoladą, kakavos masę bei skrudintus kakavos nibsus (pupelių gabaliukus). Daugiau galite sužinoti mūsų puslapyje, šioje nuorodoje:

https://www.ggunidatescacao.com

 

PEOPLE REACTIONS

REACCIONES DE LA GENTE 

ŽMONIŲ REAKCIJOS

 As we are producing and selling our new kind of chocolate for a while already, we see, that it is much liked by the people, especialy, as it gives a rear posibility to eat healthier chocolate, naturaly sweetened with dates, without any refined sugar nor artificial sweeteners, nor other unnecesary aditives in it. 

 Estamos elaborando y vendiendo nuestros chocolates por algun tiempo ya y podemos ver, que a la gente les gusta mucho nuestro chocolate, especialmente, por lo que nuestro chocolate los da la posibilidad excepcional a comer un chocolate más saludable, naturalmente endulzado con dátiles, sin azucar refinado, ni edulcorantes, ni otros aditivos innecesarios. 

 Kadangi gaminame ir parduodame mūsų šokoladą jau kurį laiką, matome, kad žmonės jį mėgsta, ypač jiems patinka, kad mūsų šokoladas suteikia retą galimybę valgyti sveikesnį šokoladą, saldintą datulėmis, be rafinuoto cukraus bei dirbtinių saldiklių ar kitų bereikalingų priedų.

 Our chocolate is suitable for everyone, also for those, who are alergic or intolarant to milk, nuts, soya, refined sugar or gluten. We give these people a rear possibility to enjoy chocolate and it is much appritiated by them, which makes us very happy.

 Nuesto chocolate es apto para todos, tambien para la gente alergica o intolerante a la leche, frutos secos, soja, azucar refinado o gluten. Nosotros damos a esta gente una posibilidad excepcional disfrutar el chocolate, y eso es muy valorado por ellos. Sobre esto estamos muy contestos.

 Mūsų šokoladas tinka visiems, taip pat ir alergiškiems ar netoleranciją pienui, riešutams, sojai, rafinuotam cukrui ar glitimui turintirms žmonėms. Šie žmonės tai labai vertina ir tuo mes labai džiaugiamės.

https://www.ggunidatescacao.com/opiniones

 

What We Need & What You Get

 We have started our production with a very basic  equipment (you can see in the video below), which requires a lot of hand work and makes the making process very slow and hard. 

 Hemos empezado nuestra producción con un equipamiento muy básico (lo puede ver en el video abajo), lo que requiere mucho trabajo manual y hace que el proceso de fabricación sea muy lento y duro. 

 Atidarėme mūsų šokolado fabrikėlį turėdami labai paprastą įrangą (galite pamatyti filmuke apačioje), su kuria gamyba vyksta labai lėtai ir reikalauja daug ir sunkaus rankų darbo.

 So now to continue and to ensure the existance of the factory and to give the posibility for more people to get our healthier chocolates, we need some more eficient equipment (bigger oven, more efficient winnower, ball mill, bigger fridge, etc.), which are expensive enough for us not to efford them. 

 Así que ahora para seguir y asegurar la existencia del obrador y dar la posibilidad a más gente a conseguir nuestros chocolates saludables, necesitamos equipamientos más eficaz (horno más grande, el winnower (descascaroador) más eficaz, molino de bolas, la nevera más grande y etc.), que son para nosotros bastante caros para poder permitirlosnos. 

  Norėdami užtikrinti tolimesnį fabrikėlio egzistavumą bei pasiekti, kad mūsų šokoladas būtų prieinamas didesniam žmonių ratui, mums būtina įsigyti našesnę įrangą (didesnę krosnį, našesnį pupelių nužievintoją, rutulinį malūną, didesnį šaldytuvą ir t.t.), tačiau jie yra pakankamai brangūs, kad galėtume juos įpirkti.

 So we need your help! You can make us capable to change the world a bit!

 Entonces, necesitamos vuestra ayuda! Podeis ayudarnos cambiar un poquito el mundo!

 Taigi, mums reikia jūsų pagalbos! Galite padėti mums šiek tiek pakeisti pasaulį!

 

PROJECT MONEY WILL BE USED:

DINERO DEL PROYECTO VA A SER USADO PARA: 

PROJEKTO PINIGUS NAUDOSIME:

 1st goal 7800 Eur  Primer objectivo 7800 Eur  Pirmas tikslas 7800 Eur:

 We have reached this goal, so we will be able to buy at least some equipment, the bigger oven, the bigger winnower and the ball mill, which will make our production a lot faster. We are in the process of buying it.

 Hemos ya conseguido esta meta, entonces vamos a poder a comprar como minimo alguna parte del equipamiento el horno màs grande, el winnower (descacariador) más grande y  molino de bolas que hará nuestra producción mucho más rápida. Estamos en el proceso de la compra.

 Šį tikslą jau pasiekėme, tad galėsime įsigyti bent dalį įrangos: didesnę krosnį, didesnį nužievintoją ir rutulinį malūną, kas gerokai pagreitins mūsų gamybą. Esame pirkimo procese.

 

 2nd aim 8 000 EUR  Segundo objectivo 8 000 Eur  Antras tikslas 8 000 Eur

 We still need money for all the rest of equipment (bigger fridges, tempering machine, chocolate dispencer, bigger amount of molds for the chocolates etc.), so that our producción would become even more efficient.

 Todavia necesitariemos el resto del equipamiento (neveras más grandes,  atempladora, despensador de chocolate, moldes de chocolates y etc.) para que nuestra producción sea aún más rápida. 

 Mums vis dar trūks dalies įrangos (didesnių šaldytuvų, temperinimo aparatūros, šokolado doztoriaus, daugiau formelių šokoladui ir t.t.), kad mūsų gamyba taptų dar efektyvesne.

 

Risks & Challenges

 We don't see many risks, as we already are funcioning and see how happy people are getting our chocolates.

 No vemos muchos riesgos, ya que estamos funcionando y vemos lo que contenta es la gente con nuestros chocolates.

 Nematome daug rizikos, kadangi jau kurį laiką dirbame ir matome, kaip žmonėms patinka mūsų šokoladas.

 In general with the new equipment we should be more capable to ensure our continueing existance too. So, there would be less risk for us to stop. Of course, there is always some risk, but we beleave in ourselves that we will in no way disappoint you!

 En general, con equipamientos nuevos deberíamos ser más capaces a asegurar nuestra existencia continua. Por lo tanto, habría menos riesgo de que nos detuviéramos. Por supuesto, siempre existe algún riesgo, ¡pero creemos en nosotros mismos que de ninguna manera os decepcionaremos!

 Iš esmės su nauja įranga įgausime daugiau galimybių užtikrinti veiklos tęstinumą, taigi bus mažiau tikimybės užsidaryti. Žinoma, visada egzistuoja tam tikros rizikos, bet mes tikime savimi, kad jokiais būdais jūsų nenuvilsime!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 You can share our project on Facebook, Instagram or other social media, or tell about it to your friends. Every spread of the information about our project can contribute significantly to the achievement of our goal.

 Puedes compartir nuestro proyecto en Facebook, Instagram u otras redes sociales, o contar sobre el proyecto a tus amigos. Cada difusión de la información sobre nuestro proyecto puede contribuir significativamente al logro de nuestro objetivo.

 Gali dalintis informacija apie projektą per Facebook, Instagram ar kitais socialinių medijų kanalais, ar tiesiog papasakoti apie projektą savo draugams. Kiekvienas pasidalinimas gali reikšmingai prisidėti prie to, kad tikslas būtų pasiektas.
story_txt:
Short Summary


 


*No refined sugar *No milk *No gluten *No nuts *No soya *No emulsifiers  *No artificial flavourings *No artificial additives *No plastic *No aluminium
*Sin azucar refinado *Sin leche  *Sin gluten *Sin frutos secos  *Sin soja  *Sin emulgantes *Sin sabores artificiales  *Sin aditivos artificiales *Sin plastico * Sin aluminio 
*Be rafinuoto cukraus *Be pieno *Be glitimo *Be riešutų *Be sojos *Be emulsiklių *Be dirbtinių skonių *Be dirbtinių priedų *Be plastiko *Be aliuminio

ABOUT US 
SOBRE NOSOTROS 
APIE MUS  Gguni Dates Cacao is a little family factory of Bean To Bar vegan naturaly sweetened with dates (or other fruits) and little processed chocolate. 
We are the family from Lithuania, living in Spain.
 Gguni Dates Cacao es el pequeño obrador familiar del chocolate Bean To Bar (desde el grano hasta la tabla) y vegano, menos procesado y endulzado naturalmente con dátiles (u otros frutos). 
Nosotros somos una familia de Lituania, viviendo en España.
 Gguni dates cacao, tai mažas šeimyninis bean to bar (nuo pupelės iki plytelės) veganiško, datulėmis (ar kitais vaisiais) saldinto mažiau apdirbto šokolado fabrikėlis.
 Mes esame Ispanijoje gyvenanti lietuvių šeima.


OUR CORE IDEA 
NUESTRA IDEA PRINCIPAL 
PAGRINDINĖ MŪSŲ IDĖJA
 Living in a nowadays world with a well developed food industry we were shocked to realize to how much refined sugar and artificial additives in food our children and we are exposed! So having a dream to get our children and us eating more natural foods full of nutrients without artificial additives nor refined sugars added we came to the idea, that we need to make naturally sweetened chocolate ourselves, as to find one in stores seemed impossible. That  was the first push. 
 Viviendo en un mundo actual con una industria alimentaria bien desarrollada, nos sorprendió en el sentido negativo cuando hemos dado cuenta de la cantidad del azúcar refinada y aditivos artificiales a que están expuestos nuestros hijos y nosotros. Entonces, teniendo el sueño de que nuestros hijos y nosotros comiéramos alimentos más naturales y llenos de nutrientes sin aditivos artificiales ni azúcares refinados añadidos, se nos ocurrió la idea de que necesitamos hacer chocolate endulzado naturalmente nosotros mismos, ya que encontrar uno en las tiendas parecía impossible.  Ese fue el primer empujón.
 Gyvendami gerai išvystytos maisto pramonės pasaulyje buvome sukrėsti supratę su kiek daug rafinuoto cukraus ir dirbtinių priedų maiste kasdien susiduria mūsų vaikai ir mes! Taigi, norėdami maitintis natūralesniu maistingu maistu be dirbtinių priedų bei rafinuoto pridėtinio cukraus, nusprendėme, jog patys turime gaminti natūraliai saldintą šokoladą, kadangi tokio surasti parduotuvių lentynose mums nepavyko. Tai buvo pirmas motyvas.

 The second motivation was to get more nutricional value from cacao, which most chocolates in stores do not have anymore, as are made from alcalized cacao mass and are too much processed. The studies show, that alcalized cacao loses 60% of antioxidants compeared to a non alcalized cacao. 
 La segunda motivación fue obtener más valor nutricional del cacao, cual la mayoría de los chocolates en las tiendas ya no tienen, ya que están hechos de la masa de cacao alcalinizado y están demasiado procesados.  Los estudios muestran que el cacao alcalinizado pierde el 60% de antioxidantes en comparación con un cacao no alcalinizado.
 Antroji motyvacija buvo noras iš kakavos pupelių išgauti daugiau maistinės vertės, kurios dauguma šokoladų parduotuvių lentynose nebeturi tiek daug. Nes dažniausiai yra gaminami iš alkalizuotos kakavos masės ir yra stipriai apdirbami. Tyrimai rodo, kad alkalizuota kakava praranda 60% antioksidantų lyginant ją su nealkalizuota kakava.  The third push was our milk intolerant olderst daughter and some our milk and nuts alergic friends, who could not enjoy chocolate without a risk of suffering consequences as most of the chocolates in stores have possible traces of milk and nuts. We decided that we can make the chocolate suitable for them! 
 El tercer empujón fue nuestra hija mayor  con intolerancia a la leche y algunos de nuestros amigos alérgicos a la leche y a los frutos secos, que no podían disfrutar el chocolate sin correr el riesgo de sufrir consecuencias ya que la mayoría de los chocolates en las tiendas tienen posibles trazas de leche y frutos secos.  ¡Decidimos que podemos hacer que el chocolate sea adecuado para ellos!
  Trečia paspirtis buvo pienui netoleranciją turinti vyriausioji dukra bei pienui ir riešutams alergiški mūsų draugai, kurie dažniausiai negali mėgautis šokoladu nerizikuodami patirti nemalonių pasekmių, kadangi dauguma šokoladų turi galimų pieno ar riešutų likučių. Nusprendėme, kad galime pagaminti jiems tinkamą šokoladą!  So our core idea and core value is to make a Bean To Bar Chocolate from the selected tasty beans, 
 Entonces nuestra idea principal  y nuestro valor principal es hacer el chocolate Bean To Bar desde granos seleccionados y sabrosos,
 Taigi, pagrindinė mūsų idėja ir pagrindinės vertybės yra: gaminti bean to bar (nuo pupelės iki plytelės) šokoladą iš atrinktų skanių kakavos pupelių,

 sweetening it purely with dates or other fruits full of nutrients them selves
 endulzarlo solo con dátiles u otros frutos, llenos de nutrientes
 saldinti jį datulėmis ar kitais maistingais vaisiai,

 and make it little processed to preserve all the best nutrients cacao beans have.
 y hacerlo menos procesado para preservar los propiedades nutricionales de los granos de cacao.
 mažai jį apdirbti, kad išsaugotume kakavos pupelių maistingumą.  As the additional ingredientes we use only natural non alergic ones: vanila bean, fresh orange peel, sticks of Ceylon cinnamon, mint leaves, dried fruit purees which add their nutritional value to the chocolate aswell.
So all the ingredients of our chocolates are nutritionaly highly valuable.

Entonces, todos los ingredientes de nuestros chocolates llevan valor nutricional alta.

Taigi, visos mūsų šokoladų sudedamosios dalys turi aukštą maistinę vertę.
