 We have reached this goal, so we will be able to buy at least some equipment, the bigger oven, the bigger winnower and the ball mill, which will make our production a lot faster. We are in the process of buying it.
 Hemos ya conseguido esta meta, entonces vamos a poder a comprar como minimo alguna parte del equipamiento el horno màs grande, el winnower (descacariador) más grande y  molino de bolas que hará nuestra producción mucho más rápida. Estamos en el proceso de la compra.
 Šį tikslą jau pasiekėme, tad galėsime įsigyti bent dalį įrangos: didesnę krosnį, didesnį nužievintoją ir rutulinį malūną, kas gerokai pagreitins mūsų gamybą. Esame pirkimo procese.
 
 2nd aim 8 000 EUR  Segundo objectivo 8 000 Eur  Antras tikslas 8 000 Eur
 We still need money for all the rest of equipment (bigger fridges, tempering machine, chocolate dispencer, bigger amount of molds for the chocolates etc.), so that our producción would become even more efficient.
 Todavia necesitariemos el resto del equipamiento (neveras más grandes,  atempladora, despensador de chocolate, moldes de chocolates y etc.) para que nuestra producción sea aún más rápida. 
 Mums vis dar trūks dalies įrangos (didesnių šaldytuvų, temperinimo aparatūros, šokolado doztoriaus, daugiau formelių šokoladui ir t.t.), kad mūsų gamyba taptų dar efektyvesne.
 

Risks & Challenges
 We don't see many risks, as we already are funcioning and see how happy people are getting our chocolates.
 No vemos muchos riesgos, ya que estamos funcionando y vemos lo que contenta es la gente con nuestros chocolates.
 Nematome daug rizikos, kadangi jau kurį laiką dirbame ir matome, kaip žmonėms patinka mūsų šokoladas.
 In general with the new equipment we should be more capable to ensure our continueing existance too. So, there would be less risk for us to stop. Of course, there is always some risk, but we beleave in ourselves that we will in no way disappoint you!
 En general, con equipamientos nuevos deberíamos ser más capaces a asegurar nuestra existencia continua. Por lo tanto, habría menos riesgo de que nos detuviéramos. Por supuesto, siempre existe algún riesgo, ¡pero creemos en nosotros mismos que de ninguna manera os decepcionaremos!
 Iš esmės su nauja įranga įgausime daugiau galimybių užtikrinti veiklos tęstinumą, taigi bus mažiau tikimybės užsidaryti. Žinoma, visada egzistuoja tam tikros rizikos, bet mes tikime savimi, kad jokiais būdais jūsų nenuvilsime!
 

Other Ways You Can Help

 You can share our project on Facebook, Instagram or other social media, or tell about it to your friends. Every spread of the information about our project can contribute significantly to the achievement of our goal.
 Puedes compartir nuestro proyecto en Facebook, Instagram u otras redes sociales, o contar sobre el proyecto a tus amigos. Cada difusión de la información sobre nuestro proyecto puede contribuir significativamente al logro de nuestro objetivo.
 Gali dalintis informacija apie projektą per Facebook, Instagram ar kitais socialinių medijų kanalais, ar tiesiog papasakoti apie projektą savo draugams. Kiekvienas pasidalinimas gali reikšmingai prisidėti prie to, kad tikslas būtų pasiektas.

story:
What is muuve?

Muuve is a self-checkout cart equipped with a deep learning computer, which will automatically detect every item placed into your basket. Intelligent sensors will recognize if items are placed into or taken out of the cart. Your shopping list will be displayed on the monitor and can be adjusted individually. Pay directly at the cart or with the app. No waiting in lines, just start muuving!

 

How to use it?

Easily scan the barcode with your app and start shopping. If you don’t have the app, don't worry! You will be able to use it completely without the app. While you are filling your basket, the cart will give you recipe suggestions which are adapted individually according to the items that you are shopping. After you finished, just pay on the integrated card-terminal or via app and leave the cart at the exit. 100% autonomous. Completely free to use.

The Benefits

- Skip the queuing in lines

- Relief for overworked workers

- 100% theft-proof technology

- Find the desired products in store  more easily with the integrated map

- contactless self-checkout process

 

How does it work?

The integrated camera will detect every item in your basket and displays it on the monitor. The sensors will recognize every change in the basket. On the bottom is a weight especially for fruits and vegetables without pricing tags. A huge database  gives the opportunity to detect these items. The app is packed with unique features for example an interactive market map, discounts and bonus points. After finishing the shopping, the monitor of the shopping cart will give you the option to pay directly on the monitor of the cart or even pay via our App. You can take out your items and leave the cart where you took it from.

About the project

As this project is only a concept yet, we are working every day on the implementation of our product. The design and technology will change in the course of development and we are aiming to present a finished, physical prototype. As we are a B2B project, we are not able to offer a product for consumers directly. The funds are going into the development and implementation of the cart. During the 60 days, you get to see more of our work with images and videos, so stay tuned!

 

Where do we want to see us in the future?

The goal of muuve is to optimize shopping for every customer and to facilitate work environment of supermarket employees. The food retail market needs a new drive into the future. We want to take a big step into autonomous technology and the digital age.

Our product is in the early stage of development. We need YOU to support us with our project. If we have the available resources, there is nothing to stop us from realizing the project.

story:
Our Story

Thank you so much for taking the time to browse through the details of our campaign.

Our family loves to spend time together on the water. Whether we’re enjoying time on one of the many lakes in our home state of Minnesota, relaxing in a pool, or spending time on the river, we love to be near water. Over the years, we began to notice a common problem - our beverages were always out of reach! While we were in the water, our beverages were on the beach, boat, or side of the pool. We loved having our insulated cup to keep our beverages cold, but we did not like having to hold it the entire time. We realized there had to be a better solution.

How could we enjoy time in the water with a cold beverage within reach? This question sparked brainstorming sessions that continued around our dinner table until the Buoya Floating Tumbler idea was born.

Our research, design, and development were a family affair. We tried numerous tumblers from various manufacturers, but nothing worked like we desired. Many hours, days, and weekends were spent testing a variety of ideas and prototypes. Like this:

We started with a simple homemade cup full of washers for weight in our bathtub and graduated to prototypes from our manufacturer.

Buoya has come a long way.

The Buoya Floating Tumbler holds 12 ounces of liquid and measures 3 inches wide by 8 inches tall, large enough to hold your favorite drink, but compact enough to fit in a standard cup holder. Its stainless steel double-wall vacuum-insulated construction keeps your drink cold - or hot! The Buoya Founder's Edition is white powder-coated stainless steel with a black water-tight lid.

The launch of the Buoya Floating Tumbler is especially meaningful for us, because it showcases to our children that a simple idea can turn into something great with hard work and determination. We're sure that you will also love and enjoy our Buoya Floating Tumbler for years to come.

Cheers,
Mark & Dani Harms

---------------------------------

Customs & Duty

Our prices do not include shipping outside of the USA. If you want to purchase this item from another country we will be happy to get a quote on the cost to do so. That would include the cost of the Buoya going through customs.

Shipping & Return Policy

If your Buoya is defective or damaged from shipping please reach out to us at info@buoya.com and we'll make it right.

Please make sure your address entered when placing the order is correct. We are not responsible for incorrect shipping addresses. It will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee for us to re-ship the order. Our responsibility is to provide a superior product that keeps your drink afloat!

story:
Hi, my name is Anton, I live in Ukraine. More than a year, my girl-friend and I are engaged in food (edible) bouquets and homemade cakes. Yes, you won't believe, exactly food bouquets. These are food compositions, or a mix of flowers and food.

Food bouquet :

For half a year we have had one idea that we call a dream. We want to create a free showroom in which there will be a floristic store, as well as a platform where anyone can collect a bouquet for a gift to a loved one from our products or brought from the store. Of course, all this can be done under the supervision of our florists.

Approximate room design:

The idea to start making such bouquets, came to us for a reason. The thing is that more than a year ago we decided to benefit the children who stayed in the local hospital. Since we did not have savings for the purchase of expensive drugs, all the benefits we could bring were entertainment and handicrafts. That would help the children to forget about the pain and at least somehow distract them from where they are! Having bought in the store all the healthy fruits, as well as sweets, we decided to present them in an unusual form, in the form of bouquets! Since we have collected ordinary bouquets a couple of times before and had experience in this business, it was not difficult for us to hold a bouquet class right at the hospital with the children! And it was so amazing that we decided not to stop and continue. A week later, we did the same master class in an orphanage for children who were left without parental care! After that, we started to make food bouquets and homemade pastries for sale.

Charity workshop for children from an orphanage who are deprived of parental care \ charity master class in the children's oncology department for children:

 

Concept of the institution & Financial plan

But since the profit from the bouquets went to charity master classes and gifts for the hospital, we had to continue working at the main job in order to somehow secure our accommodation. It is very difficult, both physically and emotionally, as sometimes there were days when we slept only a couple of hours.

We understand that we need to move on, and in order to continue to engage in charity work, we need to be completely immersed in the activity we love. For us, it is floristry and baking. It so happened that it is very difficult to create a business in our country. There are many nuances, including financial ones. It is difficult to get a loan, and if any luck, the amounts are much less than we need. We also do not have enough personal funds to start, since we spend almost everything that we earn on charity master classes and gifts for children.

After carried out calculations, we are at the stage of planning and design.

Approximate room design:

We already have our projects and, as far as possible, we begin to buy the equipment we need in the future. The main costs need to be invested in the repair of the premises, as well as in the costs for the first 3 months, including rent, salaries and taxes.

Financial component of the project:

​​The total amount required for the project - $ 38,000

  • The amount of own investments/accumulated savings - $ 8000

  • The amount of a bank loan - $ 5000 (the agreed amount of a loan from one of the banks of Ukraine at the time of publication of the project)

  • The amount required to collect (crowdfunding) - $ 25,000

Expense portion:

  • Reconstruction of the premises/repair (including payment for workers) - $ 16,000
  • Equipment/inventory/ decor - $ 11,500
  • Rent for the first 3 months - $ 4500
  • Salary part + taxes (for the first 3 months) - $ 3000
  • Associated/other expenses (advertising, signs, purchases) - $ 3000

 

What You Get:

It is not the first time that we hear about crowdfunding and we believe that ordinary people can help to make the dream come true for another ordinary people as well. Since we are far from our potential investors (although we will be very happy to see any of you in our country, and do everything for you to stay with us), all that we can offer as gifts is a video course (lessons) of master classes on the assembly of food bouquets of various configurations. The course was planned in Ukrainian, but we plan to release a separate course in English especially for you! The estimated release date for the lessons is the end of September 2019.

bouquet arrangement at home​:

We also invite you to participate in our charity events! In the near future there will be two of them. This will be a visit to the children's unit in the hospital, where stay children with oncology. There we will hold a master class on the assembly of a fruit bouquet and a bouquet of flowers, and also we will present gifts and essential drugs. We will hold the second master class in one of the orphanages, where children are deprived of parental care. In addition, we will buy toys and the necessary equipment for the sports development of children.

All charity master classes registers will be nominal. The name of each person who will take part in charity will be published on our banner. It is from all those people who will take part in this event the gifts will be presented! All reports and videos will be published in social networks, as well as sent to everyone by email!

Our gifts:

  • Video master class on the manufacture and make up of food bouquet. Making of meat and fruit bouquet with the use of alcoholic beverages. Translation into English! Donation - $ 25

  • Video master class on the manufacture and make up of food bouquet of crayfish with or without the use of beer. Preparation of crayfish, recipe, make up and packaging of the bouquet. Translation into English! Donation - $ 25

  • Video master class on the manufacture and make up of food basket/box. Making of box of crayfish and a fruit basket with flowers and alcoholic beverages. Translation into English! Donation - $ 30

  • Video workshop on the packaging of food, as well as floral bouquets. The most popular and creative types of packaging bouquets. Translation into English!​ Donation - $ 35

  • A collection of 4 lessons with the manufacture and make of meat, fruit bouquets, as well as bouquets of crayfish. Making of baskets of fruit, flowers using alcoholic beverages, as well as boxes of crayfish and beer. Master class in classic and creative packaging of floral and food bouquets. Translation into English!​ Donation - $ 90

The approximate dates of sending gifts are from September 20, 2019, but not later than October 31, 2019. The final date depends on the collection of funds, as well as on the technical nuances (lessons recording, editing and final translation into English)! The lessons will be sent to your email!​

Charity events:

  • - nominal charity master class in one of the orphanages of the city of Dnipro, Ukraine, for children without parental care. The master class will be held on behalf of those who donate money to it. All the names of the benefactors will be printed on the banner and transferred to the representatives of the orphanage! All bouquets that we make will be named after the sponsors (nominal)! Minimum funds required - $ 5000. Of which: $ 2000 for a master class (product purchase, transportation, consumables and packaging). $ 3000 - gifts for children, the purchase of toys and sports equipment. In case you want to donate another amount, please indicate the note “for the orphanage” when transferring funds! Donation - $ 250

 

  • - nominal charity master class at the oncology department of the children's hospital in the city of Dnipro, Ukraine. The master class will be held on behalf of those who donate money to it. All the names of the benefactors will be printed on the banner and transferred to the hospital representatives! All bouquets that we make will be named after the sponsors (nominal)! Minimum funds required - $ 7000. Of which: $ 2000 for a master class (product purchase, transportation, consumables and packaging). $ 5000 - gifts for children, the purchase of drugs/medicines, dressings, anesthetics (upon request and in consultation with the hospital). In case you want to donate another amount, please indicate the note “for the children's hospital” when transferring funds!​ Donation - $ 300

Attention!

It is important! All charity events will be held with a video report and photos for our sponsors! We can also provide a documentary report on the money spent at the request of the sponsor! The approximate date of the master class in the orphanage: the period of dates from September 25, 2019 to October 10, 2019, but no later than October 31, 2019. The approximate date of the master class for children in the hospital: the period of dates from October 15, 2019 to November 5, 2019, but no later than November 25, 2019. The dates are directly dependent on the fundraising, and the final date will be coordinated with the staff of the institution and will be reported to each sponsor individually via email or social network Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/ediblebouquets.ua​)

You Can Help!

story:
Why Should You Support This?

If you haven't yet watched the "dining out -redefined" video, above, please take four minutes to watch it and discover how much better your dining out experience could be.

But it isn't just about you. By supporting the development of the eatstertm app, you will also be helping millions of other people. Watch the "Help Annie" and/or "Help Dennis" videos, above. There are currently over 3.5 million people in the U.S. on the autism spectrum; approximately 3.3 million people affected by social anxiety disorder; and approximately 1 million people in the U.S. who are deaf. The eatstertm app will make the experience of going out for a meal a possibility for between four and five million of these people.

If You Own or Manage a Restaurant:
You know that some restaurants (e.g., Taco Bell and Starbucks) already have apps. Others (e.g., McDonald's and Panera) are developing their own apps. You know you would benefit from the lower labor cost and increased customer satisfaction that will come with having an app. Watch the eatstertm demo for restaurants video (above, blue background).

You may remember a time when people had three or four gas company credit cards and possibly three or four department store credit cards. How many of those do you have in your wallet now? The eatstertm app is the Visa of restaurant apps.

Find out more about why your restaurant should use the eatstertm app.


What We Need & What You Get

"We need money" - Capt. Obvious

Money raised through this campaign will be used to cover the expenses of development, testing and marketing. See the table below for a detailed break out of the expenses to be covered.

But we need something more than money!
We need your support to show the restaruants that they should use the app. The way to support the app is to become a backer. If you don't want to buy a perk, we're perfectly cool with that. But to become a backer, please at least click on the BACK IT button and chip in a dollar. That way you will be in the database so we can keep you up to date.

If we sell 15,000 buttons we will make our goal, but if we only raise $20,000 from 20,000 backers at $1 each, that will be enough to start the programming. And 20,000 backers will be enough to attract investors to make up the balance of the budget.

How often do you get a chance to make history for only $1?

Of course, if you want a souveneir, feel free to buy a perk. Shipping within the U.S. is included for all perks.

T-shirts with designs for autism awareness and deaf awareness coming soon!

This is why we need the money:

  To Do   Cost
  Idea   DONE
  Market Research   DONE
  Name, Logo, Branding   DONE
  Organize Corporation   DONE
  Develop Specs for Apps   DONE
  Provisional Business Methods Patent   DONE
  Locate and Recruit Developers   DONE
  Pay Developers   $60,000
  Pay Management ($2k/Mo +taxes)   $18,000
  Pay Bookkeeper   $600
  Pay Corporation Taxes   $2,000
  Cover Miscellaneous Expenses   $1,400
  Convert Provisional Patent to Full Patent   $15,000 to $20,000
  Marketing   $20,000 to $25,000
  Indiegogo Campaign   $5,000 to $22,500
  TOTAL   Approx. $150,000

 

We will donate 20% of any amount raised over $150,000 to support organizations helping autistic and deaf people.

 

If You Own or Manage a Restaurant:
We offer a special set of perks that include a deeply discounted pre-release price on a license for the restaurant version of the app.


So, Who Is Developing The Apps?

We believe that we are justifyably proud of the team we have put together to build the eatster™ apps. Every member of the team is a highly qualified professional committed to making the apps nothing short of excellent.

GEO. McCALIP, the President
Geo. has been working with computers professionally for over forty years. His background includes working as an analyst and lead programmer on management systems for a number of companies including Western Digital, TRW, and Denny's.

BOB LISSNER, Customer App Development
Bob is a highly experienced programmer with over three decades experience. He singlehandedly wrote Appleworks for the Apple II and has spent the last five years specializing in iOS and Android apps.

KENNY WYLAND, Restaurant App Development
Kenny is a software engineering nerd with more than two decades of experience and a degree in Computer Science. The skills that helped him survive and thrive in the dotcoms of the late 90s led him to Google where he worked on large-scale analytical systems until 2009 when he became an entrepreneur and started developing mobile apps for iOS and Android.

KYLE HUMFELD, Restaurant App Development
Kyle has been programming computers since elementary school, and worked at Boeing for over 17 years, developing nearly 200 web-based systems while earning a Master's Degree in Systems Engineering. He's been developing mobile apps for Android, iOS, and Windows Phone since 2009.

If You Own or Manage a Restaurant:
We are looking for Development Partners to give us feedback and help test the app. In exchange for your help, you will get a 50% dsicount on the app license. We will double the length of any pre-release purchase for any approved development partner. See our web site for details.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you have become a backer or not, there are ways you can help:

  • Get the word out. Let your friends know about our campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Once the app is out, you can recommend it to your friends, and to restaurants.
  • If you are a backer, we will let you know when and how you can help.
Thank you for your support!
If you are having difficulty ordering a T-shirt:
This s a problem on the Mac running OSX that has been reported to Indiegogo. The problem manifests in two different ways:
1) The T-shirt perk does not even appear.
2) The size and color choices do not dislpay properly.

Until this is fixed, the work around is to use a different device and/or a different browser.
story_txt:
Why Should You Support This?
If you haven't yet watched the "dining out -redefined" video, above, please take four minutes to watch it and discover how much better your dining out experience could be.
But it isn't just about you. By supporting the development of the eatstertm app, you will also be helping millions of other people. Watch the "Help Annie" and/or "Help Dennis" videos, above. There are currently over 3.5 million people in the U.S. on the autism spectrum; approximately 3.3 million people affected by social anxiety disorder; and approximately 1 million people in the U.S. who are deaf. The eatstertm app will make the experience of going out for a meal a possibility for between four and five million of these people.

If You Own or Manage a Restaurant:You know that some restaurants (e.g., Taco Bell and Starbucks) already have apps. Others (e.g., McDonald's and Panera) are developing their own apps. You know you would benefit from the lower labor cost and increased customer satisfaction that will come with having an app. Watch the eatstertm demo for restaurants video (above, blue background).
You may remember a time when people had three or four gas company credit cards and possibly three or four department store credit cards. How many of those do you have in your wallet now? The eatstertm app is the Visa of restaurant apps.
Find out more about why your restaurant should use the eatstertm app.

story:
Joi Elixirs started out as a mission to add nourishing, herbs and spices to my family’s diet in a delicious and convenient way.  My new goal?  To encourage self-care and balance to everyone everywhere, especially on the go.  I turned to the herbs and spices enjoyed throughout the ages for nutritional benefits, and often as medicine.  Family and friends, who taste-tested our blends, described Joi Elixirs as refreshing, uplifting and balancing.  Thanks to their convenient size they were taken along on an array of daily activities, including workouts and errands.  It turns out that our shots were  a hit, especially before and after workouts, delivering a clean, balanced boost.  We pride ourselves on being vegan, made with natural herbs and spices and steeped to perfection with no added sugar or preservatives.  Our team is connected through our passion for plants, people and the spirit of giving.  That’s why Joi Elixirs proudly partners with Warer.Org by donating 5% of profits to provide safe water and transform lives!  

- Essie Hayes, Founder

 

 
   

Joi Elixir’s Founder Essie Hayes conceived of our blends from childhood memories of her mother preparing meals with fresh herbs and vegetables from the family's garden.  As a child, she was fascinated by stories of her grandmother’s herbal practice.  She had a gift for healing the family’s ailments with herbs she handpicked and stored in unlabeled jars.    

Life is busy and we don’t always have the time or space to garden.  We believe it is in those moments that nourishing foods, our first line of defense, are needed most.  Following in the footsteps of our founder’s mother and grandmother we are on a mission to inspire healthy living and balance through good nutrition and an active lifestyle.  

Our herbal elixir-shots are hand crafted to lift, refresh and balance.  We are much more than an elixir line, we’re a lifestyle.  One that is tuned-in, proactive and vibrant!

 

 JOI ELIXIRS are great for any time of day, especially before and after fitness activities.  They are also great enhancers for your cup of tea or smoothie.

  • Clean, Vegan Shots
  • Refreshing, Uplifting and Balancing
  • Boosters for Before and After Workouts
  • Ginger (with Lemongrass)
  • Rose Hip (with Hibiscus)
  • Turmeric (with Lemon & Ginger)
  • Whole Leaf
  • Natural herbs and spices
  • Blended and steeped to perfection
  • No added sugar
  • Preservative free
  • Convenient and nourishing
  • Enhancers for your cup of tea or smoothie

Rose Hips (with Hibiscus)

  • More than the fruit of rose bushes
  • Boost immunity with a powerful Vitamin C punch
  • Anti-oxidant properties

Turmeric (with Lemon & Ginger)

  • More than just an ingredient in curry
  • Plays an important role Ayurvedic medicine
  • Therapeutic  & Anti-inflammatory properties

Ginger (with Lemongrass)

  • More than a seasoning
  • Medicinal properties, valued throughout the ages
  • Soothes Digestive System
  • Potent anti-inflammatory compounds called gingerols

  • Orders will be prepared and shipped 3-4 weeks after completion of our pre-order campaign.

  • New product development, including Joi Elixir snack bites
  • Packaging worthy of the deliciousness inside
  • Scaling up for our online e-commerce platform

5% of profits are donated to Water.org.  Water.org is an international nonprofit organization that has positively transformed millions of lives around the world through access to safe water and sanitation. Founded by Gary White and Matt Damon, Water.org pioneers market-driven financial solutions to the global water crisis. For more than 25 years, they've been providing families with hope, health and the opportunity to break the cycle of poverty.

Why Water?

  • 844 million people — 1 in 9 — lack access to safe water.
  • 2.3 billion people — 1 in 3 — lack access to a toilet.
  • Every 90 seconds a child dies from a water-related disease.
  • Water, sanitation and hygiene related disease kills nearly 1 million people each year.
  • Women and children bear the primary responsibility for water collection.
  • Women and children spend 258 million hours every day collecting water. This is time spent not working, caring for family members or attending school.
  • Women and girls often spend up to 6 hours every day collecting water.
  • Women and girls living without a toilet spend 266 million hours every day finding a place to go.
  • Globally, 1/3 of all schools lack access to basic water and sanitation.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

          Veggie Hut is a vegan food truck serving custom burgers, dogs and sides in Orange County California. Having been vegan together for seven years, Michael and Georgina have made many delicious plant based meals together over the years. Michael with over 20 years of culinary work experience and Georgina a foodie with a culinary arts degree have come together to create an amazing menu. Veggie Hut's menu places vegan versions of some of our favorite junk food from various fast food chains under one portable roof, a food truck. Just take a look at VeggieHut OC on instagram to get an idea of what we will be offering.

          We are on Indiegogo funding our food truck and we are trying to get people to donate $1 each. Of course you could donate more if you would like, and it would be appreciated, but we feel pretty much everyone could spare a $1! Just a buck! Instead of offering different prizes to people depending on how much they contribute we would like to take this approach, just donate $1, tell your friends, and hopefully they will tell about 30,000 more. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

           Veggie Hut is seeking $30,000 for startup cost. We will be purchasing a used food truck, additional kitchen equipment, a decorative wrap, pos system, insurance, commissary deposit and initial food inventory.

           The truck itself will be the most costly part, depending on the quality of equipment on the truck (if any) and the condition of the truck (running vs not running). We have found used trucks from $5,000 that would need some TLC, up to $15,000 or $20,000 that would contain everything we need.

           Wraps for the trucks range from $3000 to $5000. Wraps replace custom paint jobs.

           An initial $3000 to $4000 would be needed to purchase kitchen supplies. This will cover everything from serving utensils to hamburger buns, at least for the first month.

           Any funds left over at this point will go towards the pos system, insurance, commissary deposit and some of the unexpected cost that we are sure to encounter.

           What you will get from Veggie Hut is delicious vegan food. The customer will be receiving a quality product that is full of flavor, affordable and satisfying. Veggie Hut's menu items will be prepared by a chef with over twenty years in the business who knows how to prepare food properly, safely and consistently. At Veggie Hut, Michael and Georgina look forward to satisfying customers with amazing food done right.

 

The Impact

            As vegans, Michael and Georgina find more and more dining options available to them with each passing year. Yet they still notice items or meals that in order to have, must be made at home. With a love for food and cooking, and wanting to share food with others, they created Veggie Hut. Veggie Hut will be a place a vegan and meat eater can both go eat, enjoy their meals, be full and not feel that one person had to compromise or suffer through a meal for the other. We will be providing plant based meals for not only vegans and vegetarians, but for those who may need to greatly reduce animal intake for medical reasons.

           Being in Orange County we have noticed that almost all of the vegan restaurants are found in the same concentrated area, with little to no options in South Orange County. We would like to change this by focusing on South Orange County and be located close to the coast. We would be your vegan 'Cajun' burger after the beach or an order of fried zucchini with homemade ranch after cycling up and down P.C.H. The combination of vegans, vegetarians and all around health conscious folks in Orange County, especially near Beach Cities, will allow Veggie Hut to provide a very positive impact on the community.

Risks & Challenges

            We are expecting a lot of work, long days and lots of learning experiences as we, Veggie Hut, learn the in's and out's of owning and operating a food truck. Michael, with his exstensive culinary background has helped to open restaurants, create menus, develop recipes, plan special events, catered parties and worked many many hours on kitchen lines to be as prepared as he can be to manage the kitchen at Veggie Hut. 

             There is always the risk that another vegan restaurant could have the same idea and open a store or food truck close to Veggie Hut. There could be a well established restaurant looking to expand, or a brand new place with a similar menu. This is always a possibility, but we are confident that Veggie Hut's menu and recipes will make us stand out.

           

 

Other Ways You Can Help

             Please help Veggie Hut by sharing this campaign with your friends and family and on social media. Please also follow us on Instagram @veggiehutoc.

There could be a well established restaurant looking to expand, or a brand new place with a similar menu. This is always a possibility, but we are confident that Veggie Hut's menu and recipes will make us stand out.
           
 

Other Ways You Can Help
             Please help Veggie Hut by sharing this campaign with your friends and family and on social media. Please also follow us on Instagram @veggiehutoc.

story:
The Right Tool For The Job

 

 

The Smash Axe is the perfect addition to any kitchen or backyard barbecue!  This truly versatile piece of culinary equipment is ready to do all of the pressing, smashing, and crushing needed to get that delicious meal to the table.

No more flattening chicken breast with the bottom of a frying pan so it cooks evenly.  No more using the base of a measuring cup to crush walnuts for your banana bread.  No more clumsily using a spatula and rolling pin to make homemade smash burgers.  Time to get the right tool for the job.

 

 

Design

 

The Smash Axe was designed from the ground up for culinary use.  Every aspect from geometry to material selection has been carefully evaluated with the kitchen in mind. Professional chefs, home cooks, and backyard BBQers alike will enjoy this unique addition to their tool set.

 

 

The base is a solid piece of food-grade stainless steel, which makes the Smash Axe robust, corrosion resistant, and extremely easy to clean.  Measuring 5 inches in diameter and 1/4 inch thick, the circular base is large enough to efficiently tackle any job while still being easy to control.  At 2.88 lbs, the Smash Axe has enough mass to handle bigger jobs without tiring you out.  Let the weight do the work!

 

 

Each Smash Axe handle is made of solid oak and is hand picked for its quality, finish, and wood grain.  The sweeping handle profile ensures a solid, comfortable grip for any hand size.  Ergonomics are important, especially in the kitchen.

 

 

Product Specifications

 

Perks

 

 

FREE Shipping

As a thank you to all of our backers, we are offering FREE shipping on all perks!  At this time, Smash Axe is only available in the United States but we hope to expand to more countries in the near future.

 

Timeline

 

Why an Axe?

 

The unique design aesthetic of the Smash Axe started with the humble homemade smash burger.  Smash burgers made in the backyard on a flat top or in the kitchen in a cast iron pan are delicious, but exceedingly difficult to make.  Pressing down with a spatula can be problematic.  Most spatula designs put your hand perilously close to the heat and the grease splatter during the smashing process.  It is also very difficult to press down with enough force using a flimsy, narrow, and awkward spatula.  One method to generate enough force is to use a rolling pin with a spatula when making smash burgers.  However, the addition of a rolling pin makes the whole process an awkward, two-handed operation.

The discovery of an old, rusty axe during a backyard smash burger cookout was the spark of inspiration.  The handle was comfortable, the weight of the tool felt good, and the added handle length would keep hands away from the hot grill or pan.  Countless prototypes were fabricated, tested, and tweaked.  The result, a piece of culinary equipment that is fun to use, versatile, and a guaranteed conversation starter. 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

MANUFACTURING - Our team has already contacted and worked with several manufacturers to mitigate risks for both stainless steel casting and oak handle making. However, the Smash Axe is a new product that will be manufactured at large scale for the first time. New products always have a chance to present unforeseen challenges. We will leverage decades of engineering expertise to tackle these challenges as they arise.

FULFILLMENT - The global pandemic has impacted how all of us live our lives and conduct business. Shipping and transportation have undergone radical changes in the last year and will continue to change as the public health climate shifts. One way we have been able to mitigate the risk of delays is to only ship the Smash Axe in the United States. This was a very challenging decision to make and we hope to expand to more countries in the future. Our number one priority is to be as transparent as possible with our backers. Regular updates will be sent at every stage of the process.

SAFETY - The Smash Axe is a tool. It is not a toy and should not be used in ways other than its intended purpose. Misuse or mishandling can be dangerous and may result in injury.

story:
Who?

My name is Laura. I am a young French entrepreneur living in Asia. In 2017, I launched Le Petit Croissant, a breakfast delivery service offering the best French brunches at home and delicious breakfasts for your office meetings. Le Petit Croissant operates both in Hong Kong and Singapore. We have already delivered to hundreds of prestigious companies and thousands of families at home who are loving our pastries, our breads and all of our other French items.

Why this project?

Until today, we've been a delivery-only business as we were baking from our central kitchen with no visibility and no possibility for self pick-up. I am finally opening our first takeaway shop where you will be able to collect your bread and pastries from!

With this new kitchen I will finally be able to meet you in person when you collect your orders. We will also launch same-day deliveries and we will be able to organize bread workshops for small groups of people. 

All those aspects seem like a natural way to grow Le Petit Croissant and its community.

What We Need: 

I need help raising funds to do the renovation works of the kitchen so that it will become a beautiful space to work in, learn and be inspired! I want the local community to be able to find a great bakery where they can come to have some delicious bread and coffee, learn in day courses and join events with other bakers and foodies!

Where?

After long hours of research and dozens of shop visits, I found the perfect kitchen space for Le Petit Croissant. It is located at 338 Changi Road in Singapore. It’s a very convenient location on ground floor, which is perfect for deliveries and self pick-up. The space is bright and beautiful. When I saw it I knew it would be perfect for Le Petit Croissant ? The tenancy agreement is already signed and the lease will start in October 2020.  

How can you help?

If you live in Singapore you can pre-book your brunch, your bread or your bread workshop with us! If you are outside of Singapore, we also have great rewards as you can follow our bread courses online. You can also get our cute embroidered t-shirt delivered to you anywhere in the world.

story:
Using the company’s mobile app, users can order fresh groceries, ready-to-eat meals and household goods that will be delivered within 10-15 minutes, says the startup, which will be servicing SoMa, South Park, Mission Bay, Japantown, Hayes Valley and other areas. The company hopes to open 150 “dark stores” on the West Coast as part of its infrastructure.

Vitaly Aleksandrov, CEO, and co-founder of Food Rocket, said: “The level of competition in this market in the U.S. is still manageable, which is why we have the opportunity to become leaders in the sphere of fast delivery of basic products and household goods. We aim to replace brick-and-mortar supermarkets and to change consumers’ current habits in regards to grocery shopping.”

What can we say? Good luck?

story:
RESUMEN

Todo este proyecto tiene una base emocional y una racional.

Es el sueño de un crío de padre español y madre sudafricana que cuando era pequeñito iba a visitar regularmente a su familía en Sudáfrica y al volver traía consigo el producto típico nacional de ahí, el biltong, para compartirlo con sus amigos y familiares españoles. Tal era el éxito que, con sólo 10 añitos y enamorado del producto, se prometió que un día lo comercializaría en Europa porque lo bueno, hay que compartirlo.

Tras años de experiencia laboral y un MBA se decidió que había llegado el momento y en 2014 fundó African Tastes con el objetivo de fusionar conceptos sudafricanos con alimentos de aquí y de esta manera innovar Aportando Salud a la Sociedad.

La base racional es el crecimiento constante de la categoría de snacks. Cada vez tenemos menos tiempo para pararnos a comer y picamos mucho entre horas, pero la oferta de snacks está muy limitada: el 99.9% de los snacks de un supermercado son carbohidratos y grasas; su consumo en exceso junto con una falta de actividad física son la principal causa del sedentarismo. Por ello es clave hacer deporte y comer de forma equilibrada.

El Biltong es el primer snack proteico gourmet natural del mercado. La proteina es más saciante que el carbohidrato o la grasa, no se acumula (engorda) y es esencial para la regeneración de los órganos vitales y músculos. Se trata de "un bistec para llevar" ya que lo unica que hacemos es macerarlo, especiarlo, secarlo, cortarlo y envasarlo en amosfera controlada. Un producto minimamente procesado, sin alergenos ni aditivos (gama Sasana) y certificado Paleo y Halal.

 

Desde 2015 que empezamos a fabricar y comercializar a pequeña escala y en apenas 2 años ya somos el referente en el sur de Europa y contamos con 2 gamas (www.kubdu.com) y (www.sasanabiltong.com) una gastronomica y otra saludable, con entorno 12 referencias.

Premiado Internacionalmente con el International Taste&Quality Institute award otorgado en Bruselas por más de 15 escuelas de chefs y sommeliers internacionales.

Certificado Halal y Paleo.

 

     

Durante este tiempo hemos tirado de recursos propios, un prestamo bancario y de FFF (family, friends & fouls) pero introducir una nueva categoría es muy costoso; Certificados, ferias y degustaciones han diezmado la tesorería y el proyecto peligra seriamente.

Mientras que buscamos inversores y financiación, lanzamos esta campaña en busca de aquellas personas que apoyan proyectos con alma, con presente y futuro y que aportan un valor tangible a la sociedad.

Tu ayuda en esta campaña significará un balón de aire que nos permitirá seguir hasta cerrar un acuerdo de recapitalización, y ayudará a dar a conocer nuestro novedoso snack. Posiblemente seas un nuevo consumidor el día de mañana :) 

 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 

Pretendemos llegar a unas ventas de 20.000€ en esta campaña, que servirian para

  •  Participar en la Feria Arnold Classic Europe en Barcelona en Septiembre
  •   Tener un fondo de maniobra para poder hacer frente la entrada en algunos supermercados en septiembre ( Pagan tarde :)
  •  Si logramos recaudar más, lo invertiremos en sumar un Export Manager al equipo.
 

El impacto

Colaborar en esta campaña es esencial para:
  • Mantener viva una empresa con aporte social (evitar su cierre prematuro)
  • Promover un snack saludable que está teniendo una gran aceptación entre deportistas.
  • Apoyar a un emprendedor/soñador en su realización. 
  • Somos una empresa responsable y ética que pretende promover un modelo de empresa sostenible y comprometida. Si no la apoyamos entre todos, solo perdurará la empresa clásica, la del modelo del s.XX orientada exclusivamente a beneficios.

Ayúdanos a lograr ese pequeño volumen extra, no sólo comprando uno de los packs sino divulgando y dando a conocer el producto.

Gracias. Muchas gracias :)

 

Riesgos y desafíos

Somos una empresa joven y nuestro principal obstáculo es cómo financiar el crecimiento.

Por toda Europa no para de crecer la categoria de snacks cárnicos y nosotros traemos la propuesta más auténtica y diferencial porque somos los únicos que:

  •  Elaboramos artesanalmente en España.
  •   Con carne de proximidad premium (granjas a menos de 50km)
  •   Certificado Halal y Paleo
  •   Receta familiar genuina y exclusiva
  •   Variedades exclusivas (gama pollo o ternera al ajo negro)

El primer obstáculo a salvar es la continuidad de la empresa a nivel financiero.

Luego promover el volumen de negocio que se lograría mediante acuerdos de exportación y elaboración de marca privada (acuerdos que entrarian en vigor en septiembre/octubre).

El segundo obstáculo será la financiación del crecimiento para la cual nos asociaremos con un partner que nos ayude a crecer.

¿Nos echas un cable? 
 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Recuerda que puedes ayudar:

  1. difundiendo esta campaña,
  2. convirtiendote en consumidor del producto
  3. o haciendole llegar la información a potenciales consumidores o tiendas.

story:
Short Summary

We are a team of volunteers from Europe that are involved in development projects in Zambia. We are planning to make the Green House for a proper nutrition source but we also we have projects as an irrigation system and building a hatchery. Our projects are meant to provide food for around 100 street children but also for the children joining the local school.  We have a prototype of the GreenHouse project but suggestions are more than welcome.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We estimated that GreenHouse Project will cost us around 500 euros that will include:

-  bamboo wood, green house foil, bugs net, bricks, cement, nails, manpower cost, fertilizer, seeds, other details.

The funds will go in the project no matter we don't reach the goals but the size and the quality will be lower than we planned. 

 

The Impact

Giving a wide variety of food for the kids will help them have better health, better focus but also will serve as an example to the people living in the communities around.

Risks & Challenges.

Our main challenge is the lack of experience in the field. The prototype we have in mind is based on our ideas, multitude of video that inspired us and the limited resources that we have available.The risks is that the construction plan might change on the way due to budget, materials found, quality of soil etc.

story:
In less time than it takes you to season your steaks, Steakizmo allows you to measure the level to which your steaks are cooked so that you get your perfect steak, every time.


Our grilling gadget is a simpler, cleaner and easier way to consistently check the doneness of your steak, no matter the thickness or the cut, all without the inconvenience of probes or wires.

 

 



 

 

 


 

Cooking the perfect steak at home is a rare thing. We understand that not everyone comes with a culinary background, so we designed Steakizmo to allow anyone with any skill level to operate and read with ease. With Steakizmo, you’ll know exactly when your steak is cooked the way you want it without all the fuss.

 


 

              


Who are we to tell you what YOUR rare or medium is? Steakizmo comes ready to use and set to industry standards. However, you have the ability to tweak Steakizmo’s settings using the simple sliders on the Steakizmo app. It’s perfect for grill masters who know exactly what they want!




Gone are the days of poking your steak with a fork or probing it with long needles or thermometers. Remember, you’re testing a steak, not a cake. With Steakizmo, you’ll get a simple, clear reading on the digital display within three seconds without piercing the steak. Once you’ve measured one steak, you’re instantly ready to measure another. No wires and no probes with all of the flavor.





The main part of Steakizmo is water resistant and can be wet wiped, while the bottom part, which touches the meat, can be detached and washed by hand or in the dishwasher.






Steakizmo is fully developed, tested and ready for manufacture, we have used the best in the industry to design and build a quality product ready to help you cook a perfect steak!

 
 

Instead of measuring your steak using a probe, Steakizmo measures the firmness of the meat through the pressure exerted onto the device’s sensor. The data is recorded by an electronic meter that sends the reading to the microprocessor.  

Steakizmo comes with two buttons, one that change the thickness of the steak being tested in measurements of .5 inches up to 3 inches and the other to reset Steakizmo following a reading. We also included a handy measurement indicator on the side so you can easily measure the thickness of the meat prior to cooking. It doesn’t have to be an exact measurement.



The microprocessor uses the thickness and resistance of the meat to calculate the level to which the steak is cooked, which then displays the result on an LCD screen in a simple, clear reading for you within 3 seconds. Basically we mechanized an age old chef’s method of testing a steak with your fingers to judge the firmness of a steak.

 







 

Hey, you made it down this far, why stop now?! While you might not be able to support us with a pledge, you can always help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!  

Make sure you watch all the videos right to the end to find the ‘Easter egg’!  

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Steakizmo a success.



 






               


FAQs


How can I get in touch with your team?

If you want to get it touch with the Steakizmo team about our campaign, or if you just fancy a chat, then please send over an email to hello@steakizmo.com or reach out via our Facebook or Twitter accounts. We’re a social lot and will be happy to help.

 

How do we know Steakizmo is safe?

We take product safety very seriously and Steakizmo meets the relevant safety standards in each country we are shipping to.  Our team and partners have extensive experience in commercial product design, so we know our stuff!

 

Why are you raising funds via Indiegogo?

Indiegogo allows us to  jump start our production & get Steakizmo to you guys quicker than the usual methods.  As an international platform, Indiegogo also get us in front of like minder folk across Europe and the North America.

 

What will happen after the campaign?

We will issue regular updates, and will even include a few snaps, throughout the manufacturing process and will keep all our backers fully updated.

 

Why is there a delay from pledge to shipping?

By supporting us through our campaign, you will help pay for our first full production run which we will ship to you as soon they’re ready on a first come, first served basis.

 

When will the first Steakizmos be delivered?

Deliveries will begin from May 2018, subject to no unforeseen production delays.

 

Why do you offer local shipping charges for the USA if you are based in the U.K.?
As we have a substantial following in the US, we have setup a US based distribution centre, so we are able to pass on the savings to you guys!

 

Where are you shipping to?

The territories we are shipping to are listed within the pledge sections, shipping rates will depend on where you are in the world.

 

I’m in the USA, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?

We will have stock landed both here in the UK and in the US from the beginning of May for deliveries to start from our UK and US distribution centres.  If this looks likely to change for whatever reason we will of course be informing supporters as soon as possible.

 

I’m in Australia, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?

We fully intend on bringing Steakizmo to your region in line with everyone else.  We are busy working our hardest to bring Steakizmo to you but we don’t want you to have to pay ridiculous shipping charges.  You are more than welcome to purchase a Steakizmo through our campaign but please be aware that you may have to wait a little bit longer to get your Steakizmo delivered.

 

I am having trouble paying for my perk. What should I do?

Please email Indiegogo's support team with details so that their team of experts can help troubleshoot any issues.  A variety of factors can cause failed payments so the helpful support team works with you individually to help you! They can be reached at: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/requests
story_txt:
In less time than it takes you to season your steaks, Steakizmo allows you to measure the level to which your steaks are cooked so that you get your perfect steak, every time.Our grilling gadget is a simpler, cleaner and easier way to consistently check the doneness of your steak, no matter the thickness or the cut, all without the inconvenience of probes or wires.      Cooking the perfect steak at home is a rare thing. We understand that not everyone comes with a culinary background, so we designed Steakizmo to allow anyone with any skill level to operate and read with ease. With Steakizmo, you’ll know exactly when your steak is cooked the way you want it without all the fuss.                Who are we to tell you what YOUR rare or medium is? Steakizmo comes ready to use and set to industry standards. However, you have the ability to tweak Steakizmo’s settings using the simple sliders on the Steakizmo app. It’s perfect for grill masters who know exactly what they want!Gone are the days of poking your steak with a fork or probing it with long needles or thermometers. Remember, you’re testing a steak, not a cake. With Steakizmo, you’ll get a simple, clear reading on the digital display within three seconds without piercing the steak. Once you’ve measured one steak, you’re instantly ready to measure another. No wires and no probes with all of the flavor.The main part of Steakizmo is water resistant and can be wet wiped, while the bottom part, which touches the meat, can be detached and washed by hand or in the dishwasher.Steakizmo is fully developed, tested and ready for manufacture, we have used the best in the industry to design and build a quality product ready to help you cook a perfect steak!  Instead of measuring your steak using a probe, Steakizmo measures the firmness of the meat through the pressure exerted onto the device’s sensor. The data is recorded by an electronic meter that sends the reading to the microprocessor.  Steakizmo comes with two buttons, one that change the thickness of the steak being tested in measurements of .5 inches up to 3 inches and the other to reset Steakizmo following a reading. We also included a handy measurement indicator on the side so you can easily measure the thickness of the meat prior to cooking. It doesn’t have to be an exact measurement.The microprocessor uses the thickness and resistance of the meat to calculate the level to which the steak is cooked, which then displays the result on an LCD screen in a simple, clear reading for you within 3 seconds. Basically we mechanized an age old chef’s method of testing a steak with your fingers to judge the firmness of a steak. 


 Hey, you made it down this far, why stop now?! While you might not be able to support us with a pledge, you can always help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!  Make sure you watch all the videos right to the end to find the ‘Easter egg’!  We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Steakizmo a success.                FAQsHow can I get in touch with your team?If you want to get it touch with the Steakizmo team about our campaign, or if you just fancy a chat, then please send over an email to hello@steakizmo.com or reach out via our Facebook or Twitter accounts. We’re a social lot and will be happy to help. How do we know Steakizmo is safe?We take product safety very seriously and Steakizmo meets the relevant safety standards in each country we are shipping to.  Our team and partners have extensive experience in commercial product design, so we know our stuff! Why are you raising funds via Indiegogo?Indiegogo allows us to  jump start our production & get Steakizmo to you guys quicker than the usual methods.  As an international platform, Indiegogo also get us in front of like minder folk across Europe and the North America. What will happen after the campaign?We will issue regular updates, and will even include a few snaps, throughout the manufacturing process and will keep all our backers fully updated. Why is there a delay from pledge to shipping?By supporting us through our campaign, you will help pay for our first full production run which we will ship to you as soon they’re ready on a first come, first served basis. When will the first Steakizmos be delivered?Deliveries will begin from May 2018, subject to no unforeseen production delays. Why do you offer local shipping charges for the USA if you are based in the U.K.? As we have a substantial following in the US, we have setup a US based distribution centre, so we are able to pass on the savings to you guys! Where are you shipping to?The territories we are shipping to are listed within the pledge sections, shipping rates will depend on where you are in the world. I’m in the USA, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?We will have stock landed both here in the UK and in the US from the beginning of May for deliveries to start from our UK and US distribution centres.  If this looks likely to change for whatever reason we will of course be informing supporters as soon as possible. I’m in Australia, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?We fully intend on bringing Steakizmo to your region in line with everyone else.  We are busy working our hardest to bring Steakizmo to you but we don’t want you to have to pay ridiculous shipping charges.  You are more than welcome to purchase a Steakizmo through our campaign but please be aware that you may have to wait a little bit longer to get your Steakizmo delivered. I am having trouble paying for my perk. What should I do?Please email Indiegogo's support team with details so that their team of experts can help troubleshoot any issues.  A variety of factors can cause failed payments so the helpful support team works with you individually to help you! They can be reached at: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/requests

story:
• A hot and healthy cooked meal for children’s who are hungry and needy during the school holiday without getting a proper meal.
  • It is important to me and for my groups to help , support and donate, we are starting this small campaign to help people with funds, who always ready (the organizer and small individual NGO) to care and support needy people.
  • This campaign will be supporting 100% to The Akshaya Patra Foundation UK who serve the food to the children (THE FUTURE )
  • 3 million children are at risk of going hungry during the school holidays in the UK. TAPF UK (The Akshaya Patra Foundation UK) is a charity providing hot and healthy meals to deprived children to tackle the holiday hunger problem.
  • Watch us in operation feeding 70 children daily at Burgess Sport’s holiday club, which organizes sports and activities all through the holidays for children from deprived families in the inner city of London, borough of Southwark.
  • For many of the beneficiaries, this might be the only meal they get during the holidays, in the absence of which they run the risk of surviving on unhealthy stodgy foods, or going hungry altogether.
story_txt:
A hot and healthy cooked meal for children’s who are hungry and needy during the school holiday without getting a proper meal.
It is important to me and for my groups to help , support and donate, we are starting this small campaign to help people with funds, who always ready (the organizer and small individual NGO) to care and support needy people.
This campaign will be supporting 100% to The Akshaya Patra Foundation UK who serve the food to the children (THE FUTURE )
3 million children are at risk of going hungry during the school holidays in the UK. TAPF UK (The Akshaya Patra Foundation UK) is a charity providing hot and healthy meals to deprived children to tackle the holiday hunger problem.
Watch us in operation feeding 70 children daily at Burgess Sport’s holiday club, which organizes sports and activities all through the holidays for children from deprived families in the inner city of London, borough of Southwark.
For many of the beneficiaries, this might be the only meal they get during the holidays, in the absence of which they run the risk of surviving on unhealthy stodgy foods, or going hungry altogether.
campaign_city: Burgess Sports holiday club, United Kingdom

story:
The µPantry

 

We all want to eat highly nutritious food. The best way to ensure that we do is to have healthy ingredients readily available. But keeping fresh food on hand is a challenge because managing a pantry isn't easy. This causes some problems in our fast-paced society. It seems that we are often willing to sacrifice our health for something faster and easier. 

The easiest thing is to grab a package off the shelf. The package isn't pretty. It probably has a bunch of logos and ads on it. You can likely find a spot for it on the shelf. It will block the walnuts but that's not a big deal... right?

To solve this problem we have created the µPantry (pronounced micro-Pantry): a piece of functional art that combines elegance and efficiency into a simple design that makes food preparation faster and easier. 

 

 

By focusing on making the process of using your ingredients fast and easy, we believe it's possible to increase the probability you will eat a healthy meal. Entice yourself with beautiful ingredients that are perfectly organized and instantly accessible. 

 

 

Four different sizes of jars give you instant access to a huge variety of your most commonly used ingredients. The jar volumes range from 2 oz all the way up to 16 oz. That's a full pint! What will you choose? Nuts, seeds, grains, dried fruits, tea blends... It's completely customizable to your needs.

 

 

We've also created a fantastic method for creating your grocery list: when a jar gets low, flip it around so the label is facing outward. Now the names of all the items that need to be refilled are displayed as a list.

 

 

An optional feature is this creatively hidden cabinet that includes all the tools that will help you perfect the use of this innovative system. Access the cabinet by effortlessly removing the hatch and sliding it into a cleverly designed slot. Each of the cabinet's tools has a uniquely crafted location, keeping it all perfectly organized and instantly accessible.

 

The Hidden Cabinet

 

 

Backer Perks

 

 

The Node and the Nook

The Node and the Nook both come with 26 glass jars with metal lids and an erasable metallic marker for customizing the lids. The difference is that the Nook contains a hidden tool cabinet that includes 9 stainless steel tools for using and filling your ingredients. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

3D Ktchy Coasters

Rising from the ashes is this interesting set of beverage coasters. Using excess material from our production process, we've created this sweet 3D coaster set. The Ktchy style is rugged, practical, and intriguing. We kept to that theme for this perk. The set of 5 coasters click together into a stack that is compact and fun. Together they take on a distinctively meta quality. 

 

$25 Perk or $15 as Add-On

 

Company Mission

 

Good for your wallet. Good for the planet. 

Our µPantry is designed to solve a broad range of problems and aspires to have a beneficial impact on society and the environment. We want to take the hassle out of buying in the bulk aisle. This means that the packaging doesn't have to be produced in the first place, and doesn't have to be disposed of or recycled. This yields a return on your investment. Bulk food is cheaper because you don't have to pay for all those fancy packages that go right into the trash. Win/Win.

 

 

Ktchy - Behind the Scenes Clip

 

    Funding Goal

    Ktchy is a (very) small company outside of Portland, OR with a passion to create innovative products that you will love. We use good quality wood, glass, and metal to create a strong and durable piece of functional art.  

    We've already worked out the kinks for a high-quality production process and can create 10 units per week. We are limiting this campaign at 50 total units to guaranteed fulfillment by Dec 15th, 2019. 

     

    Reaching our campaign goal of $10,000 will allow us to really get things rolling. We want to bootstrap to success. By this, we mean that we would like to reinvest the profits from this campaign into expanding our manufacturing capabilities. Then... rinse and repeat: launch a campaign for a new design and again reinvest the profit into expansion of our capabilities. A few iterations of this and we'll have a full product line and a sustainable company. 

     

    Help get the word out

    Backing one of our products isn't the only way to contribute to the campaign. We believe there are enough like minded people for us to reach our goal, we just need to find them. If you know anyone who would appreciate our mission, please share this page. There are sharing options in the title section at the top of this page. 

     

     

     

     

     

    Thank You

    We have other fun ideas for our next few products. Where it goes from there is only limited by our imagination. With a deep-seated goal of making cooking more enjoyable, we have a large canvas to work with.  

     

    We'd love you hear from you if you have questions or comments. 

     

    Sincerely,

    Ktchy Designs

story:
Hello everyone

If you are here is because you have noticed our wine "Pídeme 3 Deseos" ('Make a wish' in spanish) and wondering wine and fire? What is this about?

"Pídeme 3 Deseos" Wine was born a New Year's Eve night, everyone on New Year's Eve has rituals, for my part, I take a paper, write my wishes and purposes on it and afterwards I set fire to the paper.

And one day I wondered, why do I have to wait until the end of the year, my birthday or a shooting star to make a wish?

Shortly after, I saw a magician in a show burning a paper that vanished. This gave me the idea of creating a wine called "Pídeme 3 Deseos" ('Make a wish' in spanish) and add this magic paper in which you could write your wish and set it on fire.

We had to transfer this little show to a wine bottle, the first impression was very important. With this in mind, we have designed a different bottle with a spectacular shape and a metallic label with a embossed look that makes that even touching it be an experience.
We have made an exhaustive selection of wines from one of the most famous wine regions in the world, La Rioja.

The result is a bottle with a spectacular design, a great wine, a different staging and a touch of magic, which raise people hopes.

It is the ideal product to share with your partner, close friends, and relatives. Enjoying unique, intimate, and special moments. With  "Pídeme 3 Deseos" Wine you will be able to set up a positive energy environment, where wishes and hopes become the new way to enjoy a good wine.

"Pídeme 3 Deseos" is not just a wine. 

"Pídeme 3 Deseos" is illusion, wishes and dreams...

'Pídeme 3 Deseos' is a very special bottle of wine. It has a small label attached to its neck that contains 3 magic little piece of paper. Its essence is divided into 3 key points: a magic touch, the design and the wine.

The essence of 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine. Each bottle includes a WishPaper© where you can write your wish and set on fire. His special composition makes it dissapear in front of your eyes in only a sigh.
 
 

The bottle of 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine is exactly what we wanted to make. Hours and days of designs, drawings and models have turn into a sophisticated and elegant black bottle topped off with a beautiful silver metal label.

 

Tasting note

Capacity: 75 cl.    |    Alcohol: 14%    |   Wine type:  Red wine. RIOJA Denomination of Qualified Origin.

Grape variety: 80% Tempranillo 20% Graciano

Serving temperature: 13ºC - 16ºC

Tasting: 

Attractive ruby red color, very little evolved and high layer. Intense and complex in the nose, it is unmarked with an initial touch to vanilla and then appear ripe fruit and menthol aromas.

In the mouth it is structured, friendly, round, without edges, of modern cut, when dominating the fruit on the bouquet. We will take it at 16ºC, to accompany stews, meats and cheeses.

Description: Aged 12 months in our cellar. Hand selected vintage that together with the exclusive microclimate of the area assure to this wine balance and tipicity.

Pairing: Strong fish, game meats, specialized rice, fresh cheeses and dairy products.

Physicals Characteristics

The first thing that falls in love with this wine is its physical, elegant bottle, sophisticated and with a touch of magic. 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' goes beyond the senses that are used to describe a good wine. Taste, sight, smell, touch; its original relief in the label makes your hands can feel the mark, in a sensorial way.

Social Characteristics

It is the ideal product to share in your most social environment. With a couple, groups of friends, and with family. Enjoying unique, intimate, and special moments. 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' will be the new protagonist of the more social environment. Creating a positive energy atmosphere where desires and purposes become the new way to enjoy a good wine.

Emotional Characteristics

It will catch everyones's eyes, by its staging. A different ritual when drinking a glass of wine. 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' covers the need to satisfy your desires in a unique and original way.

Each bottle of 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine includes a tag with three WishPaper©

Share your love of wine and 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' with your friends. Our referral prizes are a Thank You! for helping spread the word. Get your friends to contribute, and receive vouchers for these limited edition prizes from our cellar!

Stay tuned each week as we announce those who have earned referral prizes!

Here is how it works:

Log into your Indiegogo

Click on the referral link the the left of the campaign video.

Share with your friends and/or via social media buttons to the left of the video.

Make sure your friends use your unique referral link when they buy, so you get credit.

You can check your account to see how many referral dollars you have driven.

Your friends must spend a combined total of $500 or more, or $1000 or more to receive the prizes listed above.

Rules:

You must be a contributor to the campaign.

You will only get referral credit if you are logged into Indiegogo, and share your personal referral link. Your friends must use this link to purchase their perk.

You cannot receive more than one prize. Your final prize will be determined by the prize that is closest to your total referral contribution dollars.

Your order will ship March 2018.

 

​

Help out by sharing with friends!
Have a friend who you think want this? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who want this!
The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.
Let's do this.

Please contact partners@pidemeundeseo.net​, with further questions or inquiries about bulk orders and discounts.

In the last year, we have been working against the clock by selecting the best grapes, carefully studying the design of the bottle and the label, as well as looking for the best material for our peculiar magic game.

After thorough research we have established contacts with manufacturers all over the world, with years of experience in their fields that have allowed us to create the product we had in mind.

The bottle is of the highest quality, as well as labels and magic paper. We manufacture in our own facilities and we have everything under control. But like any new product we are not exempt of risks.

The biggest of them is the time and the commitment to deliver within the margins that we offer you. We can assure you that we will do everything in our power, and even more, to meet the deadlines. However, there could be unexpected circumstances that delay delivery times. We ask you patience and we promise you the delivery of a quality product to each of our patrons as soon as possible.

In any case we will keep you informed of the process at all times.

Thank you for helping us make 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine a reality!

How old must I be to purchase 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine? 
You must be 21 years of age at the time of purchase. This is the law, so it’s best not to employ creative—nay, misguidedly hopeful—mathematics. 

Can I buy ´Pídeme 3 Deseos´ Wine now if I’m not 21 but will be 21 before delivery? 
Again, you must be of legal drinking age AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE. 

Can I buy ´Pídeme 3 Deseos´ Wine now if I’m not 21 but am giving it as a gift to someone who is 21? 
No. 

How does the Voucher works? 
At the end of the campaign, you will receive a Redeemable Voucher for your 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' perks. This voucher will be transformed into an order to our partners, having an official retail licence. Then, our partner will directly send you the perks to your delivery address. 

Are you able to deliver everywhere? 
In US, our retail partners can deliver to all states. We can send to Panamá, Hong Kong, China and the UE.

Retailer/Distributor Inquiry

Are you a retailer or distributor interested in selling 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine?

 If so we would love to hear from you. 

Please email us at partners@pidemeundeseo.net​

International Supporters

We can ship “Quality Wine in a Glass” pouch products worldwide. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region.

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign, you can always reach us at hello@pidemeundeseo.net​

CONTACT - Who should I contact if I'm a journalist?

Please email us at press@pidemeundeseo.net
