Pairing: Strong fish, game meats, specialized rice, fresh cheeses and dairy products.


Physicals Characteristics
The first thing that falls in love with this wine is its physical, elegant bottle, sophisticated and with a touch of magic. 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' goes beyond the senses that are used to describe a good wine. Taste, sight, smell, touch; its original relief in the label makes your hands can feel the mark, in a sensorial way.
Social Characteristics
It is the ideal product to share in your most social environment. With a couple, groups of friends, and with family. Enjoying unique, intimate, and special moments. 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' will be the new protagonist of the more social environment. Creating a positive energy atmosphere where desires and purposes become the new way to enjoy a good wine.
Emotional Characteristics
It will catch everyones's eyes, by its staging. A different ritual when drinking a glass of wine. 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' covers the need to satisfy your desires in a unique and original way.

Each bottle of 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine includes a tag with three WishPaper©






Share your love of wine and 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' with your friends. Our referral prizes are a Thank You! for helping spread the word. Get your friends to contribute, and receive vouchers for these limited edition prizes from our cellar!
Stay tuned each week as we announce those who have earned referral prizes!

Here is how it works:
Log into your Indiegogo
Click on the referral link the the left of the campaign video.
Share with your friends and/or via social media buttons to the left of the video.
Make sure your friends use your unique referral link when they buy, so you get credit.
You can check your account to see how many referral dollars you have driven.
Your friends must spend a combined total of $500 or more, or $1000 or more to receive the prizes listed above.

Rules:
You must be a contributor to the campaign.
You will only get referral credit if you are logged into Indiegogo, and share your personal referral link. Your friends must use this link to purchase their perk.
You cannot receive more than one prize. Your final prize will be determined by the prize that is closest to your total referral contribution dollars.
Your order will ship March 2018.

 
​


Help out by sharing with friends!Have a friend who you think want this? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who want this!The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.Let's do this.

Please contact partners@pidemeundeseo.net​, with further questions or inquiries about bulk orders and discounts.



In the last year, we have been working against the clock by selecting the best grapes, carefully studying the design of the bottle and the label, as well as looking for the best material for our peculiar magic game.
After thorough research we have established contacts with manufacturers all over the world, with years of experience in their fields that have allowed us to create the product we had in mind.
The bottle is of the highest quality, as well as labels and magic paper. We manufacture in our own facilities and we have everything under control. But like any new product we are not exempt of risks.
The biggest of them is the time and the commitment to deliver within the margins that we offer you. We can assure you that we will do everything in our power, and even more, to meet the deadlines. However, there could be unexpected circumstances that delay delivery times. We ask you patience and we promise you the delivery of a quality product to each of our patrons as soon as possible.
In any case we will keep you informed of the process at all times.
Thank you for helping us make 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine a reality!

How old must I be to purchase 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine? You must be 21 years of age at the time of purchase. This is the law, so it’s best not to employ creative—nay, misguidedly hopeful—mathematics. Can I buy ´Pídeme 3 Deseos´ Wine now if I’m not 21 but will be 21 before delivery? Again, you must be of legal drinking age AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE. Can I buy ´Pídeme 3 Deseos´ Wine now if I’m not 21 but am giving it as a gift to someone who is 21? No. How does the Voucher works? At the end of the campaign, you will receive a Redeemable Voucher for your 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' perks. This voucher will be transformed into an order to our partners, having an official retail licence. Then, our partner will directly send you the perks to your delivery address. Are you able to deliver everywhere? In US, our retail partners can deliver to all states. We can send to Panamá, Hong Kong, China and the UE.Retailer/Distributor Inquiry
Are you a retailer or distributor interested in selling 'Pídeme 3 Deseos' Wine?
 If so we would love to hear from you. 
Please email us at partners@pidemeundeseo.net​
International Supporters
We can ship “Quality Wine in a Glass” pouch products worldwide. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region.
Need help? We're here for you.
If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign, you can always reach us at hello@pidemeundeseo.net​
CONTACT - Who should I contact if I'm a journalist?
Please email us at press@pidemeundeseo.net

story:
Welcome to Baby Food 3.0. 

Say goodbye to the guilt of giving your baby, over-processed, pasteurized, additive-filled, conventional, store-bought baby food.  

Say goodbye to hours of washing, prep, peeling, chopping, steaming, blending, dividing, freezing, and clean up of making baby food at home.

Keen Bean Organic Blends are beautifully curated, cold-blended, organic, non-GMO, preservative free, additive free, real meals for your little (6 months +) that are conveniently packaged for families on-the-go.  Think ultra-premium cold pressed juice meets baby food.

We use cold pressure innovation to keep the food we make REAL.  Real texture, real color, real taste, real nutrition.  Do you boil your avocados or strawberries before eating them?  No? - well that's how conventional baby food is made.  Keen Bean was created to make first class health a convenient part of your little one’s daily eating ritual.  No fake sh*t!

 As we continue to expand our vision for today and the future, all funding from this Indiegogo campaign will be used toward the following projects:  

Our Team: Team Keen Bean means everything to us and we believe in investing in our team members. We aim to add several new hires, as well as provide added benefits and greater training programs.  

Our Operations: We we will complete our final round of certification testing and start our first round of production.  *High-Five!!*

Simply put, we want you to be a part of Keen Bean Organic Blends so we can grow together and feed babies real food.  

We already have the contracts in place with a reputable and amazing manufacturer in Southern California.   

The formulations and packaging design are complete. Now, we just need YOUR help to raise the funds to begin production and ship all the Keen Bean Baby Blends YOU ordered.  We plan to start shipping our Kickstarter production Fall (Sept-Oct) 2017.

Your support will also allow us to develop more awesome products and get them into your hands faster.  As a backer, you’re a Keen Bean family member for life!  You will be the first to know about our new products and will be encouraged to send your comments, questions, and feedback directly to Team Keen Bean.

Join the movement. Let's feed babies real food!

Keen Bean Organic Blends are made with wholesome, non-processed, the-way-it-should-be ingredients. Of course, all of our ingredients are organic and of the highest quality.

Basically, from farm to mouth, we are pretty cool. We use intense cold pressure instead of heat processing to maintain the integrity of the ingredients, while at the same time, ensuring our blends are safe.

Fellow Parents! Just look at the difference.  This is real food!

ALL of our blends are made with 100% organic, non-GMO, real food ingredients, and that’s it.ALL of our ingredients are listed on the front of the pack. No hidden surprises!

We are parents too, and the proof is in the pudding.  Our blends are conveniently packaged in pouches, which allow your baby (6 months+) to feed themselves (spoon free, dish free, mess free), when you are on the go (real life).

At formal eating times, they can also be served to a spoon or in bowls so your baby can learn those essential mealtime skills.

The American Academy of Pediatrics and the Canadian Paediatric Society both recommend to exclusively breastfeed or use of infant formula for the first 6 months of life.  

  • Our blends start at ages 6 months onward however they are so healthy and yummy we recommend for all ages.  The blends are great, healthy snacks for toddlers, preschool, school kids and all you "work" kids ;)
  • Our blends must be kept cool or refrigerated as fresh foods ought to be. Keen Bean Baby Blends will last for up to 45 days unopened in the fridge.  
  • We plan to start shipping our crowdfunding production Fall (Sept/Oct) 2017.  If you want to buy now and ship later that can be accommodated.  We will get all that info at the end of the campaign.
  • We are currently pending final certifications for USDA Organic, Non-GMO, FDA (USA), and CFIA (CAN) compliance.  

* *If you would like to order multiple quantities of rewards - simply add the corresponding dollar amount to your pledge when selecting the reward. 

Example: To order a 2 months (120 packs) --> Select 1 month reward ($160) and add another $160 for extra amount.  For 3 months (180 packs), it would be $160 for 1 month plus $320 for the 2 additional months. 

Once the campaign is completed, we will clarify the quantities through the backer surveys before we start production.

Delivery to Your Door!  

Shipping perishable food is tricky business. 

In order to ensure your product stays fresh in transit we will be using a special liner inside a recyclable box, to add a recyclable cool pack, and use 1 day shipping (depending on your location). 

When your package ships we will send you a confirmation email with a link to track your order. This applies to subscription shipments and a la carte shipments alike.     

Keen Bean also offers a subscription model for your convenience. We are offering super deals if you sign up for this plan so check it out!     

For our crowdfunding orders, the minimum order will be one (1) case which breaks down to 12 individual baby blend pouches. Each case will consist of the same blend to ensure we deliver in timely fashion.  

We plan to start shipping our crowdfunding production Fall 2017. If you want to pledge now and ship later that can be accommodated (within 3 months). We will get all that info at the end of the campaign.

Safety + Certifications

Food safety is of the utmost importance to us as a company and as parents. We will NEVER compromise when it comes to this. Even though all of our ingredients have been certified organic, we have added an additional step in our processes to have a third party lab test our ingredients before we use them.

We've already solidified partnerships with solid SQF manufacturing facilities and handpicked our ingredient suppliers. We have also already completed preliminary validation studies, certifications, and regulatory compliance so that we're ready to hit the ground running.

Transparency and honesty are two fundamental values for us here at Keen Bean which is why our packaging provides our fellow parents with clean information they need to make the best informed decisions for your little ones.

Our difference is our process, the nutrition and the taste - we start from raw and use cold pressure technology to maintain the integrity of the ingredients we use.  Rooted in science, focused on health.  We come from a cold-pressed juice background so have in-depth knowledge of the process. We hand picked our farms to work with the most nutrient dense produce for our baby approved recipes. Unlike others, we are never cut with cheap fillers. We are 100% organic, 100% non-GMO, cold-blended, cold-pressured in a zero waste facility, we are the future of baby food.

Early-Bird Discount: You get the lowest price possible on Indiegogo, at a steep discount from our expected retail price.  We plan to start shipping our crowdfunding production Fall 2017. If you want to pledge now and ship later that can be accommodated (within 3 months). We will get all that info at the end of the campaign.

Backers Come First: You're helping us launch Keen Bean to the world and we really, really appreciate that. You'll be at the front of the line to receive Keen Bean Organic Blends before anyone else, and your feedback will shape the future of the product.  You will be the first to know about our new products and will be encouraged to send your comments, questions, and feedback directly to Team Keen Bean.  

Your continued support will allow us to complete our final round of certification testing, start our first round of production, develop more awesome products and get them into your hands faster. As a backer, you’re a Keen Bean family member for life! 

Join the movement.  Let's feed babies real food!

story:
Zovem se Tomislav, a mnogi me znaju pod nadimkom Đuka. Zaljubljenik u muziku, biciklizam i prirodu. Uz sve to IT-ovac koji je uz svoje bavljenje folklorom i gažiranjem proputovao svijet i u tim putovanjima otkrivao razne novitete, rekli bi ljudi, širio obzorja. Među njima i putovanje u Belgiju gdje sam prvi put upoznao piva. Nadahnut njihovom tradicijom i posvećenosti usluživanju i prezentaciji piva, na nagovor prijatelja počeo sam kuhati pivo kod kuće.Nakon godina razmišljanja i promišljanja, htio sam napraviti mjesto za ljubitelje piva i u ovome kraju. Mjesto gdje se cijeni dobro piće, u kojem su cijene prihvatljive i ambijent atraktivan.

Što nam treba?

Naravno, u takvim projektima potrebno je dosta sredstava. Sakupio sam dosta, ali još malo fali, pa da malo i zajednica pomogne i uključi se u ovaj projekt.

Za završetak projekta potrebno je kupiti:

Kegove- bačve za transport piva iz fermentora do vaših čaša.

Chiller - izmjenjivač topline, jedna od esencijalnih stvari u proizvodnji pive

Točionik - točionik sa 10 pipa i komorama za hlađenje bačvi, jer bez toga nema dobre pive!

Cilj sakupljanja je 40.000 kn.

Nije malo, ali ako nas se skupi - isplatit će se!

Zašto ulagati baš u nas?

Pitanje stoji na mjestu, zašto ulagati baš u nas...

U ponudi ćemo imati 10 točionika s craft pivom, najviše naših umotvorina,ali to ne isključuje i guestbeers od drugih pivovara. Što se tiče boca, u ponudi će se naći šarolika lepeza stranih i domaćih kvalitetnih piva. Uz pivo uvijek ide dobar whiskey, tako da ćemo ponudu upotpuniti s raznim žesticama raznih proizvođača.

Specijalnih serija mjesečnih i sezonskih piva na našim točionicima neće faliti, a za sve ostale vrline pozivamo vas na naše otvorenje, pa ih i sami otkrijte!

Zašto Veles

Veles je u slavenskoj mitologiji bio vladar (bog) zemlje, vode, šuma i podzemlja, ali je povezivan i sa zmajevima, stokom, magijom, pa čak i glazbenicima.
Pošto su u slavenskoj mitologiji sve bogove odlikovale i dobre i loše karakteristike, mi smo odlučili zadržati ove pozitivne za nas...

Pomoći nam možete i na druge načine....

Znamo da svi ne mogu pomoći donacijama, ali uvijek mogu pomoći dobrom riječju.

Podijelite našu kampanju s prijateljima i tako nam pomognite u ostvarivanju ovog projekta

story:
Hydroponic Farm, Healthy & Fresh Food

Meet the first hydroponic garden in Montenegro

 

 

About Me & Project

 

Greetings from Montenegro. I am Erhan, graduated from chemistry and interested in hydroponics. Last two years i was volunteering in Balkan countries. Hostels, organic farms, youth centers ,horse riding club and goat farm . I really enjoyed my trip to Serbia, Montenegro,  Bosnia, Macedonia . I shared my experience and learnt a lot from them. 

                               

Zanjic Beach

 

Now i want to open my dream farm in Tivat Peninsula Montenegro close to Zanjic Beach.

I have chosen Tivat because  of the climate and nature . Also one of my host from 2017  gave me  a land to start my farm. 

This place will become  a true paradise for nature lovers, travelers, explorers and foodies.

 

 

Hydroponics

Hydroponics, is a method of growing plants in a water based, nutrient rich solution.

Hydroponics does not use soil, instead the root system is supported using an inert medium such as perlite, rockwool, clay pellets, peat moss, or vermiculite.

 

 

Advantages

 

  • Hydroponics is water-saving, eco-friendly.
  • For hydroponics, you need no soil.
  • Always fresh and healty food.
  • Better growth rate.
  • Pesticides free.

What are we doing

 

We are growing vegetables by hydroponics . To feed the world we need hydroponics.

We will grow :

  • Tomato
  • Cucumber
  • Pepper
  • Basil
  • Parsley
  • Mint
  • Vlasac
  • Lettuce
  • Spring Onion
  • Barley Grass
  • Oyster Mushroom
  • Olive Oil  ( Cold Press )
  • Strawberry

story:
Who doesn’t love it when the entire house smells of freshly-baked brownies?

Are you tired of using the same old boxes of mass-produced brownie mix to indulge in your favorite chocolate cravings?

Doesn’t your own homemade brownies baked with real butter for ease of infusion and at a low 325-degree temperature to ensure nothing bakes out sound amazing?

We were tired of trying to make a quality infused brownie using the store-bought mixes. They never had the rich taste of a gourmet chocolate brownie and tasted like all their artificial chemicals and preservatives. You know that taste. ICK!

We set out to build a better gourmet brownie.

ADDABLES is on a mission to rid the world of boring store-bought brownie mixes and make your home smell like fresh-baked heaven every day.

You might say we’re a bit obsessive about our brownie-loving.

 

Customize Your Edibles with Addables

We set out to develop the best brownie mix on earth and exceeded our goal.

ADDABLES brownie mix is the first in a line of all natural baking mixes.

Customizable and much better tasting than other mixes you can buy. And of course using all-natural ingredients instead of artificial chemicals and preservatives.

 

Why Addables is Better for Baking

  • Consistent Mixing

Our painstakingly-developed formula helps you mix more consistently with added ingredients like herbal oils or flavored oils. You get the same result with every bite!

  • More Chocolate

Our mix comes packed with the richest chocolate of all the major brands, so you get more chocolate goodness with every bite (you’ll definitely want to save some for later).


Compare the richness of our product to other products on the market.

 

  • MORE Chocolate!

You can choose to add to the mix or sprinkle on top the included extra fudge bits to customize the flavor to suit your taste. No need to buy a separate bag of chocolate chips to get your brownies up to your taste. We include enough to satisfy even the biggest chocoholics like us!

  • Cooler Baking

Our specially-formulated mix allows for a lower baking temperature to bake your brownies. There are a number of things this does for you!

When baking with infusible herbal oils and extracts, a percentage of the oils and extracts evaporate through any high-heat baking process. This will change the concentration of the herbal oil and the flavor.

With our lower baking temperature, you burn off and evaporate less and keep more of your favorite infusible using our mix.

 

Better Baking Done Your Way

In pre-packaged products, you have no control over the taste or flavor. Either you like it or you don’t.

By baking your own brownies, you are in control of these things! You know what you're getting with every single batch.

Add, herbal oils, or extracts of your choosing, and get better brownies to YOUR personal taste or needs.

No more mystery-mixes and unknown effects from pre-made brownies you’re not used to or don’t like!

Pre-cooked and packaged brownies are often very good. Someone put together a recipe they like. Buy them, eat them. It could not be simpler. There is a large variety of these products on the market.

But so many of us want a product we can easily make ourselves at home, using products and ingredients we know and trust. ADDABLES gourmet brownie mixes allow you complete control over the mixing, taste, and quality of the final product.


Better Baking Made Simple

Baking with ADDABLES gourmet brownie mix is easy, only requiring a stick of real butter and 2 eggs. Stir in the amount of herbal oil or extract of your choosing, adding the brownie mix, and then bake at our lower baking temperature.

Just want some delicious brownies? Ours are the best all on their own!

About the time your entire house is filled with the smell of warm fresh-baked brownies, you’ll be ready to enjoy them warm and right away, or wrap them up for later.

You’ll have a snack whenever you like all ready to go! But one YOU custom-made yourself!

 

Where we are Now

We’ve been baking a bazillion batches of brownies (this may not be an accurate count) and trying our own products with friends and family. It’s a great social aspect to simply baking on your own.

Sure the pre-made products are easy to just open and eat. But building your own edibles with a group of friends while the house fills up with fresh-baked heaven-scent is a much better time!

We have developed our gourmet brownie mix through years of trial and many errors to bring us to where we are today: ready to ship our best product to your door. We are way beyond the prototype stage here. 

We have our recipe and product ready and can ship your product to you within 30 days once the campaign finishes!

The purpose of this campaign is to get our initial order kicked off and to quickly get you your gourmet brownie mix. We are using this campaign to build awareness of the product and launch it publicly in a big way.

The interest from this launch will help us gauge how much to stock to fulfill orders.

The more we raise through this campaign, the faster we can develop new gourmet products.

 Help us to share our better brownies with more people, and enjoy the freedom to design your own better brownies!

 

Who is Addables?

Addable Products, Inc. was formed in 2016 by next door neighbors, Brian Tucker and Ian Alexandre.

Our product line is 100% natural, with no artificial ingredients or preservatives and contains the finest quality ingredients available. Our mixes are developed to be easily infused with herbs or other “Addable” products. 

Brian Tucker
Brian is a globally recognized business executive and entrepreneur. His 20+ years at various levels of management, multiple successful businesses and a Bachelors of Science in Logistics have given him the tools needed to ensure another successful start-up. 

Brian was an expat in Brazil with a Fortune 500 electronics company and in China with a top supplier to Big Box retailers like WalMart and The Home Depot.

He now wants to focus on making products in and for the US market by doing what he does best: finding the best suppliers, installing the best processes and ensuring superior customer satisfaction. 

Brian is a dedicated family man and feels good knowing he sources the best, most natural ingredients available on the market. He finds it very rewarding to hear, “this is the best brownie I have ever tasted” and can’t wait to bring even more wonderful treats for others to enjoy.

 

Ian Alexandre
Ian is an 83 year old retired Engineer and Inventor. Who says you’re too old to start a business? 

He is very active in the Inventors Council of Central Florida and mentors other inventors in the group. He is also a SCORE (Service Core of Retired Executives) counselor who mentors entrepreneurs trying to start a business, clients who already have a business and want to grow, and clients who need help rescuing their businesses. 

He is a very strong believer that small businesses are the backbone of our country and is planning to use a large percentage of his share of the profits to start a foundation that invests in helping inventors get their products to market.

story:
Short Summary

THE EXCITING ADVENTURES OF A CRAZY ENGLISH DUDE ADRIAN BECKETT AND HIS CHOCOLATE FACTORY

This is madness: I don't know if you believe in visions, buddhism or any of that but let me tell you a story.

A few months ago, I visited a buddhist monastery.  I woke up one night crying from a nightmare.  I knew I had to make a change.  I knew I needed people.

The last 3 years have been a lonely period. I've travelled far and wide.  Had lots of new experiences but I've felt unconnected.

As I sat down to meditate in front of the buddha.  To me, came a vision of an island.

A week later, I found an ecovillage.  4 months later I came to Gotland.

And here I am.  I'm in Gotland.  The ecovillage didn't work out but I'm still here.

Why? Because there is something magical about this island and  I think it's the perfect place for a chocolate factory. I share the values of the people, I love the nature, I believe in hard work, community and sustainability.

I imagine people sitting down to a warm hot chocolate on an icey cold evening or children coming on a Saturday morning to learn about where the chocolate comes from, how it's made, how much sugar to eat, how to eat mindfully......

This story is not about me.  It's about you - The Gotlanders.

Great news - Oskuro is FAST becoming a reality.

The cacao is ready to ship from Madagascar from a fellow Swede, Patrik at Stava farm has kindly provided his kitchen and Robin Malmqvist is helping with the purchase of the cacao.

This is the vision: A CHOCOLATE FACTORY.

If with the support of Gotlanders, Oskuro can achieve what we've achieved in 6 days, there are no limits. Now I need your support. I want you and your friends and your friends friends and your friends friends friends to buy 1 chocolate bar each. With this, I can pay to ship the cacao and buy 1 machine (a winnower) which I'm missing. If 1000 people purchase a bar @ 25KR for the highest quality bar of bean-to-bar chocolate you will find in Sweden (no joke!), we're good to go.

*****About the chocolate*****

=> Organic. 2 ingredients: cacao sourced from Madagascar (http://www.akessons-organic.com/) and sugar
=> 70% cacao
=> Made in Gotland with love by me.
=> Bonus: A little surprise.

I will personally be paying for my flight to pick up the other machines (melangeur, roaster) and packaging from Colombia.

I expect these to sell like hot cakes, so don't hang about. Usual price when they go on sale for real will be about 100KR. They are only 25KR right now (or £2).

Jag älskar Gotland. Tak so mycket!

To a sustainable and prosperous 2016.  Thanks for listening.

Adrian

What We Need and What You Get

You get:

  • the highest quality bean-to-bar chocolate
  • to tell your friends there is a crazy dude from England who makes chocolate
  • to feel the love

What we need:

  • to validate this baby i.e see if people want great chocolate
  • your excitement
  • money to cover the costs of shipping over some great cacao from Colombia

    The Impact

    Build a company that:

    • puts people before profit
    • is sustainable.  Think -  chocolate on a yacht sailing to the mainland.
    • adopts the best practices from Google, Zappos.....with an emphasis on happiness, flow, free time for their employees
    • pays for their staff to go on retreats where they can recharge, reflect and love their families deeply

    Risks & Challenges

    • My plane falling from the sky. I have to return to Colombia to get the machines
    • You not liking the chocolate.  Impossible - you'll love it.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Say hi.  I'm new to Gotland so I'd love to meet you. 
    • Follow us on Instagram

Important Update on the Brickhouse Cafe

Thank you so very much for your generous support and donations. While we did not quite reach our $100,000 fundraising goal, we aren’t calling it quits just yet!

Please help us by moving your purchase from Indiegogo to inKind. We've refunded your Indiegogo donation and please head to our inKind page here to re-purchase and get rewarded!

New bonus offers through inKind:
Buy a $100 gift card, get a free $10 gift card (10% extra)
Buy a $250 gift card, get a free $50 gift card (20% extra)
Buy a $1,000 gift card, get a free $350 gift card (35% extra)

You get immediate access to your total gift card balance through the inKind App and you can come in and start using it tonight.

Thanks again!
- Brickhouse Cafe Team

---

Questions? Feel free to email directly to pledges.brickhousesf@gmail.com.

story:
Short Summary

Lo que quiero es recaudar fondos para hacer un pinto y poder pasar el curso de creación de empresas. Y si este proyecto funciona o recauda mucho plantearme abrir The Pinto Factory.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Necesito fondos para hacer el pinto y poder pasar el curso.
Usted obtienen la satisfacción de ayudar a un buen estudiante.

 

The Impact

Esto impactaría de forma positiva en vida porque me ayudarían a obtener una buena nota y me ahorraría el dinero de repetir el curso, cabe recalcar que no dispongo del mismo para repetir esta materia.

story:
• Lightly carbonated, non-alcoholic soft drink.

  • Designed to prevent hangovers.

  • Comes in a sleek 8.4 oz aluminium can.

  • Naturally flavored with ginger and grapefruit.

  • Made with 9 natural ingredients.

  • Does not reverse the effect of alcohol.
     

 

​

 

Alcochol puts a huge strain on your liver. Sarsaparilla root, a known powerful anti-oxidant, regenerates it.

 

Artichoke extract dissolves alcohol in your blood stream and supports liver function.

 

Milk thistle helps your body process alcohol as well as reduces the damage caused by it.

 

Ginseng give you a natural energy boost in order to aid the body in breaking down alcohol.

 

 

   1. Drink before or with alcohol

       Use as a mixer or chaser

   2. Have a great time with your friends

   3. Wake up comfortably without hangover

 

 

 

   SOCIALIZE

Be hangover free when you go out drinking.

 

   WAKE UP CLEAN

Wake up next morning without hangover.

 

   PREVENTION, NOT A CURE

Designed to prevent, not for recovery.

 

   BIRTHDAY PARTIES

   WEDDINGS

   CORPORATE FUNCTIONS


and many more!

 

 

 

 

INGREDIENTS:

Milk Thistle Seed Extract, L-Carnitine Base, Cactus Leaf Powder, L-Alanine, Sarsaparilla Root Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Taurine, Caffeine, Artichoke Leaf Extract

NUTRITION FACTS:

Serving size:                                         8.4 fl oz. (250ml)

Calories:                                                20 per serving

Total Cabohydrate:                             5g or 2% of Daily Value

Total Sugars:                                        5g         

(Daily value not established and includes 5g of added sugar at 10% of DV)

Vitamin C:                                              110mg or 122% of DV

Vitamin B2:                                            1.3mg or 100% of DV

Vitamin B3:                                            16mg or 100% of DV

Vitamin B6:                                            1.7mg or 100% of DV

Vitamin B9:                                            800mcg or 200% of DV

Vitamin B12:                                          12mcg or 500% of DV

Sodium:                                                  35mg or 2% of DV

Potassium:                                             200mg or 4% of DV

 

 

Q. Is there alcohol in Hangnever?
A. No, Hangnever is a non-alcoholic beverage.

Q. How much Hangnever should I drink for it to work?
A. A can should mitigate your hangover symptoms as long as you don't drink excessively. If you feel that it's necessary, you can take two, to maximize Hangnever's benefits.

Q. What if it doesn't work?
A. If you are not happy with the results, we offer a 100% money back guarantee. Please contact us for refund inquiries.

Q. Is this product safe?
A. Our product is 100% FDA compliant. As with any other food and beverage product on the market, Hangnever has gone through all the processes to make sure it is 100% safe for your consumption.

Q. Is this a placebo?
A. Our product went through double-blind test to make sure product function is not biased. Accumulative results shows that our proprietary blend actually does mitigate hangover symptoms significantly.

Q. Is this an energy drink?
A. We are not an energy drink.

Q. Will this give you energy boost?
A. Product contains American Ginseng and Taurine. In our case its purpose is to help metabolize the alcohols, but these 2 ingredients are also known to give you energy boost.

 

We do NOT encourage excessive drinking
Please drink responsibly at ALL times

 

Other Ways To Support

If you do not drink, or you simply don't want to buy our perks, we understand. You can still support Hangnever by:

  • Following our Facebook page.
  • Following our Instagram page.
  • Sharing our campaign page.

Press and Media

Interested in writing or featuring the Hangnever in one of your upcoming articles or reviews? you can reach out to us to chat more at info@6daysdrink.com.

 

The statements on this campaign have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA).

These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Vitamin C:                                              110mg or 122% of DV
Vitamin B2:                                            1.3mg or 100% of DV
Vitamin B3:                                            16mg or 100% of DV
Vitamin B6:                                            1.7mg or 100% of DV
Vitamin B9:                                            800mcg or 200% of DV
Vitamin B12:                                          12mcg or 500% of DV
Sodium:                                                  35mg or 2% of DV
Potassium:                                             200mg or 4% of DV
 

 


Q. Is there alcohol in Hangnever?A. No, Hangnever is a non-alcoholic beverage.
Q. How much Hangnever should I drink for it to work?A. A can should mitigate your hangover symptoms as long as you don't drink excessively. If you feel that it's necessary, you can take two, to maximize Hangnever's benefits.
Q. What if it doesn't work?A. If you are not happy with the results, we offer a 100% money back guarantee. Please contact us for refund inquiries.
Q. Is this product safe?A. Our product is 100% FDA compliant. As with any other food and beverage product on the market, Hangnever has gone through all the processes to make sure it is 100% safe for your consumption.
Q. Is this a placebo?A. Our product went through double-blind test to make sure product function is not biased. Accumulative results shows that our proprietary blend actually does mitigate hangover symptoms significantly.
Q. Is this an energy drink?A. We are not an energy drink.
Q. Will this give you energy boost?A. Product contains American Ginseng and Taurine. In our case its purpose is to help metabolize the alcohols, but these 2 ingredients are also known to give you energy boost.
 
We do NOT encourage excessive drinkingPlease drink responsibly at ALL times
 

Other Ways To Support
If you do not drink, or you simply don't want to buy our perks, we understand. You can still support Hangnever by:

Following our Facebook page.
Following our Instagram page.
Sharing our campaign page.


Press and Media
Interested in writing or featuring the Hangnever in one of your upcoming articles or reviews? you can reach out to us to chat more at info@6daysdrink.com.
 
The statements on this campaign have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

story:
Overview

I create this campaign with all my hope that i would find angels that will help me to start my dream project:

Hi my name is Achraf i'm glad to introduce myself to you ...

Not like other childrens ! i have spend my childhood with difficulty because my family is poor but anyway this is one of my motivations, to save myself my family and my environment,i have always wish to help others will all my power, helping others gives you positive energy it's very beautiful to see someone happy because of you, anyway i try to help myself first to help others.

I have left the school for financial reasons i'm 19 y.o, i decided to start my project to save my life before it's late, and to go back to school i have real intention and energy to change my life and help me family i need little to start!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let me explain my business what it is:

500€ is my goal ! I'm not intend to gain real money from the good people, i asked help for capital and this five hundred is enough for me to start, there is others needs help more than me.

With all my humility, i'm good marketer i have worked on E-commerce for a while i'm really have magical touch on Marekting, it's sourced from my little experience on my work

200€ to buy two used motorcycle for delivery / 100€ to start the first promote campaigns / 100€ to fulfill the first orders.

The Impact

Your contribution will make great difference, i will never stop until i start this business and make it bigger, your investment will not be in vain:

With this project i'm plenty sure that i will turn my business into big company of this category service,and i intent to make great delivery and employees team based on youth energies i have intent to hire many youngs that needs help their families and themselves like me right now, just imagine that your contribute will make all of this.

I already worked with delivery services it's glad to make the daily needs near to someone busy!

With the good investment and planing, i'm plenty sure that i will make from this five hundred dollar a great business.

Note: i have already build website for my project https://sokhraa.com .

Risks & Challenges

The only problem that i have is financial support.

I already have some money inside to invest it, i'm help my father for my family needs that's why i have this problem but i'm very sure that i will never stop until start my project i don't know something called "Failure".

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that many of you have kind heart and will love my story but i also know that not all can help me, anyhow if you share my campaign it's will be good help for me you will be reason at latest for 10 persons that will see my story.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Overview

It's time to capture your hearts! I am honored to present to you our unique Italian-cuisine, handcrafted by the one and only Chef Leonardo Maltese.

Hailing from a generation of chefs in the Italian culinary world, “The more you give, the more you get back” is the kitchen motto Chef Leo swears by and has been the pivotal driving force combined with traditional roots in bringing exceptional flavors to your table at Sapori.

 

 

About Sapori

A casual-chic family dining concept that transports its guest to the origins of Italian family dining with an emphasis on the sharing style, which is the foundation basing the conception of Sapori, UAE.

With a warm and cozy setting, Sapori aims at serving a menu that quintessentially focuses on fresh ingredients, with many imported directly from the heart of Italy — and features all-day dining menu additions curated to the local taste.

Sapori offers all-day dining menus with patrons enjoying a delightful breakfast, a hearty lunch, a scrumptious afternoon tea, wholesome dinners, and mouthwatering desserts. The dishes are the perfect combination of traditional Italian cuisine, with a modern influence, making Sapori a home away from home.

 

 

The Sapori Mission

At Sapori, we carefully select our products. Most of the ingredients are imported directly from Italy to savor the taste & authenticity of each dish with emphasis on freshness and farm-to-table concept. A seamless marriage of Italian flavors and world influences are daily cooked to perfection for you.

 

 

What We Need

We started off in 2019 with one operational outlet and today we have already completed another outlet that will be operational soon. The funds raised during this round will be utilized to cover working capital costs, to begin operations at the new outlet (75%), and accelerating growth by investing in expansion activities (25%). We have been aggressive when it comes to growth and see our brand grow from 2 outlets currently to 10 outlets in the next 5 years with revenue figures going up to 45 million AED in Year 5 through various customer retention and acquisition strategies.

 

What You Get

We have an amazing set of Meal and discount vouchers in store for you.  All of them can be obtained within 24 hours of purchase. You will love them! they go as follows;

1. Flat 40% off on all orders!*

*Terms and Conditions: 

•     Unique Voucher Code.
•     Free Desserts/Soft Beverages. 
•     Free Reservations. 
•     Maximum discount of 200 AED on each visit. 
•     This voucher is valid for 1 year and can be redeemed 6 times. 
•     Voucher cannot be redeemed for cash. 
•     Valid for Dine-in only.

2. Flat 25% off on all orders!*

(Choose between options provided)

*Terms and Conditions: 

•     Unique Voucher Code.
•     Free Desserts/Soft Beverages. 
•     Free Reservations. 
•     This voucher is valid for 1-5 years (as per option). 
•     Voucher cannot be redeemed for cash. 
•     Valid for Dine-in only.

3. Buy 1 Get 1 Free Everyday!*

(Choose between options provided)

*Terms and conditions:

•     Unique Voucher Code.
•     Free Reservations. 
•     Voucher can be redeemed once a day every day for 1-5 years (as per option). 
•     This voucher cannot be redeemed for cash. 
•     Valid for Dine-in only.

4. Gift Voucher @half the price!*

(Choose between options provided)

*Terms and Conditions: 
•      This voucher can be used to pay for all your orders at Sapori.
•      Unique Voucher Code.
•     Free Desserts/Soft Beverages. 
•     Free Reservations. 
•     This voucher is valid for 3/5 years (as per options). 
•     Voucher cannot be redeemed for cash. 
•     Valid for Dine-in only.

5. Free meals for LIFE!*

*Terms and conditions:
•     Unique Voucher Code.
•     Free Reservations. 
•     Free cooking lessons by our Executive Chef. 
•     This Voucher Cannot be redeemed for cash. 
•     Menu prepared and designed by our Executive Chef for special occasions. 
•     Valid for Dine-in only.

 

Our Team

Our experienced management with more than 25+ years of experience in the F&B and dining space along with a team of seasoned executives have developed focused strategies to ensure growth and expansion and gain a foothold in the local market.

Your contribution will help us reach great heights and in return, we promise to take you along the journey!

 

What This Means To Us

Your contribution to this campaign means the world to us.  We have met some incredible people over the years, making our journey so worthwhile.  In fact, those folks have made us so proud to be part of the incredible food scene in the U.A.E. We want to continue to share in what makes the community great.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can always share this campaign with friends and family.  Spread the word. Help us reach our goal even if you don't have the means to contribute.

Help us reach our goal even if you don't have the means to contribute.

story:
"Tomato ideal" brand 100% tomato juice for the whole family

Lycopene in tomato juice is called "gold in plants"!

At present, tomato juice is popular in Europe, America, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan.

The antioxidant capacity of lycopene is 3.2 times that of carotene, 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.

"Tomato ideal" brand 100% Xinjiang tomato juice contains at least 20mg lycopene per can, which is equivalent to the lycopene absorption of 400 tomatoes raw!

 The price of drinks, the experience of nutrition!Just one can, protect your health!

 

Our bodies rust every day, you know?

Our car will be maintained regularly, but our most precious body is often ignored!It has become the norm for Chinese people to make money with their bodies when they are young and to buy their lives when they are old.Why don't you take good care of yourself when you are young?Make money at the same time must take good care of the body, if you ignore it, it will slowly betray you... Pro, must remember!According to the survey, although the life expectancy of Chinese people has been extended, about half of the people over 65 years old in China have been taking a variety of drugs due to different diseases. Most of the elderly spend their days in the hospital intermittently.

However, this is not necessarily the case. In fact, many people's suffering from diseases can be prevented through maintenance in middle age or controlled by nutrition adjustment now.

In the United States, there are more and more "senior citizens" who are in good physical and mental condition. They are always healthy and full of vitality. We can see them in tennis courts, adult education classes, gymnasiums, and sometimes even in professional places.Researchers have conducted research on these elderly people who have a good old age and found that the maintenance carried out as early as middle age is the cornerstone of their good health after old age!

It's better to keep in good health in advance than to spend money on treatment

When the ruddy complexion quietly fades away, the wrinkles of years climb up the woman's face; when the energy is overdrawn for a long time, the pressure of career makes men unable to do what they want; when the heart and brain function is failing day by day, parents always have to face the threat of vascular sclerosisWe can't help asking: what steals our health?

British scientists have pointed out: iron will rust, silver will turn black, in fact, the human body will rust.The aging process of human body is similar to that of cut apple, which is the result of oxidation.Many chronic diseases of human beings are caused by oxidative stress, that is, the human body is rusting every day. The "rust" produced is called "free radical" in medicine, which is the root of many diseases of human body.Environmental pollution, life pressure, radiation and other factors are "oxidizing" our bodies all the time, reducing human life expectancy."Oxidation" is the main culprit that deprives people of health in life, and it is an important factor that leads to human aging and health problems!Experiments show that animals with low oxidative metabolism rate and strong antioxidant capacity are not easy to get sick, stronger and have the longest life span.

With the increase of age, our self-healing ability becomes weaker, and the damage caused by free radicals is manifested, such as wrinkles, color spots, poor energy, organ aging, arteriosclerosis, diabetes, cataract, cardiovascular disease, Alzheimer's disease, arthritis, cancer, etc., which are considered to be related to free radicals.

With the improvement of living standards, the popularization of nutrition knowledge and the improvement of health care awareness, the harm of chronic diseases related to diet is not only valued by the state and society, but also aroused people's general concern. The concept of "prevention is more important than treatment" has gradually replaced the habit of "treating diseases only when they are sick".

Our goal is not to turn back the clock, but to live the best quality of life at the age of 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80 and even 100!

"Wolf peach" in South America becomes a new favorite of European and American family maintenance

Tomato, which is rich in nutrition and delicious, is known as the fruit delicacy and the ruby of green world.It is said that the hometown of tomato is in Peru and Mexico. It was originally a wild berry growing in the forest. It was originally called "wolf peach". The fruit is rich in nutrition and has a special flavor.According to records, in the 16th century, a Duke of England named orodala was traveling in South America. He liked tomatoes very much, so he brought them back to England as a gift of love to his lover Queen Elizabeth to express his love.Since then, the names of "love fruit" and "lover fruit" have been widely spread.Europeans began to plant tomatoes in courtyards and gardens, and as a symbol of love and friendship gifts between men and women.

Time of the United States selects the food that contributes the most to human health

American "time" magazine introduced many kinds of food which are beneficial to modern people's health, among which tomato ranked the first.Tomato is rich in antioxidants, which can prevent the damage of free radicals to the skin. It has obvious effects of beauty, anti wrinkle, anti-aging, improving energy, protecting organs, and can greatly reduce the risk of cancer.

Tomato juice is very popular in European and American countries. It is said that Americans who pay attention to health care should drink two things when they wake up in the morning and before going to bed at night: one is milk, and the other is tomato juice.According to statistics, the per capita consumption of tomatoes in European and American countries is more than 30 times of that in China. In particular, 100% pure tomato juice has become an essential maintenance product for the whole family in European and American families.Drinking a glass of tomato juice every day brings obvious benefits to the maintenance oriented European and American people.The old people often drink it to delay aging, protect heart, brain, prostate and other important organs. The men often drink it with vigorous energy, while the women often drink it to beautify and beautify the skin, remove wrinkles and spots.

200g tomato juice, supplement the whole body nutrition

At present, tomato has been proved to contain a variety of vitamins and nutrients, rich in vitamin C and a, folic acid, potassium these main nutrients.In particular, it contains lycopene, it really has the effect of love, can make girls more beautiful!We see that loving and scientific mothers tend to make their children eat more tomatoes.According to the nutritionist's research and determination: each person eats 200 grams of tomato juice every day, which can protect the human health system and meet the human body's needs for a variety of vitamins and minerals.

  •  Tomato juice is rich in vitamins, alkalis, cellulose and pectin, and is rich in lycopene. Lycopene is the strongest antioxidant, which can delay aging, beautifying beauty, improving energy and enhancing immunity. The higher the content of lycopene in human plasma, the lower the incidence rate of cancer and coronary heart disease.
  •  Tomato juice contains a variety of organic acids. In addition to protecting vitamin C from damage, organic acids can also soften blood vessels, promote the absorption of calcium and iron, and help stomach juice digest fat and protein, which is beyond other vegetables and fruits;
  •  Tomato juice also contains a kind of anti-cancer and anti-aging substance called glutathione. Studies have found that tomato juice can prevent some types of cancer, inhibit breast cancer, lung cancer, endometrial cancer, and also fight lung cancer and colon cancer;
  •  Lycopene has the effect of diuresis and inhibiting the growth of bacteria. It is an excellent antioxidant and can remove free radicals in human body;
  •  Tomato juice also has the effect of beauty, appetite, protein digestion, reduce stomach distension.Its characteristics are between fruits and vegetables, rich in vitamin A and C. due to the protection of organic acids, vitamin C can not be destroyed in tomato cooking.

Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant in nature

1913Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant found in plants in nature, was first found in cooked tomatoes.Its antioxidant capacity is 3.2 times that of carotene, 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.Science has proved that the free radicals in human body are the main culprits of human autoimmune system.Lycopene is more effective than other carotenoids and vitamin E in scavenging free radicals, and its rate constant of quenching singlet oxygen is 100 times that of vitamin E.It is of great significance to prevent skin aging, prevent cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, prostate diseases, remove garbage in the body, enhance the human immune system and delay aging.It can effectively prevent and treat various diseases caused by aging and immune decline.Therefore, it is concerned by experts all over the world.

Drinking cooked tomato juice is the best way to supplement lycopene

Lycopene is known as "gold in plants".At present, lycopene has been widely accepted in Europe, America, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan.A cup of cooked tomato juice every day has become the living habit of high-quality families, and cooked tomato juice has become the top maintenance product for European and American families!

Lycopene widely exists in various organs and tissues of human body.It is mainly distributed in human blood, adrenal gland, liver, testis, prostate, breast, ovary, uterus, digestive tract and other organs, in which blood, adrenal gland, liver and testis contain more lycopene.Moreover, the content of lycopene in human body is related to human life span.Lycopene can also inhibit the oxidation of low density lipoprotein and resist ultraviolet radiation.

The United States and Japan have produced lycopene as the main active ingredient of drugs, its main role is to reduce blood pressure, treat high cholesterol, high blood lipid, reduce the activity of cancer cells.Lycopene is used to prevent prostate cancer in the United States and France.Israel and Australia have products used to prevent ultraviolet burns, protect skin, strengthen skin and nourish beauty.

The human body can't make lycopene, so it needs to take it from the diet. Eating a raw tomato can only absorb 0.05 mg of lycopene; only the tomato juice with proper ripening degree can greatly improve the absorption of lycopene through wall breaking technology.

The strongest antioxidant in the plant world

Delaying aging and enhancing immunity

Beautify and nourish the face, remove the rubbish in the body

Protect the prostate, protect the heart and brain

Powerful tomato juice, you can't expect the maintenance effect

Tomato juice is rich in lycopene, which has a variety of maintenance functions. Many families in Europe and the United States take natural tomato juice for a long time. Many people at the age of 40 can have a 20-year-old body, and those at the age of 60 can have a 40-year-old body.

Delaying aging and enhancing immunity

The aging of human body is closely related to the lack of lycopene. At the age of 40, it is the best time to prevent the aging and physical diseases. The way is to supplement lycopene.One lycopene molecule in tomato juice can quench tens of thousands of free radicals, and its antioxidant capacity is 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.It can effectively eliminate free radicals in human body, maintain normal metabolism of cells and prevent aging.Lycopene is absorbed in the body through the digestive tract mucosa, enters the blood and lymph, distributes to the testis, adrenal gland, prostate, pancreas, breast, ovary, liver, lung, colon, skin and various mucosal tissues, promotes the secretion of hormones by glands, so as to keep the human body vigorous; eliminates the free radicals in these organs and tissues, protects them from injury, and enhances the immunity of the bodyPestilence makes people less likely to get sick.

Italy confirmed that prevention and inhibition of cancer

One of the important mechanisms of tumorigenesis is that tissue cells undergo gene mutation under the action of external mutagens. Lycopene in tomato juice can block this process, effectively quench free radicals, and achieve the role of tumor prevention.For the formed tumor, it can promote intercellular signal transmission, inhibit and differentiate, induce cancer cells, and make them correct.

In Greece, Italy and other Mediterranean countries, where residents often eat barbecue food, barbecue food is easy to induce cancer.However, the incidence rate of cervical cancer, prostate cancer and liver cancer is low in this area.Because local people often eat tomato products - tomato juice and ketchup.Tomato juice is a necessary drink for them to roast fish and meat.This diet method reduces the mutagen effect in fried and baked food, and greatly reduces the cancer incidence.One of the main reasons for the formation of cancer cells is the sudden malignant transformation of genes by tissue cells under the action of external mutagens.Lycopene can inhibit the mutation process and prevent cancer.

The Italy Medical Research Institute used Lycopene in tomato juice to prevent cancer. It has been proved that lycopene can reduce the incidence rate of various cancers, especially the decrease of esophageal, gastric, colon and prostate cancer.

A comparative study conducted by the University of Illinois in the US found that incidence rate of cervical cancer is 5 times higher in women with low lycopene content than those with high lycopene in vivo.

The researchers studied 93 cases of lung cancer patients and 102 cases of non tumor controls, and detected the concentration of lycopene in the blood. The results showed that the concentrations of various nutrients in the blood of the two groups were similar, only lycopene was different. The concentration of lycopene in the tissues of lung cancer patients was significantly lower than that of the control group.

In this study, 26 patients with prostate cancer waiting for surgery were divided into two groups: one group took lycopene extracted from tomatoes, 15 mg twice a day; the other group did not take lycopene.Three weeks later, I was surprised to find that in patients taking lycopene, the tumor size was significantly reduced, and some were almost eliminated.

Improving cataract and age-related macular degeneration

According to Marius palman of the University of Wisconsin in the United States, compared with people with low blood lycopene concentration, people with high blood lycopene concentration are 50% less likely to develop age-related macular disease

10 European countries found that the protection of heart and brain

Lipoprotein oxidation is a key factor in the development of atherosclerosis.Lycopene plays an important role in reducing lipoprotein oxidation.It can remove vascular garbage, regulate plasma cholesterol concentration, inhibit arteriosclerosis formation and protect LDL from oxidation.It can also repair and improve the oxidized cells, promote the formation of intercellular glia, and enhance the flexibility of blood vessels.

According to reports, oral lycopene rich tomato juice can reduce serum cholesterol to below 5.20 mmol / L, which can slow down the development of cardiovascular disease.According to the research reports of 10 European countries, it is concluded that the intake of 30 mg lycopene per day can significantly reduce the risk of coronary heart disease.

"News network" once reported the experiment of 150 heart disease patients in Cambridge University of England: if they were given lycopene supplement every day for 4 consecutive weeks, the patients' low density cholesterol was significantly reduced, and the side effects were reduced compared with the lipid-lowering drugs, which confirmed that lycopene had a significant effect on the prevention of moderate wind and cardiovascular disease.

Strong anti alcohol effect

The main metabolic process of alcohol in human body is redox reaction, which produces a lot of free radicals.Taking lycopene at ordinary times can increase the amount of alcohol; taking lycopene before drinking can relieve alcohol damage to liver; taking lycopene after drinking can relieve headache, vomiting and other drunken symptoms.

Improve allergy

Lycopene can greatly improve skin allergy, eliminate dry skin and itching caused by skin allergy, and make people feel relaxed and happy.

Protection of mucosal tissue

Lycopene is abundant in various mucosal tissues in the body. Long term administration can improve various discomfort caused by the destruction of mucosal tissues in the body.Such as dry cough, dry eyes, oral ulcer, protection of gastrointestinal mucosa tissue.

In addition, lycopene also has many physiological functions, such as preventing osteoporosis, lowering blood pressure and reducing exercise-induced asthma.

Little tomato juice protects men's prostate health

With the growth of age, the rapid decline or lack of lycopene in men's prostate and blood will not be able to resist the erosion of free radicals on cell tissue, especially the damage to prostate tissue.The rapid loss of lycopene is the core of prostatitis and benign prostatic hyperplasia, which is the key to the long-term treatment of prostate disease.Once the content of lycopene in men's blood drops, it is easy to have dysuria, low back and perineum, lower abdominal acid, distending pain, poor energy, insomnia, amnesia, decreased resistance and other systemic adverse symptoms.

There are many layers of reticular fibers outside the male prostate, which are difficult to have inflammation or bacteria, but common drugs are difficult to work after infection.Lycopene in tomato juice can break through the prostate absorption barrier and directly enter the gland to play a role.In the study of carotenoids, only lycopene has a clear protective effect.Lycopene in tomato juice is transported to all organs of the body through human lipoprotein, with the highest concentration in testis, prostate and adrenal gland.It can remove the toxin that invades the prostate, so as to effectively prevent prostate lesions.Lycopene can also regulate the prostatic fluid, keep the pH value at 6-6.5, provide a comfortable environment for sperm activity, enhance sperm activity and improve male fertility.

Multi country studies have proved that tomato juice is the best maintenance product for men

Studies have confirmed that prostate disease is closely related to the concentration of lycopene in human body.The results of a 30-year survey of 1899 middle-aged men by the University of Chicago School of Medicine showed that the lower the intake of lycopene, the higher the risk of prostate disease.

Canada:A six-year follow-up study of 14000 men since 1976 found that those who ate tomato juice more than five times a week had a significantly lower risk of prostate disease.

India:Doctors in New Delhi have shown that lycopene improves the quality of men's sperm.The experiment confirmed that 23-45 years old infertile men took tomato juice containing 20 mg lycopene twice a day. After 3 months, the concentration, vitality and shape of sperm were good.

U.S.A:A follow-up study of 47890 medical staff conducted by Harvard University also confirmed that a large amount of lycopene intake of tomato products had a very significant negative correlation with the risk of prostate cancer, and the risk of prostate cancer decreased by 21% (up to 34%).Taking tomato juice containing 20 mg lycopene every day can effectively alleviate the disease.

Italy:Statistics show that the incidence rate of prostate in southern Italy is significantly lower than that in other areas, which may be related to tomato juice and tomato paste.

britain:Five urologists from the Department of Biochemical Sciences at the University of Portsmouth in the United Kingdom randomly selected strong men with an average age of 42. They were asked to drink a glass of tomato juice every day for two weeks, during which their semen samples were collected.The results showed that the level of lycopene in semen, which can eliminate harmful chemical free radicals, increased significantly, ranging from 7% to 12%.Scientists infer that if a man drinks a glass of tomato juice a day, it will greatly enhance fertility.

Tomato juice is essential for women's beauty and skin care

Since the 1950s, the theory of skin aging has been widely accepted in the field of Dermatology and medicine. The theory holds that the culprit of skin aging is free radicals.Free radicals are unstable oxygen molecules that destroy cells by seizing electrons.Cherie ditre, assistant professor of Dermatology and doctor of dermatology at the University of Pennsylvania, believes that although the original intention of free radicals is beneficial - they can kill harmful substances such as bacteria - while they proliferate, the structure of the skin is also damaged, and such damage will soon show up.Nicholas Perricone, M.D., the author of the newly published Perricone prescription, said: "in the midday sun, it takes only 40 minutes for free radicals stimulated by UV rays to consume 80% of vitamin C stored in the human body."

Skin problems can not only rely on skin care products, but also pay attention to the internal. Women's body functions begin to weaken from the age of 35, and all kinds of toxins in the body gradually accumulate, which is difficult to be discharged from the body.The garbage produced by these free radicals is a kind of toxic substance, which is harmful to human aging.At this time, we need to supplement some nutrients to help alleviate the body's aging speed, such as tomato juice, rich in antioxidants, can delay the aging of human body.Nowadays, people pay more and more attention to tomato beauty, mainly because tomato juice not only has good health care effect, but also has strong antioxidant effect, which can protect our skin health and beauty.

German research has proved that 200 ml tomato juice per day can effectively inhibit aging

Beauty is an indispensable course in women's daily life. In the face of all kinds of life pressure and work pressure in modern society, it is difficult to protect their skin to achieve the best state.Many friends with long spots on their faces have tried a variety of freckle removal products, but they have no effect. It not only costs time, but also costs a lot of money.Beauty experts tell us that lycopene in tomato juice can quench the free radicals that invade the human body, form a natural barrier on the surface of the skin, effectively prevent external damage to the skin, and promote the combination of collagen and elastin in the blood, which can easily fade the spots and make your face look more lustrous, elastic and charming.In addition to anti-oxidation and freckle removing, tomato juice also has whitening, black eye circles removing, dead skin removing and other good effects on women's beauty, so it is loved by most female friends.When you get up in the morning, you can drink a cup of tomato juice to ensure a good appearance and start a new day's work and life.

Research by scientists in Germany and the Netherlands shows that if everyone eats 200ml of cooked tomato juice every day, the risk of sunburn will be reduced by 40%.

The researchers added 200ml of ripe tomato juice to healthy women for two months. As a result, the area and degree of erythema caused by ultraviolet light were reduced.It is confirmed that eating tomato juice can promote the antioxidant capacity of the body, improve the body's own immunity, promote the microcirculation of skin tissue, and repair the damaged skin tissue.

The 100% tomato juice with the exact cosmetic effect is the most economical and practical female maintenance product. It is suggested that all the women who love beauty can enjoy the anti-aging effect of tomato juice more.

Our bodies rust every day, you know?
Our car will be maintained regularly, but our most precious body is often ignored!It has become the norm for Chinese people to make money with their bodies when they are young and to buy their lives when they are old.Why don't you take good care of yourself when you are young?Make money at the same time must take good care of the body, if you ignore it, it will slowly betray you... Pro, must remember!According to the survey, although the life expectancy of Chinese people has been extended, about half of the people over 65 years old in China have been taking a variety of drugs due to different diseases. Most of the elderly spend their days in the hospital intermittently.
However, this is not necessarily the case. In fact, many people's suffering from diseases can be prevented through maintenance in middle age or controlled by nutrition adjustment now.
In the United States, there are more and more "senior citizens" who are in good physical and mental condition. They are always healthy and full of vitality. We can see them in tennis courts, adult education classes, gymnasiums, and sometimes even in professional places.Researchers have conducted research on these elderly people who have a good old age and found that the maintenance carried out as early as middle age is the cornerstone of their good health after old age!
It's better to keep in good health in advance than to spend money on treatment
When the ruddy complexion quietly fades away, the wrinkles of years climb up the woman's face; when the energy is overdrawn for a long time, the pressure of career makes men unable to do what they want; when the heart and brain function is failing day by day, parents always have to face the threat of vascular sclerosisWe can't help asking: what steals our health?
British scientists have pointed out: iron will rust, silver will turn black, in fact, the human body will rust.The aging process of human body is similar to that of cut apple, which is the result of oxidation.Many chronic diseases of human beings are caused by oxidative stress, that is, the human body is rusting every day. The "rust" produced is called "free radical" in medicine, which is the root of many diseases of human body.Environmental pollution, life pressure, radiation and other factors are "oxidizing" our bodies all the time, reducing human life expectancy."Oxidation" is the main culprit that deprives people of health in life, and it is an important factor that leads to human aging and health problems!Experiments show that animals with low oxidative metabolism rate and strong antioxidant capacity are not easy to get sick, stronger and have the longest life span.
With the increase of age, our self-healing ability becomes weaker, and the damage caused by free radicals is manifested, such as wrinkles, color spots, poor energy, organ aging, arteriosclerosis, diabetes, cataract, cardiovascular disease, Alzheimer's disease, arthritis, cancer, etc., which are considered to be related to free radicals.
With the improvement of living standards, the popularization of nutrition knowledge and the improvement of health care awareness, the harm of chronic diseases related to diet is not only valued by the state and society, but also aroused people's general concern. The concept of "prevention is more important than treatment" has gradually replaced the habit of "treating diseases only when they are sick".
Our goal is not to turn back the clock, but to live the best quality of life at the age of 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80 and even 100!
"Wolf peach" in South America becomes a new favorite of European and American family maintenance
Tomato, which is rich in nutrition and delicious, is known as the fruit delicacy and the ruby of green world.It is said that the hometown of tomato is in Peru and Mexico. It was originally a wild berry growing in the forest. It was originally called "wolf peach". The fruit is rich in nutrition and has a special flavor.According to records, in the 16th century, a Duke of England named orodala was traveling in South America. He liked tomatoes very much, so he brought them back to England as a gift of love to his lover Queen Elizabeth to express his love.Since then, the names of "love fruit" and "lover fruit" have been widely spread.Europeans began to plant tomatoes in courtyards and gardens, and as a symbol of love and friendship gifts between men and women.
Time of the United States selects the food that contributes the most to human health
American "time" magazine introduced many kinds of food which are beneficial to modern people's health, among which tomato ranked the first.Tomato is rich in antioxidants, which can prevent the damage of free radicals to the skin. It has obvious effects of beauty, anti wrinkle, anti-aging, improving energy, protecting organs, and can greatly reduce the risk of cancer.

It is said that Americans who pay attention to health care should drink two things when they wake up in the morning and before going to bed at night: one is milk, and the other is tomato juice.According to statistics, the per capita consumption of tomatoes in European and American countries is more than 30 times of that in China. In particular, 100% pure tomato juice has become an essential maintenance product for the whole family in European and American families.Drinking a glass of tomato juice every day brings obvious benefits to the maintenance oriented European and American people.The old people often drink it to delay aging, protect heart, brain, prostate and other important organs. The men often drink it with vigorous energy, while the women often drink it to beautify and beautify the skin, remove wrinkles and spots.
200g tomato juice, supplement the whole body nutrition

 Tomato juice is rich in vitamins, alkalis, cellulose and pectin, and is rich in lycopene. Lycopene is the strongest antioxidant, which can delay aging, beautifying beauty, improving energy and enhancing immunity. The higher the content of lycopene in human plasma, the lower the incidence rate of cancer and coronary heart disease.
 Tomato juice contains a variety of organic acids. In addition to protecting vitamin C from damage, organic acids can also soften blood vessels, promote the absorption of calcium and iron, and help stomach juice digest fat and protein, which is beyond other vegetables and fruits;
 Tomato juice also contains a kind of anti-cancer and anti-aging substance called glutathione. Studies have found that tomato juice can prevent some types of cancer, inhibit breast cancer, lung cancer, endometrial cancer, and also fight lung cancer and colon cancer;
 Lycopene has the effect of diuresis and inhibiting the growth of bacteria. It is an excellent antioxidant and can remove free radicals in human body;
 Tomato juice also has the effect of beauty, appetite, protein digestion, reduce stomach distension.Its characteristics are between fruits and vegetables, rich in vitamin A and C. due to the protection of organic acids, vitamin C can not be destroyed in tomato cooking.

Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant in nature
1913Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant found in plants in nature, was first found in cooked tomatoes.Its antioxidant capacity is 3.2 times that of carotene, 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.Science has proved that the free radicals in human body are the main culprits of human autoimmune system.Lycopene is more effective than other carotenoids and vitamin E in scavenging free radicals, and its rate constant of quenching singlet oxygen is 100 times that of vitamin E.It is of great significance to prevent skin aging, prevent cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, prostate diseases, remove garbage in the body, enhance the human immune system and delay aging.It can effectively prevent and treat various diseases caused by aging and immune decline.Therefore, it is concerned by experts all over the world.
Drinking cooked tomato juice is the best way to supplement lycopene
Lycopene is known as "gold in plants".At present, lycopene has been widely accepted in Europe, America, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan.A cup of cooked tomato juice every day has become the living habit of high-quality families, and cooked tomato juice has become the top maintenance product for European and American families!
Lycopene widely exists in various organs and tissues of human body.It is mainly distributed in human blood, adrenal gland, liver, testis, prostate, breast, ovary, uterus, digestive tract and other organs, in which blood, adrenal gland, liver and testis contain more lycopene.Moreover, the content of lycopene in human body is related to human life span.Lycopene can also inhibit the oxidation of low density lipoprotein and resist ultraviolet radiation.
The United States and Japan have produced lycopene as the main active ingredient of drugs, its main role is to reduce blood pressure, treat high cholesterol, high blood lipid, reduce the activity of cancer cells.Lycopene is used to prevent prostate cancer in the United States and France.Israel and Australia have products used to prevent ultraviolet burns, protect skin, strengthen skin and nourish beauty.
The human body can't make lycopene, so it needs to take it from the diet. Eating a raw tomato can only absorb 0.05 mg of lycopene; only the tomato juice with proper ripening degree can greatly improve the absorption of lycopene through wall breaking technology.

Italy confirmed that prevention and inhibition of cancer
One of the important mechanisms of tumorigenesis is that tissue cells undergo gene mutation under the action of external mutagens. The Italy Medical Research Institute used Lycopene in tomato juice to prevent cancer. It has been proved that lycopene can reduce the incidence rate of various cancers, especially the decrease of esophageal, gastric, colon and prostate cancer.
A comparative study conducted by the University of Illinois in the US found that incidence rate of cervical cancer is 5 times higher in women with low lycopene content than those with high lycopene in vivo.
The researchers studied 93 cases of lung cancer patients and 102 cases of non tumor controls, and detected the concentration of lycopene in the blood. The results showed that the concentrations of various nutrients in the blood of the two groups were similar, only lycopene was different. The concentration of lycopene in the tissues of lung cancer patients was significantly lower than that of the control group.
