According to nutritionists research and determination: each person eating 200 grams of tomato juice every day, can meet the human body's needs for a variety of vitamins and minerals.Tomato contains "lycopene", which can inhibit bacteria; it also contains malic acid, citric acid and sugar; it is rich in vitamin A, vitamin C, vitamin B1, vitamin B2, carotene, calcium, phosphorus, potassium, magnesium, iron, zinc, copper, iodine and other elements; it also contains egg white, sugar, organic acid, cellulose."Tomato's ideal" brand 100% Xinjiang tomato juice is rich in a variety of natural nutrients, which is very beneficial for teenagers who are in urgent need of a variety of nutrients!

story:
We're redefining what's possible to "Be Your Better Self!"™

REACH FOR YOUR LUCKY STAR!™ is our patent-pending nutritious formulations of cognitive-enhancing Nootropic supplements in delicious beverages and versatile foods. We're coming out of 3 years in stealth mode at the critical Proof-of-Concept stage...and we need YOU and your contribution to complete our formulation development and rapidly prepare for scalable production.

CONSIDER THE POTENT POSSIBILITIES FOR:

·         High-Achieving Students

·         Stress-Driven Executives

·         Constantly-Evolving Technology Professionals

·         Competitive Athletes

·         Artists striving to achieve greater creativity

...and yes, Moms doing the demanding work that Mom’s do.

VITALITY CATALYST™ FORMULATIONS. Instead of routinely loading up on caffeine, sugar and empty calories in your beverages and snack foods, with the “time-of-day”  Vitality Catalyst™ formulations in REACH FOR YOUR LUCKY STAR™ you can nourish your mind and body to Feel Good For All The Right Reasons!™

Origin: Founder Chadwick St.-OHarra's interest in NOOTROPICS began in 2007 while conducting a biotechnology business in mainland China to help reduce pervasive food poisoning from the wide-spread use of contaminated cooking oil. Unsafe drinking water was yet another serious daily health risk, especially for the children. Imagine the health challenges when MOST municipal water is UNSAFE.

Exploring how ordinary (as well as exceptionally bright and healthy) people coped with their daily exposure to "societal toxins" he became acquainted with expert practitioners in Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM). Based on that research, in 2014 Chad and his Team began investigating Nootropic compounds and reading about their powerful therapeutic potential to significantly improve daily brain function without unwanted and unpredictable side-effects.

Taking the Road To Discovery...Not a "quick buck": After exploring the international marketplace and contacting nutritional and pharmaceutical experts and not finding any effective, reliable and safe Nootropic products on the market, but no shortage of expensive placebos and mystery pills, Chad and his team began a methodical investigation of more than 900 Nootropics (classified as nutritional supplements) and their expanded potential when "stacked" or combined.

He found the elusive keys to both their effectiveness and safety: Formulation and Dosage Balancing. He then combined essential, all natural nutritional benefits for a unique approach to improving the performance of both mind and body. That's why our Proof-of-Concept will make a life-changing difference for so many people!

 

A Formulation Platform With Potent Possibilities: As a senior technologist with 18 years’ experience delivering complex international technology projects, Chad developed a scalable business model to produce 4 "time-of-day specific" platform formulations: BOUNCE!™, THINK!™, REACTIVATE!™ and CHILLIFY!™, each known as a Vitality Catalyst™. Together these unique and customizable formulations have become the patent pending discoveries encompassed within REACH FOR YOUR LUCKY STAR!™

WHAT’S IN THIS FOR YOU? Who couldn’t benefit from increased mental stamina, more rapid learning, retention and recall along with improved sustainable energy and even enhanced creativity? Your life is precious. What you get from your life is precious. You can reach for more challenging and rewarding goals…when you REACH FOR YOUR LUCKY STAR!

We've been entirely self-funded to date...It’s time to lend your support!

Join with us now as we launch our first-ever crowdfunding campaign! We need your support (and the support of your friends and LinkedIn Connections) to prove to the Big Beverage marketplace that many of you want to reduce your intake of caffeine, sugar and excessive empty calories to evolve to "Be Your Better Self™”. This crowdfunding will raise essential working capital to complete our Proof-of-Concept and move closer to bringing the benefits of REACH FOR YOUR LUCKY STAR!™ to you, your family and friends.

And in the process…

Together, we’ll make another life-changing impact for healthy living:

A Non-Profit That Will Make a Global Difference…Now and For Generations To Come!

Kids in the USA and around the world are getting sick and dying from drinking unsafe water. As long as we’re already in the “purified water business” to produce REACH FOR YOUR LUCKY STAR!™ we will form a non-profit funded by RFYLS and 100% of the net proceeds from Limited Edition Lucky-inspired merchandise sales. Free water purification technology and training will be locally-based in each community using cost-effective, easily sustainable technology. 

Mr. Lucky™, “Ambassador To Your Better Self”!™

Check out our amazing video for more details

and experience MR. LUCKY's story! 

Please consider a generous contribution...Cool perks await!

From our hearts and minds to yours,

THANK YOU!

Chad

Meredith

Patrick

Beth

The risks we've identified involve being able to pack and ship all of our orders. We are confident that we will be able to meet the requirements to get orders out.

story:
Watching my Grandma make me wonderful pancakes with her Cast iron Skillet when I was a child created wonderful memories.

Since then I have always enjoyed cooking with Cast Iron even after I grew up and became a Professional Chef.

A cast-iron skillet and cookware is often the cornerstone of any  kitchen producing deliciousness, home or pro. Cast Iron will sear, bake,  saute and fry with consistent results. No other type of cookware can compare.  Cast Iron is famous for that naturally available non-stick cooking surface from seasoning yet for lack of convenience, cast-iron is often overlooked in favor of coated non-stick pans. we are here to make it easy for you to get that cast iron skillet or other cookware out of the closet and make it the go to item in your kitchen for producing easy to cook amazing foods by simply maintaining a premium cooking surface with Foodieville Cast Iron Oil and Soap. No need to buy high priced new Cast Iron now you can utilize and make great any Cast Iron you already have or can easily pick up at even at Yard sales  and Flea Markets. With a little Care Cast Iron cookware can last forever.  Here at Creation Farm we have Created the Foodieville Cast Iron Oil and Cast Iron soap so that everyone can inexpensively revive their Cast Iron cookware with a premium cooking surface and begin to create culinary memories for your family and friends, by simply seasoning the cookware for ultimate performance. 

You can help us make this product available for kitchens, Grandma's, and Pro Chefs everywhere by getting some to try now as part of our funding process.

Fully Developed Ready for Production

Now, you too can be an amazing cast iron cook like my Grandma was! The products are all set to produce and bottle, We need to bring in the truckload of Bottles and Trigger Sprayers, and the oils to blend to fill them. The labels are designed and being printed, The  e-commerce images have been created and distributed throughout our web marketing network. We have already made and made and sent out a few small batches and they sold out immediately. There are other Cast Iron Seasoning Oils and Soaps on the market.  After much product research we found they all have pain points so we developed our blends to try to be one up and eliminate the common pain points for this type product. By Including an easy to use Trigger Sprayer we made it easier to use than the competitors and no more lost caps after setting it somewhere while you pour out some product.

With your support we can make this easy to use cast iron seasoning oil and soap available everywhere: from the finest kitchens in Connecticut to the wood fired cook stoves in the farthest reaches, 

More about the How and Why This  is Needed and Wanted in the Market

Cast iron Seasoning Oil choices have long seemed to be confusing for many cooks who use this traditional cookware. The Seasoning on Cast Iron is what creates that beautiful smooth non stick finish on the cooking surface that Cast Iron is famous for. The debate has raged over the past century about what is better- some say just use bacon grease, some say flax seed oil is best, and some say just use plain vegetable oil like Canola or Soybean.

A little science behind the seasoning- The smooth surface after the Cast Iron i seasoned properly is not actually oil. The process of heating the pan with the seasoning oil on it is known as polymerization. It changes the seasoning oil to a smooth coating of polymers that can then stay smooth while withstanding the cooking temperatures and preserving a smooth non stick cooking surface in the Iron.

While all cooking oils can create some form of polymer surface on the cookware after much research the cooks at the Creation Farm Test Kitchen have created a special blend of Oils that creates a premium cooking surface on the Cast Iron. With this Innovation the Foodieville Cast Iron Seasoning Oil has now been made available for everyone.

Easy to Make Your Cast Iron your main choice again

A simple process - Preheat your oven to 375 degrees, Spray a light coating of Foodieville Cast Iron Oil on the cookware, give it a quick wipe with a paper towel to even it out and place the cookware in the oven upside down for 45 minutes, Shut off the oven and let the cookware cool before removing. Some new Cast Iron products come pre-seasoned yet still benefit from this process before using it. If your Cast Iron is not seasoned or has been treated improperly for a period of time you may want to repeat this process before using it to build up a well seasoned cooking surface.

We are at a time in our history where nutrition and healthy living has come back into focus in the home kitchen,

Cast iron cookware is in vogue more than ever with people rapidly replacing the chemically electroplated cookware that has inundated our home kitchens over the past few decades, promising a greater ease for cooking but at a highly toxic price as the cookware starts to age and the chemical surface begins chipping and scaling off into our food.

We are excited to have you Try the Cast Iron Seasoning Oil, Try the Cast Iron Soap, or try them both by choosing from the selection of exciting perks we will gratefully send you when you Choose to help us fund this Product Launch

Using Foodieville Cast Iron Seasoning Oil for a Premium cooking surface unleashes a whole new world of culinary opportunity for the home kitchen and many Professional kitchens are jumping on board as well to provide safe highly nutritious cuisines for their rapidly growing base of health conscious customers all prepared in the prestigious tradition of Cast iron cooking.

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not have any Cast Iron Cookware at this time or you may not even cook:

  • We will also be eternally grateful to any of you folks that can help us get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Please be willing to share this will all you Instagram and Facebook friends and to make that even easier Consider using all the Indiegogo share tools

story: My name is Kate.  I'm a baker and want to bake cookies for a living.  Right now, baking is my side hustle.  I am reaching out to my friends and family to see if you will support my business so I can bake cookies full time.
story_txt: My name is Kate.  I'm a baker and want to bake cookies for a living.  Right now, baking is my side hustle.  I am reaching out to my friends and family to see if you will support my business so I can bake cookies full time.

story:
The Tea Makers is a startup, based in Santorini, which is a very popular destination worldwide and can promote the wealth of the Greek earth to a wide variety of nationalities. 

 

The team consists of three young persons, coming from farming families of Northern Greece and have studied and worked in the field of tourism and public service for many years. Our vision is to offer a product which is not yet available in Greece, to contribute in the local economy and to highlight the possibilities and the capabilities of our country.

 

We have just now started our production. The season comes to an ending and there is a long winter ahead of us. 

 

We need the funds to cover our winter expences and be able to continue production and fill the island with delicious ice tea to refresh everybody in the Summer under the strong Santorinian sun! 

 

Thank you very much for your contribution and valuable support! 

 

The Tea Makers Team
story_txt:

The team consists of three young persons, coming from farming families of Northern Greece and have studied and worked in the field of tourism and public service for many years. Our vision is to offer a product which is not yet available in Greece, to contribute in the local economy and to highlight the possibilities and the capabilities of our country.
 
We have just now started our production. The season comes to an ending and there is a long winter ahead of us. 
 
We need the funds to cover our winter expences and be able to continue production and fill the island with delicious ice tea to refresh everybody in the Summer under the strong Santorinian sun! 
 
Thank you very much for your contribution and valuable support! 
 
The Tea Makers Team

story:
"Non possiamo rinunciare ai beni di prima necessità, ma scegliere come acquistarli può fare la differenza!"

 

EggMarket è il primo e-commerce italiano per la spesa online che nasce dall'esigenza di sostenere i piccoli negozianti locali e tutti gli italiani nella campagna #iorestoacasa ai fini di ridurre il contagio.

Con la nostra app potrai effettuare ordini, confrontare prezzi dello stesso prodotto e ricevere la spesa in un'ora da ogni attività fino a 2 km dalla tua posizione.

Abbiamo ascoltato le nostre esigenze e quelle di molti italiani, e abbiamo deciso di offrire un'alternativa alle modalità d'acquisto di beni di prima necessità, senza recarsi fisicamente allo store fisico e garantendo comunque qualità ed efficienza.

Inoltre, è ormai chiaro che l'impatto ambientale dell'essere umano andrà sempre più influenzando le nostre vite e le nostre economie, per cui ci impegneremo a rendere il servizio il più ecosostenibile possibile, con scooter elettrici, droni e zero spreco.

Aiutaci a mettere in atto il progetto nel più breve tempo possibile, supportaci per raggiungere il nostro target.  Ci vuole davvero pochissimo per aiutare il nostro paese, e noi siamo pronti a farlo.

Lo facciamo per noi stessi e per le per le persone che amiamo.

 

La spesa la scegli tu, noi ti assicuriamo la consegna entro 1 ora dall'ordine!

 

Con EggMarket i negozi di prima necessità potranno gestire al meglio i rifornimenti perchè agli ordini ci pensiamo noi.

 

Obiettivo

Una parte dei fondi andrà alla realizzazione dell'applicazione e l'altra alla componente operativa che comprende costi di risorse umane quali corrieri, mezzi di trasporto, delivery stations e creazione di stazioni elettriche per ricaricare i nostri mezzi all green!

 

I nostri Perks per te

  1. Con una donazione di 500€ avrai diritto ad uno sconto del 60% sulla tua prima spesa;

  2. Se sarai tra i primi 10 con una donazione superiore a 2000€ sarai esonerato dalle spese di spedizione...a vita!
 

Il tuo impatto / #iorestoacasa

 

 

Il tuo contributo per EggMarket con la campagna #iorestoacasa aiuterà a:

  1. Offrire un'alternativa alla classica spesa evitando gli assembramenti agli ingressi dei supermercati;

  2. Creare tanti nuovi posti di lavoro e ripresa dell'economia italiana che sta vivendo un periodo di crisi;

  3. Portare innovazione nel nostro paese e dal nostro paese (ricorda che EggMarket è la prima piattaforma di local grocery delivery italiana!);

  4. Non trovarci impreparati in futuro. 

 

Completamente green!



EggMarket utilizzerà scooter elettrici per le consegne, in tal modo da abbattere il suo impatto ambientale. Inoltre, sperimenteremo l'utilizzo di sacchetti ecosostenibili e processi a basso impatto ambientale.

 

Ostacoli

EggMarket è un progetto di grandi proporzioni e in quanto tale non è privo di ostacoli, recando con sé grandi responsabilità. A tal proposito il nostro team si impegna a far fronte a tali difficoltà sulla base della nostra esperienza, professionalità, passione e cuore. 
Laddove non riuscissimo a realizzare il progetto, daremo il ricavato alla sanità italiana per affrontare al meglio il nostro nemico comune.

 

Cos'altro puoi fare per supportarci?

Anche una tua condivisione di questa campagna ci aiuterà nella nostra missione. Oppure visita la nostra pagina e condividila.

Uniti vinceremo tutti!



 

Le fasi

Fase 1

Creazione del minimum viable product (MVP) attraverso varie fasi di iterazioni del prototipo, della versione alpha e della pre-beta. Allo stesso momento, iniziare l'esplorazione delle aree per la partenza dei test sul campo.

⇩

Fase 2

Inizio fase di testing delle operazioni e dei processi con un pool di commercianti iniziali coi quali raffinare l'applicazione shop-side e user-side.

⇩

Fase 3

Continuazione testing del servizio e inizio operazioni di scala con attività di business development e marketing.

⇩

Fase 4

L'app è sul tuo smartphone, enjoy!

A tal proposito il nostro team si impegna a far fronte a tali difficoltà sulla base della nostra esperienza, professionalità, passione e cuore. Laddove non riuscissimo a realizzare il progetto, daremo il ricavato alla sanità italiana per affrontare al meglio il nostro nemico comune. Cos'altro puoi fare per supportarci?
Anche una tua condivisione di questa campagna ci aiuterà nella nostra missione. Oppure  visita la nostra pagina e condividila.
Uniti vinceremo tutti!
 Le fasi

Fase 1
Creazione del minimum viable product (MVP) attraverso varie fasi di iterazioni del prototipo, della versione alpha e della pre-beta. Allo stesso momento, iniziare l'esplorazione delle aree per la partenza dei test sul campo.
⇩
Fase 2
Inizio fase di testing delle operazioni e dei processi con un pool di commercianti iniziali coi quali raffinare l'applicazione shop-side e user-side.
⇩
Fase 3
Continuazione testing del servizio e inizio operazioni di scala con attività di business development e marketing.
⇩
Fase 4
L'app è sul tuo smartphone, enjoy!

story:
Short Summary

I'm starting a project where I will collaborate with some of my favorite people in brewing to bring some of the beers I've always wanted to make to life!

  • I spent over 5 years in sales in the beer industry in North Texas. In that time it was always my dream to start my own brewery but a year ago I made the choice to step away to better provide for my growing family. 
  • When I walked away I left a lot of ideas on the table, from beers I wanted to see made to beer dinners I wanted to coordinate. 
  • This project will allow me to continue to provide for my family while being able to pursue my craft beer dreams in a small way.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • I need a small amount of startup capital to bring my monster to life. 
  • This initial money will help me work with a designer to create a logo and create some of the initial marketing items needed such as stickers, shirts and social media.

Risks & Challenges

  • At the end of the day, I am not a brewer. This project will allow me to work with and learn from some of the best brewers I know. What I bring to the table is ideas and experience in marketing great beers.
  • I need you to help me with the initial seed money to be able to show potential partners what I can bring to the project.

I need you to help me with the initial seed money to be able to show potential partners what I can bring to the project.

story:
Hey there beautiful people! :)

Thank you for visiting my project page, let me tell you what is it all about.

So very recently I found my calling and I quit my day job to pursue my dream. It's crazy, I know, but I'm all in! I've never had this drive before and I just want to do whatever it takes to follow my dreams so I don't have any regrets in the future, you know? I do everything I can to keep up with my rent and bills while working on making my dream come true but I definitely need your support - hence this project. 

Your generous and kind contributions will help me SO MUCH with my rent and bills, you have no idea. In return for your support, kindness, and generosity, I will share a recipe for my specialty dish that's famous with EVERYONE who has ever tried it - "better than beef" TURKEY BURGER. I don't even like turkey that much but I can guarantee that this recipe will absolutely blow your mind - it's simple, yet the result is amazing. TB comes out to be light, juicy, and delicious! 

Depending on your pledge, I will also share recipes for my signature fries (for this particular burger recipe), and a bonus recipe(s) for soup, lamb and potatoes, or a killer salad! Trust me, they are to die for! I will also host an event for the most generous contributors (read pledges' descriptions for more details) Descriptions of my recipes are below :) #mouthwatering 

"Better than Beef" Turkey burger (TB) - who doesn't love burgers? You're not a real American if you don't love burgers! But the only thing I don't like about eating burgers is that I feel heavy afterwards. So I came up with this turkey burger recipe. Burger comes out so juicy so flavorful yet light - it's crazy! You'll be FOODgazming (get it? lol) after eating one for sure, this burger is bomb! 

G's signature fries - I have a few recipes for making fries but for my TB I always make crispy on the outside super soft on the inside fries - delicious, flavorful, and texture is just perfect! God give me the will not to run to the kitchen to start cooking before I finish the sentence...! lol

Killer Salad - I know what you think, who can't cut tomatoes and cucumbers and make a salad. True. NOT! It's all about the dressing. You can make a dressing that will create fireworks in your mouth, will go good with basically any food you serve, and super light at the same time. if you've ever watched TopChef, you know that simple things are the most difficult ones. Couldn't be more true :) 

Lamb and potatoes - I came up with this recipe when I was in college. Until this very day, this is one of my most famous dishes. You can't smell/taste lamb's very distinctive smell/taste. The way I make it, the meat is soft, flavors are spot on, and it comes with potatoes with really unusual texture that make lamb almost melt in your mouth. Yup! Melt! :) 

Soup - I try to eat healthy and improve my dietary habits. I can't live without meat but I'm trying to make it a habit to go meat free one week in a month or two (or 5 lol). I feel like it's good for my body. So when I was looking for vegetarian options, nothing looked appealing. I'm allergic to beans which made almost all vegetarian options that I saw a "no go" for me. So I created this soup recipe, it's the healthiest thing I've ever cooked, yet tastes F amazing!! Packed with flavors, light yet filling. What else can a person ask for? Cheap to make and super easy to cook. 

P.S.I couldn't post a gif here so here's a link for the gif that's just perfect for the occasion lol http://gph.is/1LAlEUU​

Now that you know my story, I want to thank you again for being a kick ass human being and helping me out :)

story:
Horchata de Chufa – the superior vegan milk

Our Horchata is a perfect milk alternative for people allergic to dairy, gluten, nut, soy, etc. and at the same time more nutritious. It is made from a superfood called Chufa which belongs to the tuber family (a root vegetable like carrots, potatoes, etc.)

In comparison, it has…

  • 18x more Vitamin B1 than Fresh milk
  • 7.5x more Zinc than Soybean milk
  • 4.9x more Magnesium than Almond milk
  • 1.8x more Phosphorous than Soybean milk

 

Enjoy the amazing health benefits of Horchata

  • Boosts Immune System and Protects Against Harmful Bacteria and Viruses 
    – a rich source of zinc & copper which is necessary for the normal function of immune system
  • Reduces the Risk of Heart Disease 
    – excellent source of monounsaturated fat which helps to lower bad cholesterol in our bodies and also rich in Vitamin B1 which contributes to normal functioning of heart and nervous system
  • Enjoy Higher Energy Levels and Reduction in Tiredness
    – Source of Phosphorous & Magnesium which helps with energy metabolism to give you the energy you need for the day
  • Prevents Premature Aging and Wrinkles 
    – Source of antioxidant Vitamin E which helps to protect the body against free-radicals that cause premature aging

     

    The Best Quality Horchata We can Offer You

    We pride ourselves in making high quality products

    • Higher concentration of nut-to-water ratio to give you that extra creaminess

      • Most plant milks in the market has a ratio of 1:20 (raw ingredient:water). However, we choose to maintain a ratio of 1:4 (Chufa:water) to give you the best flavour.

    • Natural fragrant taste without any additional flavourings

      • We believe in serving you naturally tasty food without using artificial flavourings. To do so, we experimented with different sources of Chufas and recipes over a span of 6 months to obtain the perfect taste.

    • Direct from source and using the best Chufas

      • To source for the best Chufas, we screened through many suppliers and even flew down personally to the farms in Valencia, Spain, before deciding on a trusted partner to work with.

     

    How it started

    We first tried Horchata in Barcelona during a summer college vacation and it was love at first taste – simply heavenly! Later on, after realising that this version of Horchata was not widely found in other parts of the world, we started our mission to make this gem accessible in Singapore and hopefully beyond.

    We have a vision to share this yummy and nutritious horchata with everyone in Singapore and promote a healthier lifestyle.

     

    As seen on

     

    Hear what others have to say about our Horchata

    What We are Offering

    The longer you subscribe, the more you save! Early bird gifts up for grabs!

    Don’t forget to invite your friends to ensure the campaign is a success so everyone gets to enjoy the discounted price!

     

    Project Timeline

    We are currently producing Original Horchata in small batches and will be able to produce in bulk once we have the demand. If you know someone who can benefit from this package, help us to spread the word!

    We are currently in R&D stage for naturally flavoured Horchata.

    April – Planning

    May – Indiegogo campaign

    June – Indiegogo campaign

    July – Production & Delivery (all subscription plans will start in July once the campaign is over)

    August – Production & Delivery

    September – Production & Delivery

story:
Dimensions:

When collapsed: 7.87” x 4.72” x 0.87”-1.1” (20cm x 12cm x 2.2-2.8cm)

When expanded: 7.87” x 4.72” x 3.15” (20cm x 12cm x 8cm)

Capacity:

When expanded: 56.81 oz (1,680 ml)

 

Weight (including lunchbox, divider and cutlery):

400-500 g (0.88lb-1.1lb)

(The exact thickness of collapsed MolaBox and the weight will be confirmed after further mechanical engineering adjustments.)

 

 

 

Be the first to sell MolaBox! If you are interested in reselling large amount of MolaBoxes, please do not hesitate to email us. Thank you.

 

Pola Mola is an eco-friendly startup with a mission to treat people and the environment well.

We started Pola Mola to create high-quality, innovative and sustainable products that enable people to live better and contribute to environmental protection. Our product design and production are driven by our core values of love for the environment, humanity, culture and justice.

We believe that no one is too small to protect the Earth. Everyone can be an environmentalist. Instead of waiting for someone to save the planet, let us be part of the change.

Climate change, pollution and ocean waste have been threatening the Earth rapidly. It is easy to lose hope, but giving up our home is never an option. We do not wait for hope; we create hope through action.

 

Risks and challenges

Design:
We have been working with top product designers for almost a year to design this innovative, eco-friendly and durable product. After the campaign, we will continue to work with professional engineers to further improve the design and production. MolaBox may be subject to minor engineering adjustments for enhanced durability and portability.

Production and shipping:
We understand that unforeseeable delays could sometimes happen during the production and shipping processes, however we are 100% determined to ensure that all of you can receive the best MolaBox on time.

 

Warranty


We have included a limited lifetime warranty of two years on every new MolaBox (starting from the first day of shipping).

For as long as you own the product, we will provide a warranty against defects in materials and workmanship. Please note that our guarantee does not cover general wear, tear and damage caused by accident or by using the MolaBox under an abnormal environment or using the MolaBox for other than its intended purpose. We will exchange components, repair, or substitute the appropriate types of items at its discretion. All replaced parts will be brand new parts.

We will cover shipping fees of repaired product to you. If you wish to replace a defective item, please send photos or a short video of the defect and your proof of purchase to contact@polamola.com.

story:
We are two Iowa families who founded Goats On The Go®, a targeted grazing (AKA goat rental) company, in 2012 as a better way to raise livestock and feed people...to produce meat that delivers more to the world than it takes.

We chose to raise goats because they are uniquely equipped to benefit the world throughout their lives, not just when they become food (like most other livestock). Our goats eat the weeds and brush our customers want rid of, that other food animals can't utilize. In other words, our goats convert nutrients that would otherwise be wasted into nutrition for people! At the same time, they replace the chemical pesticides and disruptive mechanization that would typically be used to control unwanted vegetation. And, much of what our herd eats are invasive plant species, which are a huge threat to native landscapes all over North America.

After several years of growth, it's now time for Goats On The Go® to share our Meat Made Good with a wider audience. 

By purchasing a butcher's box or related product from us, you'll make it possible for us to process, package, and deliver butcher's boxes of our goat meat - which we believe to be the most sustainable meat on Earth - to customers' doorsteps all over the United States. 

We'll be using supporter funds to:

  • Pay our butcher and fulfillment company;
  • Design and print labels and packaging; and, 
  • Promote the availability of our butcher's boxes.

Any good?! Is creme brulee any good? Is filet mignon any good?

Goat meat is special. We think it rivals the best steak out there, but connoisseurs would scoff at the comparison to mere beef. It shares a bit of the richness of lamb but is milder in flavor. Goat is increasingly found on the menus of top restaurants including New Orleans' Herbsaint Bar and Restaurant, Seattle's Stateside, and Girl and the Goat in Chicago. For home chefs and foodies wanting to impress, goat meat has no equal. It is unique and familiar, eccentric and accessible, all at the same time.

For followers of Paleo, Keto, and other low-carb diets, goat meat is a godsend. It brings variety to the beef/chicken/pork (rinse, repeat) monotony that can make these lifestyles challenging. Goat meat is also versatile. It's equally delicious as chops on the grill, roasts in the slow cooker, stews and curries, or sausages (huevos con chorizo, anyone?).

 

And, goat meat is incredibly healthy. Check out these nutritional stats:

Goat meat is a staple red meat world-wide, but many Americans' experience with goats is limited to petting zoos and social media videos. While there are several miniature breeds of goats that are bred and sold primarily as pets, the long history of goats worldwide has always centered on their agricultural value. For thousands of years goats have been prized as the ultimate food animal, reliably feeding people with meat and milk while demanding little in resources.

We raise our goats slowly, without added hormones or feeding regimens designed to produce unnatural rapid growth. Market pressures typically dictate that most meat goats are harvested at around six months of age or younger, weighing as little as 40 pounds. But because our goats earn their keep by eating unwanted weeds and brush, we're under no pressure to rush things. Our goats are 19 - 20 months old and around 100 pounds at harvest, so each animal delivers maximum benefit to the world in terms of conservation and calories.

Our vision for meat production is to be big while being small. To be local while being national. To scale up without watering down our standards. To do this we are growing a network of goat grazing affiliates all over the country. These are hometown businesses that provide weed and brush control with their own goat herds to nearby customers under the Goats On The Go® brand. After just two years of offering our affiliate program the network has grown to 16 affiliates in six U.S. states. We expect ever greater geographic reach in coming years.

Initially, all our goat meat will be processed by Story City Locker, a local family-owned butcher near our founding place in Central Iowa. As demand grows, we'll be building relationships with butchers local to outlying affiliates. Our model benefits family farms and local butchers economically, while responsibly delivering the most sustainable meat on Earth to you!

Chad Steehoek is a co-owner of Goats On The Go®. He also owns and operates a business that recycles landscape waste into amazing compost. His motto: "If things don't blow up in your face every once in awhile, what stories will you have to tell?"

 

Aaron Steele is the founder and a co-owner of Goats On The Go®. He's likely the only urban planner/marketer/goat farmer you'll ever meet. Aaron holds an MBA from Iowa State University.

 

Ty Gustafson left the corporate world in 2012 to open Story City Locker with his wife, Bobbie. They believe sustainable agriculture and local food systems improve quality of life in a broad way. Story City Locker practices humane take down methods.

Chad Steehoek is a co-owner of Goats On The Go®. He also owns and operates a business that recycles landscape waste into amazing compost. His motto: "If things don't blow up in your face every once in awhile, what stories will you have to tell?"
 

Aaron Steele is the founder and a co-owner of Goats On The Go®. He's likely the only urban planner/marketer/goat farmer you'll ever meet. Aaron holds an MBA from Iowa State University.
 

Ty Gustafson left the corporate world in 2012 to open Story City Locker with his wife, Bobbie. They believe sustainable agriculture and local food systems improve quality of life in a broad way. Story City Locker practices humane take down methods.

story:
Harvest microgreens at home, like a professional indoor farmer.

  •  Room temperature (20°C | 70°F) is ideal for growing microgreens
  •  No dry-out, thanks to no direct sunlight
  •  Yield a controlled harvest, thanks to our full-spectrum grow light
  •  Double harvest weekly, thanks to the 2 included trays (250g | 9oz)

 

Featured in: 

 

 

 

Full-Spectrum Light Recipe 

 

MicroFarm's full-spectrum LED grow-light will help microgreens develop to their full colour and flavour potential. Every plant is happiest in the sunshine.

  • Full-Spectrum, High Performance 95+ CRI (Color Rendering Index)
  • 14W Light Module with replaceable print board
  • 1250 Lumens 

MicroFarm uses a full-spectrum LED grow-light, which has a CRI of 95+. This means that colours render 95% similar to natural sunlight; in other words, our grow-light mimics the sun. It is the light spectrum that defines how your plants will grow. It has been shown that when conventional blue/red grow-lights are used to grow plants, their colour and flavour profiles do not fully develop. We engineered our grow-lights to use the full-spectrum of light, to grow plants with complete colour and flavour profiles. By using our full-spectrum light technology, you can grow any type of plant, in any stage of growth. 

 

Used by indoor farmers.

Below you will find a video of Tom, owner of PachaGreens, showing us how he uses our full-spectrum Bloom LED grow-light modules to grow microgreens at his indoor farm.  

MicroFarm | A product for life.

 When LEDs are cooled properly, as within our aluminum profile, they can last for up to 8 years before they start to drop in performance. Because of MicroFarm’s durable and open design, you can easily slide the old LED-board out of the aluminum body and exchange it for a new one, for an estimated price of €9; a fraction of the price of the module. MicroFarm is a product for life.

We anodise parts with the thickest anodisation layer possible for a maximum life span. 

 MicroFarm's durable and open design. 

 

Microgreens, food of the future 

 If you have never tasted them, you probably won't believe us, but microgreens taste just like their full grown plant! Yet, they contain up to 40x more vital nutrients, and are super easy to grow.

 

Up to 50x cheaper than store-bought microgreens

We are committed to supply seeds at honest prices. One year of SeedSupply for €19. Always. Compared to €19 for a whole year's worth of SeedSupply, we are saving you an impressive amount of money.

With MicroFarm, each harvest yields 250grams, or ~9oz. The average grocery store price of 250grams of microgreens is €10 in the EU, and $18 in Canada and the USA.*

Per year, you can grow the equivalent of 12.5kg, or ~27lbs, of microgreens. If you purchased this amount in store-bought microgreens, your grocery bill would come to €520 in the EU, or $950 in Canada or the USA.

* For above calculations: prices for microgreens are averaged based on prices found in grocery stores in Canada and the USA, as well as several European grocers. Seed prices are averaged from various European garden supply stores. Calculations do not include transportation costs, both for grocery and garden stores, and also for SeedSupply.

 

Easily harvest microgreens, every 7-10 days.

 Everyone can do it. Check out the 5 easy steps below to help convince your friends and family. Even your little brother or grandmother can grow microgreens! 

 

Modular design

MicroFarm can be configured multiple ways. Please note that the Standing Disc and Closet/Wall Mounts are currently only available with the MicroFarm Pro model. They will be available for purchase, separately, following our Kickstarter campaign (est. October 2019)

 

 Grow on any medium 

We choose to grow our microgreens on paper towel due to its global accessibility, cleanliness, and because it is compost-friendly (although not if it has printed graphics; please consider making a change!). In professional kitchens, chefs cannot have dirt or soil in their work area; it would be unhygienic. Paper towel is the cleanest way to grow microgreens. 

However, using other types of grow mediums could provide different advantages. This is why our system design is open, so you are able to experiment with different types of media. The seeds we ship are tested using paper towel, yet can also be grown on hemp fiber or in potting soil. 

 

Specifications

Minimal Energy Consumption

During each day that they are growing, microgreens need 12-14 hours of light. MicroFarm delivers outstanding performance, while consuming a small amount of energy; resulting in a minimal impact on the environment, and your energy bill. 

Our MicroFarm LED is a 14W light. Using 12 hours of light each day during the growing phase, and at 10 cents/kWh, MicroFarm’s energy consumption will end up costing you around only $6 - over the whole year!

Technical Details 

Indoor farmers don't calculate light strength in Lumens. Lumens is a unit of measure for human beings that describes how much light a source emits. For example, a reading light emits around 450 lumens. For plants, indoor farmers like to use PPFD (photosynthetic photon flux density) or DLI (Daily Light Integral, how much light a plant receives in one day). For MicroFarm, the average DLI is 6 mol·m−2·d−1.

Dimensions 

  • LED Bloom grow-light: 38cm x 3,6cm
  • Watering Tray: 38cm x 20cm x 2cm
  • Standard Legs: 20cm x 25cm
  • Standing Disc: 15cm diameter
  • Closet/Wall Mounts: 3,6cm x 4cm x 4cm

 

Why Microgreens?

Microgreens.The most healthy foods. Superfoods! 

Microgreens are the seedlings of leafy greens, vegetables, and herbs. They grow approximately 2.5–7.5 cm (1-3 inches) tall, in only 7-10 days. In general, microgreens have a stronger, more intense flavour than that of their mature counterparts. With full-grown plants, you would usually only eat their leaves or fruits; with microgreens, you eat the stem and the leaves, taking in the maximum amount of nutrients that are contained within each seed. 

The vitamin, mineral and antioxidant levels measured in microgreens, are up to 40 times higher than those recorded for mature, fully grown vegetables or herbs. 

While their nutrient contents vary slightly, most varieties tend to be rich in potassium, iron, zinc, magnesium, copper, vitamin C, vitamin E, vitamin K, and beta carotene. 

The consumption of microgreens reduces the risk of many health conditions, such as obesity, diabetes, heart disease, certain cancers, high blood pressure and Alzheimers. For years, doctors have been recommending an increase in the consumption of leafy greens into the diets of  patients who suffer from these conditions.

 

Microgreens. A vital ingredient in any chef's kitchen.

No matter your experience level in the kitchen, microgreens will help to elevate even the most basic of dishes. With MicroFarm, everyone can feel like a top-chef!

What food can you eat that is fresher? What fresh food can you eat that has more nutrients? What could be more fresh than food that you can harvest directly from your countertop?

 

 Boost any dish with microgreens. 

Microgreens are endlessly versatile - they can be used to create supersalads; as main ingredients, toppings or garnish; in sauces, dressings, spreads and dips; and even in smoothies.  

Images courtesy of Google Image Search Results

 

It is amazing how many varieties of microgreens exist. Use them to add flavour, colour and texture to your food; get creative! For any meal you would use full-sized leafy greens and herbs, replace them with microgreens, for an extra healthy boost. The more microgreens you eat, the more your body will benefit from their vitamin and nutrient-rich properties.  

As you can see, microgreens are beautiful. With their delightfully charming size, they create a pleasing aesthetic, enhancing any dish. It would be easy to use a full harvest, weekly.

....and to be honest, we all know that sometimes those "baby" greens aren't as "baby" as we would like them to be; how many of you have had to cut your salad with a fork and knife to avoid ending up with greens messily sticking out of your mouth?! Using microgreens makes eating your favourite meals easier, and a little more dignified.  

 

 SeedSupply | 1 year of microgreen seeds for only €19. 

Our seeds cost approximately one-tenth of the industry norm. 

We wanted to disrupt this norm, and help to ignite the change we want to see within the urban farming community.

Harvest your own food in an easy way: one that's fresher, healthier, and cheaper. 

 

 What seeds will be delivered? 

Everyone gets 10 types of seeds; they are organic and non-GMO | GMO-free.

SeedSupply is a 1kg kit that empowers you to harvest microgreens every week, all year long. With 10 different types of seeds, you can harvest different microgreens, 10 weeks in a row. You can even experiment with sowing different rows of seeds, in one harvest! 

  •  Rocket/Arugula, Eruca sativa
  •  Parsley, Petroselinum crispum
  •  Red Beet, Beta vulgaris conditiva
  •  Daikon, Raphanus sativus (Radish)
  •  Mustard, Sinapis alba
  •  Broccoli, Brassica oleracea botrytis cimosa
  •  Alfalfa, Medicago sativa (Lucerne) (Stretch Goal Reached! at €20,000) 
  •  Red Kohlrabi, Brassica oleracea gongyloides
  •  Dill, Anethum graveolens
  •  Mizuna, Brassica rapa nipposinica

They taste amazing!

Each seed is unique. This is why we promise that prior to shipping them out to you, every type of seed will be thoroughly tested, using MicroFarm, under various conditions. Subject to this, we ask you to allow us the liberty to adjust the seed offerings delivered in the SeedSupply Kit, if we observe results that are not as expected.

 

 

 

Rewards | What's inside the box:

MicroFarm

  • 1 Bloom grow-light
  • 2 durable plastic trays 
  • 2 anodised black aluminium legs
  • 2 hex screws
  • 1 hex key
  • Adapter with interchangeable standardised plug compatible in your region: EU, USA, UK or AU plug available. 
  • On/Off Switch
  • Est. packaging dimensions: 40 x 20 x 6 cm , 1.2 KG

MicroFarm Pro

  • 1 MicroFarm
  • SeedSupply
  • (Standing Light Base plate & Finish plate) OR (Hanging Light 2x Closet/Wall Mounts)
  • 3rd Party Timer with Internet Connectivity: Timer, Mobile Application, and HomeKit-Alexa-Google integration
  • Est. packaging dimensions: 40 x 20 x 15 cm , 2.8 Kg

 

Rewards | Global Availability:

We really want to ship our products worldwide to everyone, at the same price, but logistics tend to make it quite a challenge to achieve our ideal scenario! 

We ship MicroFarm to everyone across the world!

  • MicroFarm
  • 5x MicroFarm Deal
  • 10x MicroFarm Super Deal

 

We ship to the U.S.: 

  • MicroFarm
  • Combo Deal!
  • 5x MicroFarm Deal (+ SeedSupply)
  • 10x MicroFarm Super Deal (+ SeedSupply)

The U.S. Government mandates that we include a Phytosanitary Certificate with every shipment of seeds. This certificate would raise the cost of each order that includes SeedSupply by €50. With the Super Combo Deal you can enjoy MicroFarm + SeedSupply at European price rates!

 

We ship to Canada:

  • MicroFarm
  • SeedSupply

For small seeds packages weighing less than 500g, the Canadian Government does not require Phytosanitary Certificates. However, to avoid charging you a seed import fee, we will need to ship your SeedSupply Kit in two separate shipments. This is why your shipping costs are a little bit higher and why we can't sell more than 2 SeedSupply kits at a beneficial price to Canadians.

 

We ship to Europe: 

  • Everything!
  • MicroFarm Pro Deal

There are no seed shipping restrictions within Europe. With nicely polished and anodized mounts for exploring the use of MicroFarm in new ways + having the luxury of an automatic timer and long-distance control, MicroFarm Pro takes MicroFarm to the next level! After the campaign, we will reach out to ask which of the two mounting options you would prefer.

 

MicroFarm

MicroFarm ships globally from China, to anywhere in the world. We guarantee fast and hassle-free delivery to the European Union, North America, Australia, and New Zealand. We match the adapter of your MicroFarm with the delivery address of your package. For other countries, shipping times may vary, and will depend on the availability of postal services in your area.

SeedSupply

SeedSupply is packed in and shipped from Europe. Some countries are very strict when it comes to importing seeds. Therefore, we cannot guarantee global delivery for SeedSupply. We will refund backers in countries we cannot deliver to. 

MicroFarm Pro

MicroFarm Pro mounts are manufactured and shipped from Belgium.

 

What if we can't deliver seeds, for some reason?

Shipping seeds worldwide can be a tricky thing. Even if we have phytosanitary certificates, some shipments may get blocked by authorities. If we can not deliver your seeds, we will pay you back the SeedSupply difference. We will be in touch to figure it out with you, should this happen. ;)
 

 

Rewards | Timeline 2019 

Rewards | Stretch goals 

More backers = bigger revolution! Spread the word!

REACHED: €20,000 - All backers get 8 types of seeds in their SeedSupply Kit!

REACHED: €35,000 - All backers have access to an Online Recipe library with 50+ easy-to-make delicious recipes.

REACHED: €45,000 - All backers get 10 types of seeds in their SeedSupply Kit.

REACHED: €60,000 - All backers have access to an Online Microgreen Library; with information on 25+ microgreens: optimal growing conditions, nutrient levels and recipes.

REACHED: €75,000 - All backers have access to a mobile Mother Application on iOS and Android: recipes, tutorials, microgreen library,... all in one app!

 

 

Mother | The Kickstarter Team 

Mother is a network of entrepreneurs worldwide. For our Kickstarter campaign we assembled a young dynamic team with most of us being Belgians while Daria is from Canada! We have offices in Wetteren and production and test facilities in Asse (Belgium).

Pieter: Video & Photo + Digital Design & Development 

Ashley: Digital Marketing + Digital Design & Development

Yasmine: Environmental & Product Research

Lander: New Product Design & Development

Daria: Marketing + Business Development North-America

Ann-Sofie: Marketing + Business Administration

Dries: New Product Design + Legal & Finance

Mother | Why MicroFarm and SeedSupply?

We are Mother, an international network of entrepreneurs and designers. Our mission is to develop products that give everyone access to the basic necessities. We strongly believe that everyone should be given the tools to provide for themselves, independent of the social system they live in. In order to fortify our mission, we design our products to last a lifetime.

Mother designs to empower. For the people, by the people.

With MicroFarm and SeedSupply, we take a microstep towards self-sufficiency, by helping you to grow your own super-healthy food. We want to help to reduce your grocery bill; and we also want to help to reduce the amount of waste produced by, and environmental harm associated with, the food production life-cycle, including packaging and transport.

Mother | We Need Your Support! 

We need your support to start up mass production for MicroFarm, so that we can ship our product out at the lowest possible price, to anyone, anywhere, on our planet. Back us on Kickstarter. We need to invest in moulds, buy seeds in bulk, run pilot-tests, and set up a more professional laboratory... just to mention a few of the things on our list.

 

Mother | Who else would care about you this much? 

Mother is a global network of entrepreneurs, an incubator and accelerator for all self-sufficiency ideas. We help design and develop these into the most sustainable possible products, mass-produce them and market them globally.

It is astonishing how dependent we have become, and how much we pay for basic necessities. We find it self-evident that we always have access to electricity, clean water and food. But what happens if suddenly, we do not?

To meet our demands in the future, governments like to sell us the concept of the Universal Basic Income, yet such concepts will make us even more dependent. We want to give everyone on the planet access to basic necessities. If these basic needs are met, we will have more time to focus on the self-exploration and development of our talents. Self-sufficient living should be on top of everyone’s agenda.

 

 

Mother | Our Story 

In 2018, after 5 years of development, Mother launched its first product, Bloom, a full-spectrum LED grow-light system. Bloom was developed to help people grow their indoor gardens at home - whether those were plants in their living room, or herbs in their kitchen. Our technology has been optimized to consume very little energy; creating minimal impact on the environment, and your energy bill. 

We manufactured a series of 1000 Blooms, which we assembled with our own hands. We delivered our products to the greatest plantshops in The Netherlands, Belgium, and Europe; we even sent some all the way down to Australia. We learned a lot throughout the process. We realised that, if we want to make an impact, we need to develop partnerships that enable us to better deliver high-quality mass-produced goods.

We really saw magic happen when Bloom was implemented in various greenhouse lighting projects in Europe, and one of our farmers had great success growing microgreens. Throughout our partnership, we have seen first-hand how easy it is to grow microgreens. The more we learned about the nutritional benefits of microgreens, the more we were in awe of this tiny superfood, and the more curious we became. Thus, came the inspiration for our next product design - MicroFarm, a modular countertop system that uses Bloom's full-spectrum light technology, to enable anyone to grow microgreens at home. The best part is your body reaps the rewards of the countless health benefits microgreens offer (pun intended)!

 

Mother | Our Future 

MicroFarm is a micro step towards self-sufficiency. With six new products planned to go-to market globally over the upcoming two years, we are prepared to scale our impact at a fast rate. Products that will disrupt the way we buy food, water and electricity, and that will change the way we live.

We partner with experts and companies with a proven track record, across different industries. Together, we launch sustainable products for self-sufficient living. Today, we are comprised of an international team of 12 active entrepreneurs/experts. We are fortunate to work with global partners; VanHoecke is a proud partner of ours, a market leader in kitchen manufacturing in the BE/NL area in Europe.

Are you an entrepreneur/expert? Maybe you're a market leader in a specific region and want to help us get our products into every household? Join us in our mission for self-sufficiency.

Even if we have phytosanitary certificates, some shipments may get blocked by authorities. If we can not deliver your seeds, we will pay you back the SeedSupply difference. We will be in touch to figure it out with you, should this happen. ;)  Rewards | Timeline 2019 Rewards | Stretch goals More backers = bigger revolution! Spread the word!REACHED: €20,000 - All backers get 8 types of seeds in their SeedSupply Kit!REACHED: €35,000 - All backers have access to an Online Recipe library with 50+ easy-to-make delicious recipes.REACHED: €45,000 - All backers get 10 types of seeds in their SeedSupply Kit.REACHED: €60,000 - All backers have access to an Online Microgreen Library; with information on 25+ microgreens: optimal growing conditions, nutrient levels and recipes.REACHED: €75,000 - All backers have access to a mobile Mother Application on iOS and Android: recipes, tutorials, microgreen library,... all in one app!  Mother | The Kickstarter Team Mother is a network of entrepreneurs worldwide. For our Kickstarter campaign we assembled a young dynamic team with most of us being Belgians while Daria is from Canada! We have offices in Wetteren and production and test facilities in Asse (Belgium).Pieter: Video & Photo + Digital Design & Development Ashley: Digital Marketing + Digital Design & DevelopmentYasmine: Environmental & Product ResearchLander: New Product Design & DevelopmentDaria: Marketing + Business Development North-AmericaAnn-Sofie: Marketing + Business AdministrationDries: New Product Design + Legal & FinanceMother | Why MicroFarm and SeedSupply?We are Mother, an international network of entrepreneurs and designers. Our mission is to develop products that give everyone access to the basic necessities. We strongly believe that everyone should be given the tools to provide for themselves, independent of the social system they live in. In order to fortify our mission, we design our products to last a lifetime.Mother designs to empower. For the people, by the people.With MicroFarm and SeedSupply, we take a microstep towards self-sufficiency, by helping you to grow your own super-healthy food. We want to help to reduce your grocery bill; and we also want to help to reduce the amount of waste produced by, and environmental harm associated with, the food production life-cycle, including packaging and transport.Mother | We Need Your Support! We need your support to start up mass production for MicroFarm, so that we can ship our product out at the lowest possible price, to anyone, anywhere, on our planet. Back us on Kickstarter. We need to invest in moulds, buy seeds in bulk, run pilot-tests, and set up a more professional laboratory... just to mention a few of the things on our list. Mother | Who else would care about you this much? Mother is a global network of entrepreneurs, an incubator and accelerator for all self-sufficiency ideas. We help design and develop these into the most sustainable possible products, mass-produce them and market them globally.It is astonishing how dependent we have become, and how much we pay for basic necessities. We find it self-evident that we always have access to electricity, clean water and food. But what happens if suddenly, we do not?To meet our demands in the future, governments like to sell us the concept of the Universal Basic Income, yet such concepts will make us even more dependent. We want to give everyone on the planet access to basic necessities. If these basic needs are met, we will have more time to focus on the self-exploration and development of our talents. Self-sufficient living should be on top of everyone’s agenda.  Mother | Our Story In 2018, after 5 years of development, Mother launched its first product, Bloom, a full-spectrum LED grow-light system. Bloom was developed to help people grow their indoor gardens at home - whether those were plants in their living room, or herbs in their kitchen. Our technology has been optimized to consume very little energy; creating minimal impact on the environment, and your energy bill. We manufactured a series of 1000 Blooms, which we assembled with our own hands. We delivered our products to the greatest plantshops in The Netherlands, Belgium, and Europe; we even sent some all the way down to Australia. We learned a lot throughout the process. We realised that, if we want to make an impact, we need to develop partnerships that enable us to better deliver high-quality mass-produced goods.We really saw magic happen when Bloom was implemented in various greenhouse lighting projects in Europe, and one of our farmers had great success growing microgreens. Throughout our partnership, we have seen first-hand how easy it is to grow microgreens. The more we learned about the nutritional benefits of microgreens, the more we were in awe of this tiny superfood, and the more curious we became. Thus, came the inspiration for our next product design - MicroFarm, a modular countertop system that uses Bloom's full-spectrum light technology, to enable anyone to grow microgreens at home. The best part is your body reaps the rewards of the countless health benefits microgreens offer (pun intended)! Mother | Our Future MicroFarm is a micro step towards self-sufficiency. With six new products planned to go-to market globally over the upcoming two years, we are prepared to scale our impact at a fast rate. Products that will disrupt the way we buy food, water and electricity, and that will change the way we live.We partner with experts and companies with a proven track record, across different industries. Together, we launch sustainable products for self-sufficient living. Today, we are comprised of an international team of 12 active entrepreneurs/experts. We are fortunate to work with global partners; VanHoecke is a proud partner of ours, a market leader in kitchen manufacturing in the BE/NL area in Europe.Are you an entrepreneur/expert? Maybe you're a market leader in a specific region and want to help us get our products into every household? Join us in our mission for self-sufficiency. Press:

story:
You can give yourself heat stroke by drinking hot coffee on the go, blood sugar spike by drinking sweetened iced coffee drinks, acid reflux by drinking hot brewed coffee before venturing out, or weigh yourself down by drinking current heavy-bodied cold brew options.

When you need to stay light on your feet and energized or cool down after battling hot weather during your active day, you need a refreshing and revitalizing ready-to-drink coffee that will fit perfectly into your daily life.

We are just as much passionate about our coffee as we are empowering the community that needs it for their adventures! We put care into perfecting our craft and creating unique flavors with clean coffee and real fruits and spices, leaving you with no need for added sugars or creamers.

What is Cold Drip?

Cold Drip is a cold brewing method that empowers us to showcase the care and expertise that goes into the growing, processing, and roasting of each coffee bean from our roastery drawing a smooth, flavorful, and healthier cold brew. Instead of full immersion, Cold drip showers the coffee continuously throughout the brewing process and establishes a consistency throughout each batch allowing the precision to dial in each coffee to create the best flavor profiles. We strive to make the most refreshing and rejuvenating ready-to-drink cold brew that appeals to the health aware and active lifestyles during even the hottest of temperatures.

 

Why Support SkyeLight?

We want you to experience the healthiest and most refreshing preparation of coffee possible.

When you sip our coffee you can taste the many hours of passionate research we have poured into our craft. Despite the renewed and growing interest in cold brew coffee, businesses don't focus on it and perfect it like they do their espresso-based beverages. Congruent to our coffee communities’ preoccupation to espresso we have dedicated the same amount of devotion into perfecting our Cold Brew process and recipe.

It is without a doubt many cold brew coffee companies will arrive in the states within the next 5 years. Being mindful of this assessment, we create the highest quality beverages to champion against future cold brew coffee competitors. We look to sell products to niche day bars, coffee shops, niche cafes, juice bars, sandwich shops, hotels, country clubs, mall locations, small grocery stores, and at local DFW events associated with the health and wellness community. 

Wee bit O’ Background

Co-owners Kimberly Neufeld and Ian Mackinnon found it detrimental for their active lifestyles and previous physically demanding jobs to always drink hot brewed coffee. When we first tried cold brew at an upscale specialty coffee shop, our preference of coffee methods forever changed! Cold Brew was our salvation as hard workers in Texas heat! Our journey to where we are today is one filled with lessons learned left and right accompanied with unwavering determination. From day one we have pondered on how to expand effectively and how best to execute this vision. The journey so far has equipped us with much knowledge about what to expect going forward accumulated from previous ventures we tried to tackle such as coffee truck, store front, and full functioning manufacturing location owned by SkyeLight. All of which we attempted in our early incubator phase on our own but discovered expensive road blocks and entry barriers that would not lead to fast break-even and sustainable business practices. Our story has been shaped by influential individuals in our lives at critical points along the journey. These inspirational people include the West Oak Coffee Roasters team, the Denton County Brewing Company team,  the Mulberry Street Cantina team, some unique past clients that continue to show their loving support from Ian and Kim's previous job, and many more. As of late December we have been blessed to share a space with one of the best bars in our town, Denton County Brewing Company. Seth Morgan, owner and brew-master, offered us the opportunity of a lifetime to start our manufacturing business out of his micro-brewery, where we are located now! They are an inspiration and further fuel our passion for what we do.

Our team at SkyeLight Coffee will sustain the core values in quality and consistency to ensure great products that are scientifically proven to replenish and rejuvenate active bodies every time!

story:
Short Summary

Segue versione italiana

"All abroad knows Italy but Italy is not only Milan, Florence, Rome and Naples"

Hi everyone! We are Sergio and Sara, thank you for reading this.  

Everything always starts when you touch the rock bottom. All started in the middle of last year, when I left my job and decided was time to do on my own. But what? I've been raised by my family with that thing that you need to find a purpose in your life, something for which you wake up in the morning and feel good after a day of sweat before going to sleep. I am an expat from 7 years and it's always good to come back home, the smell in the air is really different, chaos on the street is really charming, the sea is bluer as I remember, and the food? Do we want to talk about the constant, beautiful and warm smell of food on the streets? Eating on the sand an arancino at the beach may seem silly for anyone who has the opportunity to do it, and eating that arancino on the shores of the Strait, while the ships leaves the harbour, enlightened me. I found the answer at home, I need my corner of South Italy here in The Netherlands. Joined by Sara, after five months of market research, we bought our first "mobile kitchen" (it was looking like anything but not a kitchen ),

after months and a lot of money invested to convert this Caravan in a foodtruck we are almost ready but now we need your help!  

The O'truck project will travel parallel to our Blog, the blog aims to raise awareness to as many people as possible of our unique history and break down the stereotype of a poor South Italy and cut off from the tourist path, I wish I could say "bring tourism" but it would be probably exaggerated, but this is our hope. We will offer content in English and Italian, will discuss all issues regarding the South Italy and we will create a community where those who want to, I hope many of you fellows, will collaborate with articles, photos or videos on our beautiful land at 360 degrees. In other words, WE NEED YOUR HELP​

I started this project because I love my country and I am very proud of being Southern. I want the world to know the South of Italy and all its beauties. In the future, I'd like to create a network of entrepreneurs, hoteliers, B & B, travel agencies and other people interested to  help us achieve this goal. Who will be interested to join us in this project will received further information contacting us at info@otruck.nl

 

 

Italian Version

 

 

"

Tutti all'estero amano l'Italia ma l' Italia non è solo Milano, Firenze, Roma e Napoli"

Ciao! Siamo Sergio e Sara e ti ringraziamo anticipatamente per il tempo che dedicherai alla lettura della nostra avventura.

Tutto ha avuto inizio a metà del passato anno, quando persi il lavoro e decisi  era arrivato il momento di fare da sè. Ma cosa? Nella vita bisogna trovare uno scopo, un qualcosa per il quale svegliarti la mattina e sentirti bene dopo una giornata di sudore prima di andare a dormire. La risposta l'ho trovata in vacanza, a casa. Sono un expat da 7 anni,tornare a casa fà sempre bene, l'odore dell'aria è veramente diverso, il caos in strada è realmente affascinante, il mare è azzurro come di piu' non potrebbe ed il cibo?  Vogliamo parlare di quell'odore costante di cibo per la strada? Mangiare un arancino in spiaggia puo sembrare una stupidaggine per chi ha la possibilità di farlo, e proprio quell'arancino mangiato in riva allo stretto mentre le navi abbandonano il porto mi ha illuminato. Avevo bisogno del mio angolo di Sud qui in Olanda. Dopo 5 mesi di ricerche abbiamo comprato la nostra prima "cucina mobile" (assomigliava a tutto tranne che ad una cucina )  dopo tanti mesi e molti soldi investiti nella conversione del Caravan in food truck siamo quasi pronti ma ora abbiamo bisogno del vostro aiuto.

Il progetto O'truck viaggerà parallelamente al nostro Blog, l'obiettivo del blog è far conoscere a quanta piu gente possibile la nostra storia unica ed abbattere l'idea di un Sud Italia povero e tagliato fuori dai circuiti turistici, vorrei poter dire "portare turismo",è probabilmente esagerato ma la speranza è quella. Proponiamo contenuti in inglese ed italiano, tratteremo tutte le tematiche inerenti il Sud Italia, e creeremo una community dove chi vorrà, spero in tanti, potrà collaborare con articoli, foto o video sulla nostra bellissima terra a 360 gradi. ABBIAMO BISOGNO DI VOI

Ho iniziato questo progetto perchè amo la mia terra e sono molto orgoglioso di essere meridionale, voglio che il mondo conosca il Sud Italia e tutte le sue bellezze enogastronomiche e non.Vorrei riuscire a creare una rete di imprenditori, albergatori,b&B, agenzie di viaggio e chiunque altro voglia aiutarci a raggiungere questo obiettivo. Fare gruppo per raggiungere l'obiettivo di far conoscere il piu possibile il paradiso bistratto da dove veniamo, ricco di gemme che non aspettano altro che vedere la luce.

What We Need & What You Get

And now we come to you! Each project as well as being a great idea on paper to be achieved needs money, we have already bought the Food Truck, and with your help we would like to finish it and start the first media marketing campaign on all social platforms to raise awareness of our project .

 4000 €  will be used to buy the missing equipment of the food truck and the licenses.

1000 € will be dedicated to the blog, in social media campaigns and in attracting the largest number of people on our website and make known its contents

http://otruck.nl/blog/          

 

 

Ed ora arriviamo a voi! Ogni progetto oltre ad essere una bellissima idea su carta per essere realizzato ha bisogno di soldi, abbiamo gia comprato il food truck e con il vostro aiuto vorremmo terminarlo ed avviare la prima campagna di media marketing su tutte le piattaforme social per far conoscere il nostro progetto.

 

 4000 € raccolti andranno utilizzati per comprare le attrezzature mancanti al food truck e le licenze

1000 €   saranno dedicati al blog , in campagne social e nell'attrarre il maggior numero di persone sul nostro portale e far conoscere i suoi contenuti.

story: Trying out a campaign
story_txt: Trying out a campaign

story:
Tea Range

 

Why we’ve decided to make our crowdfunding campaign

After five years of visiting many tea estates in Nepal, one garden particularly stood out, Jasbire tea estate. This was influenced by Sharad’s passion for tea, his skills and engagement in the Jasbire community. In 2015, Sharad, with other tea farmers gathered to offer a unique approach to tea making, and to improve the environment, soil and culture.

 

Tealure is launching this project to seek international attention to help start this truly unique initiative. We aim to encourage and give voice to the Jasbire tea producers who have been silently mastering the art of specialty tea making for a decade, and are finally starting to make use of their approach.

 

Our Story

Tealure was founded by Ernestas Klevas, and at the time, he was an MA student, who travelled to Nepal to collect data for his thesis. While he was there, he discovered some local tea farmers in the highlands of the Himalayas who were producing the finest quality tea.

In 2014, Tealure started selling loose leaf tea online and in several outlets around Copenhagen, ranging from neighborhood cafes to Michelin star restaurants, and then, established itself as a high quality brand.  

In 2016, together with 220 backers, we made our first promise to extend our value chain and to commence tea packaging in Nepal.

In line with our promise to improve our impact in Nepal, we collaborated with our supply partners, and presently, we promise to deliver even better teas! Let’s start this unique initiative and promote the Sharad and Jasbire Tea estate.

We redesigned our packaging to include a Nepalese plucker- a true icon of the Nepali tea, and the backbone of the country.

 

Jasbire tea  

In 2015, around 153 farmers led by Mr. Sharad Shubba around the tiny village of Jasbire gathered in the most important tea district of Nepal to launch a unique project.

Jasbire Tea has been produced by the local farmers in their own land, and therefore, it is an entirely farm-based production with the ownership still at the farmers’ level. The equipment for tea processing was purchased; experts were assigned as advisors in order to guarantee optimal handling of the leaves.

All they need is little help with sales and international attention, and this is why we are here for them.

 

The dream  

Sharad has a simple dream; to introduce his teas to people around the world so he can build a school in Jasbire where poor families could send their kids for quality education. Most of these families can only dream of offering their kids good education, and therefore, they end up sending their kids to a public school where the quality of education is very poor. Unlike in many developed countries where kids often come up with silly excuses not to go to school, kids from Nepal dream of schooling. Sharad has a dream to build a school, hire English speaking teachers and provide free education for kids in the local area. We promised to support Jasbire tea which in turn would make a small but meaningful impact on the children’s life

 

Who I am

My name is Ernestas, and I'm deeply passionate about promoting specialty Nepalese tea. My journey in search of this incredible tea has taken me from the depths of the Nepalese jungle to 4400 meters in the breathtaking Himalayan range.   

I've worked hand-in-hand and tirelessly with the Nepalese farmers and pluckers in the heavily pouring rain, and cold to help get their teas to the market. 

Risks and challenges

During our previous crowdfunding campaign, we inquired problems with our stand up pouches. Due to limited infrastructure and packaging options in Nepal, it is more difficult to find quality goods. This time we will spend more time and efforts to find a proper packaging supplier.

The major risk is ensuring sustainability after the Indiegogo campaign. This cooperation should be able to stand on its own after the campaign. Our wish is to make this initiative sustainable and encourage other entrepreneurs to engage in direct trade in order to empower farmers and tea workers.

We do not want to make this a one-time initiative. Please help us suggest how we could scale our business after the Indiegogo campaign to ensure continuous supply of Nepali specialty teas worldwide.
