Tealure was founded by Ernestas Klevas, and at the time, he was an MA student, who travelled to Nepal to collect data for his thesis. While he was there, he discovered some local tea farmers in the highlands of the Himalayas who were producing the finest quality tea.

In 2014, Tealure started selling loose leaf tea online and in several outlets around Copenhagen, ranging from neighborhood cafes to Michelin star restaurants, and then, established itself as a high quality brand.  
In 2016, together with 220 backers, we made our first promise to extend our value chain and to commence tea packaging in Nepal.
In line with our promise to improve our impact in Nepal, we collaborated with our supply partners, and presently, we promise to deliver even better teas! Let’s start this unique initiative and promote the Sharad and Jasbire Tea estate.
We redesigned our packaging to include a Nepalese plucker- a true icon of the Nepali tea, and the backbone of the country.

 
Jasbire tea  
In 2015, around 153 farmers led by Mr. Sharad Shubba around the tiny village of Jasbire gathered in the most important tea district of Nepal to launch a unique project.
Jasbire Tea has been produced by the local farmers in their own land, and therefore, it is an entirely farm-based production with the ownership still at the farmers’ level. The equipment for tea processing was purchased; experts were assigned as advisors in order to guarantee optimal handling of the leaves.

All they need is little help with sales and international attention, and this is why we are here for them.

 
The dream  
Sharad has a simple dream; to introduce his teas to people around the world so he can build a school in Jasbire where poor families could send their kids for quality education. Most of these families can only dream of offering their kids good education, and therefore, they end up sending their kids to a public school where the quality of education is very poor. Unlike in many developed countries where kids often come up with silly excuses not to go to school, kids from Nepal dream of schooling. Sharad has a dream to build a school, hire English speaking teachers and provide free education for kids in the local area. We promised to support Jasbire tea which in turn would make a small but meaningful impact on the children’s life

 
Who I am

My name is Ernestas, and I'm deeply passionate about promoting specialty Nepalese tea. My journey in search of this incredible tea has taken me from the depths of the Nepalese jungle to 4400 meters in the breathtaking Himalayan range.   
I've worked hand-in-hand and tirelessly with the Nepalese farmers and pluckers in the heavily pouring rain, and cold to help get their teas to the market. 
Risks and challenges
During our previous crowdfunding campaign, we inquired problems with our stand up pouches. Due to limited infrastructure and packaging options in Nepal, it is more difficult to find quality goods. This time we will spend more time and efforts to find a proper packaging supplier.
The major risk is ensuring sustainability after the Indiegogo campaign. This cooperation should be able to stand on its own after the campaign. Our wish is to make this initiative sustainable and encourage other entrepreneurs to engage in direct trade in order to empower farmers and tea workers.
We do not want to make this a one-time initiative. Please help us suggest how we could scale our business after the Indiegogo campaign to ensure continuous supply of Nepali specialty teas worldwide.

story:
We are so excited to announce the latest project the LunchKitt Lunchbox. Packed full of cool features:

We were recently featured on a really cool Japanese media site called Bouncy / バウンシー check out their cool refitted video:

https://www.facebook.com/bouncy.news/videos/620177811700227/

Also check out our coverage on Gadget Flow:

https://thegadgetflow.com/portfolio/lunchbox-with-device-holder/

Based on the National Health Service Calorie Guidelines for an adult. To support a balanced diet, lose body weight or just eat what you like. 

\

28 Day Lean Diet & Fitness & Diet Guide

If you have an event or holday coming up, not to fear! We created a get Lean In 28 Day Guide to help you get the most out of your LunchKitt. 

Tech Specifications & CAD Designs

The dimensions of the LunchKitt containers are 130mm x 130mm in width and 51mm in height. It's durable & light weight at only 1.4lbs in total. 

One container is for protein and carbohydrates with a 5mm ridge in-between the two sections. It is only a small ridge to aid portioning your proteins and carbs, however it also means you can put a sandwich in there.

The second container is the fruit/fats/salad. There are markers on the side of the container with maintain and lose goals for either men and women, and each section is labelled for the amounts needed for those goals to be achieved. 

Design Process & CAD Drawings 

Our goal was to make a fun practical and cool looking lunchbox that incorporated the amazing portion control elements of our original Kickstarter project. Our first designs & prototypes were a little clunky and heavy but they had all the features!

We knew we wanted a device holder as we got a huge amount of feedback . The cooling plate would be a cool extra feature, but we wanted to make it different and practical. Containers had to have our patented portion control markers.

Our Timeline Of Production 

 

About Us

We are a nutrition, portion control and healthy lifestyle company. Based In London, United Kingdom. Our aim is to help as many people as possible around the world to find their way out of the maze of conflicting information about nutrition & have fun doing it. 

We are proud to have featured on the Channel 4 TV show Buy It Now showcasing our first Kickstarter. 

We currently operate in the UK, USA & Europe. 

Thank you for reading our Bio! If we can help you in anyway with your diet, health or weight management please contact us: info@mealkitt.com or visit our website www.mealkitt.com

We are established with a distribution company, pharmacies, trade links & customer feedback - established in 2016 with our first campaign.

*Adult Calorie Consumption*

NHS Calorie Consumption Info

Within a healthy, balanced diet, a man needs around 10,500kJ (2,500kcal) a day to maintain his weight. For a woman, that figure is around 8,400kJ (2,000kcal) a day. These values can vary depending on age, metabolism and levels of physical activity, among other things.

Risks and challenges

Since our success of MealKitt, we already have a trusted manufacturer, logistics and shipping team in place, ready to go. We have trialed multiple prototypes and have found the most functional, nutritionally supportive and fun lunchbox. 

We have preliminary agreements in place with our manufacturers, however since challenges tend to arise during production, there may be risk of delays due to unforeseen circumstances. As we will not compromise on quality, if any issues arise we promise to keep you updated every step of the way.

We already have investors on board with a wealth of experience to help drive and develop the LunchKitt further. Should any unexpected encounters arise we have a strong team backing us. 

We want you and your family to enjoy your lunch times using the LunchKitt as a way to visualize your portions, get lean and maintain your healthy lifestyle.

story:
About Us

Help us take Burning Foot Brewing to the next level! As we've always said, we believe in sharing great beer with great friends, and we are excited for the opporunity to do that on a much larger scale. Given our owners' restaurant backgrounds, we are eager to expand our scope and provide a complete culinary experience--with a purpose. Our farm-to-table brewpub will be a "first" for Louisville! 

With our vision, our establishment will...

  • Operate as a full-service restaurant and brewery, featuring fresh, innovative cuisine (sourced locally), Burning Foot Brewing's high-ABV stouts and IPAs , as well as select “grain-to-glass” beers;
  • Include an on-site garden to support the “field-to-fork” concept;
  • Provide a relaxing, family-friendly atmosphere with a neighborhood feel; and
  • Offer beutiful event spaces for weddings, private parties, and/or community meetings.

We plan to cultivate more than just the land! We envision a space where friendships--new and old--can flourish! We are also committed to partnering with our neighbors, city government, and other local businesses to enrich the community. 

Our long-term plans include organizing neighborhood events, hosting a regular farmers market, and participating in charitable giving.

  • As a veteran-owned business, supporting our servicemen and women, law enforcement officers, and firefighters will be a top priority.
  • As a farmer-owned business, we'll partner with local schools to provide education on food literacy and sustainabile farming.
  • And as a family-oriented business, we are dedicated to providing a family-friendly environment and improving the safety and aesthetics of our community.

We believe a farm-to-table restaurant and brewery will be an asset to Louisville's vibrant culinary scene. Furthermore, with your help, we have the unique opportunity to be so much more than a brewpub with good food and drink--we can be a mechanism for doing good!

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently under contract on a scenic property in central Louisville--an ideal setting for our vision to come to life! However, the building is not currently operating as a restaurant, so substantial investment must be made to prepare the space for our brewpub. 

We aim to raise at least $50,000 on Indiegogo, which will cover a portion of our anticipated expenses. In particular, the Indiegogo donations will be used for capital expenditures, including brewing equipment, refigeration, kegs, furnishings, kitchen equipment, IT/POS, and inventory. 

We appreciate contributions of all sizes! See the "Perks" section for specific details on donations, but the following benefits are available at different fund levels:

  • A "Thank You" Card & Goodie Bag
  • Limited Edition Opening Day T-Shirt
  • Teku Beer Glass
  • 1-Year Beer Club Membership
  • Locally-Farmed Produce Box **Louisville Only**
  • VIP Invitation to Soft & Grand Openings
  • ...And More!

In most cases, each level includes all of the perks included at lower levels. For example, everyone who contributes $25+ will receive a "thank you" card and be featured in the printed programs we'll distribute at our soft and grand openings!

Timeline

Opening a restaurant and brewery is a time-consuming process and we ask for your patience! While we plan to open the restaurant with a wide selection of guest taps, it will be 2019 before our Burning Foot beers are available on tap. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help, but aren't in the position to offer financial support? We understand! Please help us spread the word about Burning Foot Brewing by joining our Facebook page and sharing our campaign link on social media. Sharing is easy with the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks so much for your support! We appreciate you!

story:
The Hangover Prevention Pill

As we get older, our bodies are no longer friendly to us. We were once able to have a few drinks and feel perfectly fine in the morning. We laughed at older folks who warned us about hangovers.

"Hangovers? Not me."

But then, your late 20's show up and all of a sudden, those hangovers aren't the hoax you thought they were. They're actually pretty real. And if you're over 30, forget it, your body is begging you to be boring because it doesn't want to deal with your antics anymore.

 

 

But what if there was a way to prevent hangovers? Or at least minimize them?

This isn't a product that let's you drink more. No. Nu Day is a supplement compromised of natural ingredients that help our liver better process alcohol, replenish vitamins & minerals that are depleted, and improve sleep quality.

That's one thing that many other hangover pills tend to miss. Alcohol is terrible for our sleep and you need to help the body get a better night's rest. With our product, you definitely will.

We put in a massive amount of research to bring you the best hangover pills. Now we just need your help making Nu Day a reality.

How It Works & What Makes Us Different

Hangovers have long been an annoyance throughout human history. It's natural for many to have attempted to create a hangover cure pill or other prevention method.

So what makes us different?

In order to best describe what we do differently, let's take a look at what the competition does.

Most Competitor Products

1. Vitamin C + Vitamin B Complex

2. Milk Thistle for the liver

3.  L-Cysteine (NAC)

 

When taking a look at other hangover prevention pills, many of them have similar ingredients, but they don't do enough. We all know that B and C vitamins are excreted through urine during alcohol use, making them mandatory ingredients. But is milk thistle enough to help your liver? Maybe. But at Nu Day, we don't settle. We go above and beyond to help the liver.

Lastly, NAC is fantastic at helping break down alcohol, but the instructions on other products can be wrong, and possibly even dangerous. Many competitors recommend taking their supplements with your first alcoholic beverage, and some even recommend taking them before bed too.

The issue with this is NAC needs to be taken at least an hour before consuming alcohol to be most effective. Also, consuming NAC after alcohol use can cause more harm than good as shown in this study conducted on mice.

How Nu Day Works

1. Vitamin C + Vitamin B Complex

2. Repair liver with Milk Thistle

3. Remove fat build up in liver with Taurine

4. Break down alcohol's toxic by-product, acetaldehyde, with Dihydromyricentin AND Alpha Lipoic Acid AND L-Cysteine (NAC)

5. Prevent nausea, dry mouth and loss of appetite with Prickly Pear Extract AND Ginger

6. Improve mental state and lessen dehydration with Panax Ginseng

7. Improve sleep quality with L-Theanine

As you can see, our formula may have some similar ingredients to other hangover supplements, but we have gone above and beyond in order to ensure that you receive a quality product that can effectively combat hangovers.

In addition, the instructions for our product are much more effective than the competition. As mentioned, L-Cysteine (NAC) needs to be taken at least an hour before alcohol use for it to be as safe and effective as possible.

Lastly, this product is manufactured in the USA. By purchasing this product, you are supporting fairly paid workers and helping local economies & families.

What We Need

In order to make Nu Day a reality, we need to order a minimum of 5,000 bottles.

We are asking crowdfunders, like yourself, to help us reach out goal in order to bring this product to life so that hangovers are a thing of the past.

We will be putting our own money into this, but we need your help! Can we count on your support?

 

Risks & Challenges

Instead of manufacturing this supplement ourselves, we have reached out to a custom manufacturer in order to source the ingredients and create the supplement.

This manufacturer has both FDA and GMP certifications which ensures that all ingredients used are safe and produced in a sanitary environment.

They have incredible reviews and are able to produce this supplement with impeccable quality.

We have a marketing plan in place on how to grow this business, but nothing can happen without the initial investment for the first batch.

Your contribution allows for us to help many people, including yourself, who like to enjoy drinks, but hate the mornings that follow.

If we cannot secure the full amount through our IndieGoGo campaign, the shipment date will likely be delayed as we will need to accumulate enough funds to be able to produce the first batch.

With your contribution, and sharing this campaign to produce the best hangover pills, we can ensure that all orders will be shipped on time.

For more information, please visit the FAQ tab on this campaign page.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone is able to contribute financially, but even spreading the word to your social circles can be a tremendous help.

Tell all your friends that there's a company out there that's going to prevent hangovers. They just need a little help.

Will you help us reach this goal and prevent hangovers?

"Where Can I Buy Your Product?"

Once we have our production running, you will be able to buy Nu Day here:

https://feelnu.co/nu-day

story:
Have you missed Cabbages & Kings? Do you want us back?

After putting a little known village in Kent on the map when I opened Cabbages & Kings, a small but beautiful home interiors and gift shop with a stunning tea shop serving breakfast, lunch and afternoon tea there, I’m now ready to open a vibrant and creative handcrafted lifestyle store with an equally lively and handcrafted food-store and deli in central Sevenoaks.  

Quality independents are the lifeblood of the high street. Sevenoaks has lost so many independent stores in recent years. We want to put back some of the magic of this glorious Kent market town.

What will Foraged+FOUND be?

Foraged + FOUND will be a place to be nourished and inspired. Somewhere you can gather your thoughts and simply breathe.

Upstairs

Our team will be working their magic in the food-store deli making amazingly tasty fresh food and baked goods daily, to take home, for lunch on the go or simply to enjoy in our everyday café space. Backing up our homemade offerings we will be filling the food-store shelves with products from some of the best producers in Kent and beyond. We will also be selling natural wines and beers.

I love community, connection and chatting to strangers in a queue. Our kitchen team will be a visible part of our community in our open kitchen. So please do tip a nod and a smile their way! The core of our everyday food offering will be plant based and healthy but there will still be cake for the days you need a treat!

Downstairs

Downstairs is the lifestyle interiors store. Just inside the doorway will be pot plants, fresh flowers, body and bath and hand poured scented soy candles for sale.

As you walk further into the shop you will find vases, mirrors, lighting, tables and chairs and maybe even a sofa or two. Our aim here is to help you create spaces of your own that make your soul feel welcome, so much so you just won’t want to leave them. After all, shouldn't home be our vacation away from the chaos of life. I’m looking forward to getting my sewing machine out again to make limited edition cushions, bags, lampshades or just bespoke our linen aprons with a patch pocket made from a gorgeous scrap of fabric I've found. 

Workshops and Events

Over and above our day to day offerings and activities we plan to run a calendar of creative, foodie and kitchen craft workshops, pop-up suppers and afternoon tea events or just simple evenings of conversation over wine and cheese tastings, our chance to chat and get to know you.

Who are We?  

Jim and I lead the team at Cabbages & Kings and we definitely made Cabbages amazing TOGETHER! I may be leading but when the business is open he’ll be rocking the food offering!

Classically French trained Jim spent many years living and cheffing in London. His knowledge and skill set is broad but above all his palette is a legend! What we had in common from the outset was that we both naturally strive for excellence in whatever we do.

Outside of baking great cake I spent 23 years working 1:1 with clients as a soft-furnisher and designer. I’ve always been very hands on ensuring continuity and quality of products.

Why we Need your Help.

Breathing life back into an old commercial building so it can twinkle and shine as it serves it’s community once more has always been something that's close to my heart. I wholeheartedly believe we can make something truly special here.

So far I've funded this project entirely myself with savings. A full repairing and insuring lease means I bare the full cost of addressing the good the bad and the ugly needed to turn a rather broken ugly duckling into a beautiful and healthy swan! As is the way with old buildings the full extent of the work needed only becomes clear when the interior is stripped back. So we’ve blown a hole in the budget on a massive amount of structural work. 

Where Will the Money be Spent?

You can’t race a car without an engine so we need to raise more capital. We really want to bake sourdough bread and buns and small batch ice-cream so an ice-cream maker and a micro bakery bread oven is on the list. But there’s more basic things needed for the food-store such as extraction and ventilation, refrigerated display units, counters, air-conditioning, the tech for the till system, the list goes on. And when all that’s done, we need to stock the shelves upstairs and down. So the more we raise here the brighter this gem will shine!

Perks and Rewards

We have thought carefully about how we will reward you for your pledges. Reward based crowdfunding in many respects is just pre-sales. There are straight forward vouchers to spend in-store when we open, tickets to events and workshops we have planned, limited edition branded items, the recipe for our most popular dish at Cabbages or a simple coffee and a pastry.

However we've been blown away by the support and love Cabbages customers have given us since it shut. It was clearly much loved and holds lots of good memories and moments of joy for so many. So I've come up with something for those who are already sure they'll be regulars!

Founder Memberships

The more you use it, the more it rewards you, way beyond the value of your pledge. But remember they are limited and only available here and won’t be repeated.

There are 4 tiers and dependent on which you choose depends on exactly what you will get so please check them all out before you decide, but as a guide:

  • All members get a free coffee every Wednesday for a year from when we open! If you live or work in Sevenoaks this could be worth around £150 alone.
  • A 7.5% discount on products in store (subject to T's&C's check out the FAQ's for these.)
  • Your name on our Founders Wall. This will be at the top of the stairs and a feature where we can acknowledge all those that have helped to build the roots of our community.
  • A copy of our most popular dish, Jim’s mother-in-law's sweetcorn fritter recipe to cook at home. in friends You can win friends and excite or bribe the family with this.
  • A Cabbages & Kings limited edition luxury branded shopper or branded linen apron. A tangible memento of the happy memories and great times had at Cabbages. The design rocks, I did this one myself. It would make a great gift for someone you spent happy times with at Cabbages. 
  • Discounts on event tickets. Depending on which membership you choose you get 50% of two tickets to a pop-up supper club or Afternoon Tea event, or one ticket for a creative or foodie workshop. The membership discount means you can choose an event that fits with you throughout the 12 month period, you will also get early notifications of all events to avoid missing out on the one you want to attend. And they can also be gifted. (subject to T's&C's check out the FAQ's for these.) 
  • If you choose the top tier membership, you and a friend get to join us at our launch party!

Questions? 

 

You can follow us or get in touch on Instagram (@foragedandfoundco) Facebook (@foragedandfoundco or @cabbagesandkings.halstead)

Where's the catch?

A fixed goal campaign is an all or nothing deal. If we don’t achieve our target of £20,000 we get nothing and I'm not too sure what we do then! So if you loved Cabbages and you believe in us and our amazing little shop then help us reach our target. 

If we do reach the £20,000 goal the we can set a stretch goal  that would enable us to get some of the bells and whistles stuff like the bread oven and ice-cream machine. I believe the only way for this to be a vibrant, successful and sustainable business is for it not to be a "half-baked" version of what it could be so we really need your help to make sure it shines bright! 

So if you've missed us, and want us back, please do pledge.

If you can’t pledge, but believe in our project and want to help in someway then please, please, spread the word, share through your social media, make some noise and get the word out. You never know where it may lead. 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We've overcome some major challenges already and have all the planning approved. We know what we still need to do to complete the project and the infrastructure required to make the business run once its open. We have a clear vision and solid plan for the future. 

This is going to be awesome!

And if you've read this all the way to the end?

Thank you!
story_txt:
Have you missed Cabbages & Kings? Do you want us back?After putting a little known village in Kent on the map when I opened Cabbages & Kings, a small but beautiful home interiors and gift shop with a stunning tea shop serving breakfast, lunch and afternoon tea there, I’m now ready to open a vibrant and creative handcrafted lifestyle store with an equally lively and handcrafted food-store and deli in central Sevenoaks.  Quality independents are the lifeblood of the high street. Sevenoaks has lost so many independent stores in recent years. We want to put back some of the magic of this glorious Kent market town.What will Foraged+FOUND be?Foraged + FOUND will be a place to be nourished and inspired. Somewhere you can gather your thoughts and simply breathe.UpstairsOur team will be working their magic in the food-store deli making amazingly tasty fresh food and baked goods daily, to take home, for lunch on the go or simply to enjoy in our everyday café space. Backing up our homemade offerings we will be filling the food-store shelves with products from some of the best producers in Kent and beyond. We will also be selling natural wines and beers.I love community, connection and chatting to strangers in a queue. Our kitchen team will be a visible part of our community in our open kitchen. So please do tip a nod and a smile their way! The core of our everyday food offering will be plant based and healthy but there will still be cake for the days you need a treat!DownstairsDownstairs is the lifestyle interiors store. Just inside the doorway will be pot plants, fresh flowers, body and bath and hand poured scented soy candles for sale.As you walk further into the shop you will find vases, mirrors, lighting, tables and chairs and maybe even a sofa or two. Our aim here is to help you create spaces of your own that make your soul feel welcome, so much so you just won’t want to leave them. After all, shouldn't home be our vacation away from the chaos of life. I’m looking forward to getting my sewing machine out again to make limited edition cushions, bags, lampshades or just bespoke our linen aprons with a patch pocket made from a gorgeous scrap of fabric I've found. Workshops and EventsOver and above our day to day offerings and activities we plan to run a calendar of creative, foodie and kitchen craft workshops, pop-up suppers and afternoon tea events or just simple evenings of conversation over wine and cheese tastings, our chance to chat and get to know you.Who are We?  Jim and I lead the team at Cabbages & Kings and we definitely made Cabbages amazing TOGETHER! I may be leading but when the business is open he’ll be rocking the food offering!Classically French trained Jim spent many years living and cheffing in London. His knowledge and skill set is broad but above all his palette is a legend! What we had in common from the outset was that we both naturally strive for excellence in whatever we do.Outside of baking great cake I spent 23 years working 1:1 with clients as a soft-furnisher and designer. I’ve always been very hands on ensuring continuity and quality of products.Why we Need your Help.Breathing life back into an old commercial building so it can twinkle and shine as it serves it’s community once more has always been something that's close to my heart. I wholeheartedly believe we can make something truly special here.So far I've funded this project entirely myself with savings. A full repairing and insuring lease means I bare the full cost of addressing the good the bad and the ugly needed to turn a rather broken ugly duckling into a beautiful and healthy swan! As is the way with old buildings the full extent of the work needed only becomes clear when the interior is stripped back. So we’ve blown a hole in the budget on a massive amount of structural work. Where Will the Money be Spent?You can’t race a car without an engine so we need to raise more capital. We really want to bake sourdough bread and buns and small batch ice-cream so an ice-cream maker and a micro bakery bread oven is on the list. But there’s more basic things needed for the food-store such as extraction and ventilation, refrigerated display units, counters, air-conditioning, the tech for the till system, the list goes on. And when all that’s done, we need to stock the shelves upstairs and down. So the more we raise here the brighter this gem will shine!Perks and RewardsWe have thought carefully about how we will reward you for your pledges. Reward based crowdfunding in many respects is just pre-sales. There are straight forward vouchers to spend in-store when we open, tickets to events and workshops we have planned, limited edition branded items, the recipe for our most popular dish at Cabbages or a simple coffee and a pastry.However we've been blown away by the support and love Cabbages customers have given us since it shut. It was clearly much loved and holds lots of good memories and moments of joy for so many. So I've come up with something for those who are already sure they'll be regulars!Founder MembershipsThe more you use it, the more it rewards you, way beyond the value of your pledge. story:
My name is Tatiana Pacheco. Me and my husband, Andrew Pacheco are the co-founder’s of Andrea’s Healthy kitchen. A business that was started in 2013, to encourage and promote a healthy detox option through my 100% natural  juices. My goal for all who purchase my product is to help them with a simple 3 or 5-day detox plan. 

I love what I do, and it brings me joy when my customers feel and see a difference after drinking my juices on a weekly, monthly and even quarterly basis. My juices promote weight loss and internal cleansing. 

I’m proud to say that my business has grown quite a bit from where I started 5 years ago. Andrea’s Healthy Kitchen has now launched a website, we are now sold in Something Healthy Cafe in Monrovia, and are often seen out at numerous community events on a monthly basis. 

I hope and pray that my juices will continue to enhance the health for all of those that buy them ... and most importantly  tasty too!
